GSP33brsvbh1u:11: śāśvatāya namaskurmo vedāya ca bhavāya ca //3//
GSP33brsvbh1u:24: FN: 1-yatra jijñāsyatvaṃ tatraiva saṃdigdhatvaṃ saprayojanatvaṃ ceti jijñāsyatvavyāpake saṃdigdhatvasaprayojanatve /
GSP33brsvbh1u:35: sa cāyam ākīṭapataṅgebhya ā ca devarṣibhyaḥ prāṇabhṛnmātrasyedaṅkārāspadebhyo dehendriyamanobuddhiviṣayebhyo
GSP33brsvbh1u:37: na hi jātu kaścidatra saṃdigdhe 'ahaṃ vā nāhaṃ vā'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:44: tadālambanatve hi 'yo 'haṃ bālye pitarāvanvabhavaṃ sa eva sthāvire praṇaptṝnanubhavāmi'iti pratisaṃdhānaṃ na bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:45: na hi bālasthavirayoḥ śarīrayorasti manāgapi pratyabhijñāna @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:48: tasmādyeṣu vyāvartamāneṣu yadanuvartate tattebhyo bhinnaṃ yathā ca kusumebhyaḥ sūtram /
GSP33brsvbh1u:49: tathā bālādiśarīreṣu vyāvartamāneṣvapi paramahaṅkārāspadamanuvartamānaṃ tebhyo bhidyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:50: api ca svapnānte divyaśarīrabhedamāsthāya taducitānbhogānbhuñjāna eva pratibuddho
GSP33brsvbh1u:51: manuṣyaśarīramātmānaṃ paśyan 'nāhaṃ devo manuṣya eva'iti devaśarīre bādhyamāne 'pyahamāspadamabādhyamānaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:54: FN: 2-aṇimādisiddhilābhāllīlādyarthaṃ yogamahimnā vyāghraśarīraṃ kṛtvā tadābhimānītyarthaḥ atredaṃ bodhyam avayavopacayāpacayātmake bālye sthāvire vā na śarīrabhedaḥ siddhyati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:69: tasmādidaṅkārāspadebhyo dehendriyamanobuddhiviṣayebhyo vyāvṛttaḥ sphuṭatarāhamanubhavagamya ātmā saṃśayābhāvādajijñāsya iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:79: na ca 'aham'iti sarvajanīnasphuṭatarānubhavasamarthita ātmā dehendriyādivyatiriktaḥ śakya upaniṣadāṃ sahasrairapyanyathayitum,
GSP33brsvbh1u:82: tasmādanubhavavirodhādupacaritārthā evopaniṣada iti yuktamutpaśyāma ityāśayavānāśaṅkya pariharati-yuṣmadasmatpratyayagocarayoḥ iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:90: FN: 2-idaṃśabdasya parākpratipādakatvāviśeṣe 'pi ete vayamityādi pracuraprayogavaśānmukhyavadbhānaṃ bhavatīti tattatra nirūḍhamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:98: FN: 3-samudācarantyau bhedena jñāyamāne vṛttī vartane yayoste tathā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:104: FN: 4-itarasyetaratra bhāva iti yojane siddhasya saṃsargādhyāsaniṣedhasya sādhanaṃ bhavettadanenāpahṛtaṃ boddhavyam / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:112: yathā kusumādbhedena gṛhyamāṇe 'pi sphaṭikamaṇāvatisvacchatayā japākusumapratibimbodgrāhiṇyaruṇaḥ sphaṭikaityāruṇyavibhrama ityata uktam-taddharmāṇāmapīti
GSP33brsvbh1u:114: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-rūpavaddhi dravyamatisvacchatayā rūpavato dravyāntarasya tadvivekena gṛhyamāṇasyāpi cchāyāṃ gṛhṇīyāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:128: mithyeti bhavituṃ yuktaṃ yadyapi tathāpīti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:134: parāmarśo madhye nirdeśaḥ upasaṃhāraśca sāmānyena kathitasya viśeṣe niyamanam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:137: annena śuṅgena sanmūlamanvicchetyādi nirdiśya 'sa ya eṣo 'ṇimaitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo'ityupasaṃhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:143: tasmāt brahmaṇo 'vatārāya yatkiñcidvyāhartavyamiti tadvyāhṛtamiti suvacamato niṣprapañcātmatattvapratipādakānyevaitānīti dik / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:144: parāmarśopasaṃhāraiḥ kriyāsamabhihāreṇedṛgātmatattvamabhidadhati tatparāṇi santi śakyāni śakreṇāpyupacaritārthāni kartum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:145: abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati yathāho darśanīyāho darśanīyeti na nyūnatvaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:163: na hyāgamajñānaṃ sāṃvyavahārikaṃ pratyakṣasya prāmāṇyamupahanti yena kāraṇābhāvānna bhavedapi tu tāttvikam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:166: tathā ca varṇe hrasvatvadīrghatvādayo 'nyadharmā api samāropitāḥ tattvapratipattihetavaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:167: na hi laukikāḥ 'nāgaḥ'iti vā“nagaḥ“iti vā padātkuñcaraṃ vā taruṃ vā pratipadyamānā bhavanti bhrāntāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:173: paro lakṣyaḥ śabdārtho na bhavatīti śābarabhāṣye siddhāntitam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:175: 'tattvamasi'ityādau ca jīvabrahmaṇoraikyaṃ bruvatāṃ mate bhāgalakṣaṇāṅgīkārānnaitadyuktamiti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:177: tattulyaṃ vā tātparyavadvākyaṃ yatkiñcudanugrahārthamanyaparaṃ na netuṃ śakyamityarthe tātparyāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:180: jyeṣṭhatvaṃ ca anapekṣitasya bādhyatve hetuḥ na tu bādhakatve,
GSP33brsvbh1u:189: FN: 4-jyotiṣṭome 'nyonyaṃ saṃbadhya yajñaśālāto nirgacchatāmṛtvijāṃ vicchedanimittaṃ prāyaścittaṃ śrūyate 'yadyudgātāpacchidyetādakṣiṇena yajeta,
GSP33brsvbh1u:191: viruddhaprāyaścittayoḥ samuccayāsaṃbhavāt kiṃ pūrvaṃ kāryamuta paramiti saṃdehe rāddhāntaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:198: api ca ye 'pyahaṅkārāspadamātmānamāsthiṣata tairapyasya na tāttvikatvamabhyupetavyam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:201: na cedaṃ dehasya prādeśikatvamanubhūyate na tvātmana iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:204: api ca paraśabdaḥ paratra lakṣyamāṇaguṇayogena vartata iti yatra prayoktṛpratipatroḥ saṃpratipattiḥ sa gauṇaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:207: FN: 6-'yadagnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyaṃ juhoti'ityagnerheme devatāprakhyāpanādatra agnihotrakarmanāmadheyamagnihotrapadamityarthaḥ)
GSP33brsvbh1u:209: prakaraṇāntarāvadhṛtabhede kauṇḍapāyināmayanagate karmaṇi 'māsamagmihotraṃ juhoti'(ā. 7 pā. 3 sū. 1)
GSP33brsvbh1u:211: FN: 1-prakaraṇabhedena karmabhede siddhe 'nekatra śaktyaṅgīkāre gauravādagnihotravajjuhotīti sādhyasādṛśyena gauṇa ityarthaḥ / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:214: FN: 2-niṣkṛṣya luṭhitaḥ pratibhāsito garbho 'sādhāraṇākāro yasya sa tathā tattathā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:221: nirūṭhatayā gauṇe 'pi na gauṇatvābhimānaḥ sārṣapādiṣu tailaśabdavaditi veditavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:222: tatrāpi snehāttilabhavādbhede siddha eva sārṣapādīnāṃ tailaśabdavācyatvābhimāno,
GSP33brsvbh1u:224: tatsiddhaṃ gauṇatvamubhayadarśino gauṇamukhyavivekavijñānena vyāptam tadidaṃ vyāpakaṃ vivekajñānaṃ nivartamānaṃ gauṇatāmapi nivartayatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:225: na ca bālasthaviraśarīrabhede 'pi so 'hamityekasyātmanaḥ pratisaṃdhānadehādibhyo bhede @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:230: parīkṣakā api hi vyavahārasamaye na lokasāmāmyamativartante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:232: bāhyā apyāhuḥ -'śāstracintakāḥ khalvevaṃ vivecayanti na pratipattāraḥ'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:233: tatpāriśeṣyāccidātmagocaramahaṅkāram 'ahamihāsmi sadanā'iti prayuñjāno laukikaḥ śarīrādyabhedagrahādātmanaḥ prādeśikatvamabhimanyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:235: na cāhaṅkāraprāmāṇyāya dehādivadātmāpi prādeśika iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:240: kiñca asminpakṣe avayavasamudāyo vā cetayet pratyekaṃ vāvayavāḥ?
GSP33brsvbh1u:241: pratyekaṃ cetanatvapakṣe bahūnāṃ cetanānāṃ svatantrāṇāmekavākyatābhāvādaparyāyaṃ viruddhādikkriyatayā śarīramunmathyeta,
GSP33brsvbh1u:243: samudāyasya tu caitanyayoge vṛkṇa ekasminnavayave cidātmano 'pyavayavo vṛkṇa iti na cetayet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:245: ya evāvayavo viśīrṇastadā tadabhāve na cetayet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:251: tadevamuktena krameṇāhaṃpratyaye pūtikūṣmāṇḍīkṛte bhagavatī śrutirapratyūhaṃ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvaduḥkhaśokādyātmatvamahamanubhavaprasañjitamātmano niṣeddhumarhatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:258: itiśabdasūcitaśca śarīrādyanukūlaṃ pratikūlaṃ ca prameyajātaṃ pramāya pramāṇena tadupādānaparivarjanādiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:263: atra ca adhyāsavyavahārakriyābhyāṃ yaḥ kartonnītaḥ sa samāna iti samānakartṛkatvenādhyasya vyavahāra ityupapannam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:267: tadevamadhyāsasvarūpaṃ phalaṃ ca vyavahāramuktvā tasya nimittamāha-itaretarāvivekena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:271: paramārthato dharmiṇoratādātmyaṃ viveko dharmāṇāṃ cāsaṃkīrṇatā vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:275: iha tu paramārthasataścidātmano 'tyantabhinnaṃ na dehādyasti vastusat,
GSP33brsvbh1u:276: tatkutaścidātmano bhedāgrahaḥ kutaśca tādātmyavibhramaḥ ityata āha-satyānṛte mithunīkṛtya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:283: na ca saṃvṛtiparamārthasatoḥ pāramārthakaṃ mithunamastītyabhūtatadbhāvārthasya cveḥ prayogaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:284: etaduktaṃ bhavati - apratītasyāropāyogādāropyasya pratītirupayujyate na vastusatteti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:286: āropyasya pratītau satyāṃ pūrvadṛṣṭasya samāropaḥ samāropanibandhanā ca pratītiriti durvāraṃ parasparāśrayatvamityata āha-naisargika iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:294: prakāśamānatvameva hi cidātmano 'pi sattvaṃ na tu tadatiriktaṃ sattāsāmānyasamavāyor'thakriyākāritā vā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:304: samādhātā lokasiddhamadhyāsalakṣaṇamācakṣāṇa evākṣepaṃ pratikṣipati-ucyate-smṛtirūpaḥ paratra pūrvadṛṣṭāvabhāsa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:311: tasya ca dṛṣṭatvamātramupayujyate na vastusatteti dṛṣṭagrahaṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:312: tathāpi vartamānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ darśanaṃ nāropopayogīti pūrvetyuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:320: asti hi svastimatyāṃ gavi pūrvadṛṣṭasya gotvasya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:324: pūrvaṃ tu pūrvadṛṣṭasya paratra dharmyadhyāsamabhipretyeti jñeyam @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:325: ca pāṭaliputre pūrvadṛṣṭasya devadattasya paratra māhiṣmatyāmavabhāsaḥ samīcīnaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:327: FN: 2-nanu avamato bhāso 'vabhāsa iti vyutpādayam kathamudāhṛtasthalādāvativyāptimāheti vadantaṃ pratyāha-avabhāsapadaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:329: na ca pūrvadṛṣṭapadenānirvācyānṛtamuktamityuktatvānna tatrātivyāptikathanaṃ saṃgacchata iti vācyam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:332: yathā nīlasyāvabhāsaḥ pītasyāvabhāsa ityata āha-smṛtirūpa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:347: asaṃbandhāgrahaṇasārūpyeṇapītaṃ tapanīyapiṇḍaṃpītaṃ bilvaphalamityādau pūrvadṛṣṭaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ pītatvaśaṅkhatvayorāropyāhapītaḥ śaṅkhaiti
GSP33brsvbh1u:349: evaṃ vijñātṛpuruṣābhimukheṣvādarśodakādiṣu svaccheṣu cākṣuṣaṃ tejo lagnamapi balīyasā sauryeṇa tejasā pratisrotaḥ pravartitaṃ mukhasaṃyuktaṃ mukhaṃ grāhayat,
GSP33brsvbh1u:352: FN: 2-pūrvadṛṣṭayorabhimukhayoḥ ādarthodakayordeśa eva deśo yasya tasya bhāvastattā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:354: darśodakadeśatāmābhimukhyaṃ ca mukhasyāropayatīti pratibimbavibhramo 'pi lakṣito bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:358: na hi sarpādibhāvena rajjvādayo vā sphaṭikādayo vā raktādiguṇayogino na pratibhāsante,
GSP33brsvbh1u:364: na ca marīcirūpeṇa salilamavastusatsvarūpeṇa tu paramārthasadeva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:365: dehendriyādayastu svarūpeṇāpyasanta ityanubhavāgocaratvātkathamāropyanta iti sāṃpratamyato yadyasan nānubhavagocarāḥ kathaṃ tarhi marīcyādīnāmasatāṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:366: na ca svarūpasattvena toyādyātmanāpi santo bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:368: api tu bhāva eva bhāvāntarātmanā abhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa tu bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:370: FN: 3-yathā iha ghaṭo nāstītyādau kevalabhūtalādhikaraṇasvarūpatvaṃ ghaṭābhāvasya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:372: tathā jalarūpeṇa marīcīnāmasattvaṃ yat tanmarīcaya eva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:387: viṣayasya samastasāmarthyavirahe 'pi jñānameva tattādṛśaṃ svapratyayasāmarthyāsāditādṛṣṭāntasiddhasvabhāvabhedamupajātamasataḥ prakāśanaṃ, tasmāda
GSP33brsvbh1u:388: FN: 6-bauddhānāṃ mate 'vidyayāsatprakāśakamiti cet vā hi asatprakāśanaśaktirjñānasya saivā vadyetyarthaḥ / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:399: śaktijñāpyaṃ punaḥ kasmānnabhavediti cet śaktijñāpyatvaṃ śaktiniṣṭhajñāpakatānirūpitajñāpyatāśālitvaṃ vaktavyam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:402: FN: 8-atha vaktavyaṃ jñānāntaramupalabhata iti tathāpi tasyāpi jñāpakatvena jñānāntarāpekṣāyāmanavasthāpāta ityarthaḥ / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:406: asadadhīnanirūpaṇatvaṃ sato jñānasyāsatā saṃbandha iti cet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:410: asadantareṇa pratyayo na prathata iti pratyayasyaivaiṣa svabhāvo na tvasadadhīnamasya kiñciditi cet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:412: FN: 1-avinābhāvamūlaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvo vā tatsvabhāvatvaṃ vā vaktavyam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:417: FN: 2-evaṃ sarvatra vastu sadeva bhātīti sadvādinākṣipte siddhāntyāha-atra brūma iti / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:419: tatkimidānīṃ marīcayo 'pi toyātmanā satattvā yadanubhavagocarāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:422: FN: 3-nanu sadvādinā toyātmanā marīcīnāmasattvaṃ cedaṅgīkriyeta tarhi siddhāntahāniriti cenna,
GSP33brsvbh1u:426: dvividhaṃ ca vastūnāṃ tattvaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:430: vastuni jñāyate kiñcidrūpaṃ kaiścitkadā ca na //
GSP33brsvbh1u:436: tathā ca samīcīna iti na bhrānto nāpi bādhyeta / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:441: addhā na bādhyeta yadi marīcīnatoyātmatattvānatoyātmanā gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:444: FN: 6-anirvacanīyakhyātivādī pratyāha-yatpunarāropita bhāvāntaratoyātmanā marīcayo bhāsanta ityavādīḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:450: FN: 7-na satkiṃ tu asadeveti cettātkiṃ tucchaṃ vā sadbhinnaṃ veti vaktavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:454: vastvantarameva hi vastvantarasyāsattvamāsthīyate 'bhāvāntaramabhāvo 'nyo na kaścidanirūpaṇāt'iti vadadbhiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:472: tattvatastu na toyaṃ na ca pūrvadṛṣṭaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:475: apūrvo 'pi pūrvamithyāpratyayopadarśita iva paratra cidātmanyadhyasyata iti upapannam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:481: na tu tadatiriktaṃ sattāsāmānyasamavāyor'thakriyākāritā veti sarvamavadātam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:483: tadbhede paraṃ vipratipattirityanirvacanīyatāṃ draḍhayitumāha-taṃ kecidanyatrānyadharmādhyāsa iti vadanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:490: vijñānavādināmapi yadyapi na bāhyaṃ vastu sat,
GSP33brsvbh1u:495: FN: 1-ayaṃ bhāvaḥ-idaṃ rajatamityatra rajatānuyogikaṃ idantvapratiyogikaṃ tādātmyaṃ bhāsate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:501: tasmānnedaṃ rajatamityatra raḍate bhāsamānā idantaiva bādhitā bhavenna punā rajatamapīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:502: tathā caitanmate ahaṃ rajatamiti pratyayaḥ prameti bhāvaḥ / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:503: nedaṃ rajatamiti ca bādhakasyedantāmātrabādhenopapattau na rajatagocaratocitā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:504: rajatasya dharmiṇo bhādhe hi rajataṃ ca tasya ca dharma idantā bādhite bhavetām,
GSP33brsvbh1u:505: tadvaramidantaivāsya dharmo bādhyatām na punā rajatamapi dharmi,
GSP33brsvbh1u:506: tathā ca rajataṃ bahirbādhitamarthādāntare jñāne vyavatiṣṭhata iti jñānākārasya bahiradhyāsaḥ sidhyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:524: kiṃ purovarti dravyaṃ rajatādvidhecayatyāhosmin jñānākāratāmapyasya darśayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:525: tatra jñānākāratopadarśanavyāpāraṃ bādhakapratyayasya bruvāṇaḥ ślāghanīyaprajño devānāṃ priyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:531: FN: 4-yaduktaṃ bahirbādhitamarthāntare vyavatiṣṭhata iti tadapyannathopapadyata ityāha-asaṃnidhāneti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:540: na ca rajatameva śuktikāyāṃ prasañjitaṃ rajatajñānena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:556: FN: 10-idaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ na mithyetyāha-api ceti / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:557: api cendriyādīnāṃ samīcīnajñānopajanane sāmarthyamupalabdhamiti kathamebhyo mithyājñānasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:563: FN: 11-sarvajñānānāṃ samīcīnatve udāhṛtasthale bhrama eva na syāditi cettatra svamatamāha-tathā ceti / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:565: idam iti ca dve vijñāne smṛtyanubhavarūpe,
GSP33brsvbh1u:568: tanmātraṃ ca gṛhītaṃ sadṛśatayā saṃskārodbodhakrameṇa rajate smṛtiṃ janayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:573: tathā ca rajatasamṛteḥ purovartidravyamātragrahaṇasya ca mithaḥ svarūpato viṣayataśca bhedāgrahāt, saṃnihita @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:575: atraivaṃ tajjñānasārūpyaṃ-yathedaṃ rajatamitijñānaṃ idamo rajatasya cāsaṃsargaṃ na gṛhṇāti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:580: idaṃ rajatamiti bhinne api smaraṇagrahaṇe abhedavyavahāraṃ ca sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaṃ ca pravartayataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:583: atra hi bahirvinirgacchannayanaraśmivartinaḥ pittadravyasya kācasyeva svacchasya pītatvaṃ gṛhyate pittaṃ tu na gṛhyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:587: tadupapattau ca prācīnasya pratyayasya bhrāntatvamapi lokasiddhaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:594: yasminśuktikādau yasya rajatāderadhyāsa iti lokaprasiddhiḥ nāsāvanyathākhyātinibandhanā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:595: kintu gṛhītasya rajatādestatsmaraṇasya ca gṛhītatāṃśapramoṣeṇa gṛhītamātrasya ca yaḥ idamiti puro 'vasthitāddravyamātrāttatjñānācca vivekaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:600: atredamākūtam-asti tāvadrajatārthinorajatamidamiti pratyayātpurovartini dravye pravṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaśceti sarvajanīnam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:604: kiṃ tu grahaṇasmaraṇe eva mithaḥ svarūpato viṣayataścāgṛhītabhede,
GSP33brsvbh1u:610: tatra na tāvatsamīcīnajñānasadṛśī iti jñānaṃ samīcīnajñānavadvyavahārapravartakam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:611: na higosadṛśo gavayaḥiti jñānaṃ gavārthinaṃ gavaye pravartayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:616: tatra kimayamāropotpādakrameṇa vyavahāraheturāstvāho 'nutpāditāropa eva svata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:619: nanu satyaṃ cetanavyavahāro nājñānapūrvakaḥ kiṃ tvaviditavivekagrahaṇasmaraṇapūrvaka iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:623: kathaṃ cāyamidaṅkārāspade pravarteta yadi na tadicchet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:625: na cedidaṅkārāspadaṃ rajatamiti jānīyātkathaṃ rajatārthī tadicchet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:627: so 'yamupādānopekṣābhyāmabhita ākṛṣyamāṇaścedano 'vyavasthitaḥ itīdaṅkārāspade rajatasamāropeṇopādāna eva vyavasthāpyate iti bhedāgrahaḥ samāropotpādakrameṇa cetanapravṛttihetuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:636: FN: 2-sādhyasādhanajñātasaṃbandhasya puṃso liṅgaviśiṣṭadharmyekadeśadarśanāt liṅge viśiṣṭadharmyekadeśe buddhiranumānamiti śabarasvāminaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:642: yadyadarthinaṃ yatra niyamena pravartayati tajjñānantadviṣayaṃ yathobhayasiddhasamīcīnarajatajñānam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:647: kiṃ śuktikātvasyaidaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ pratyanālambanatvamāhosvitdravyamātrasya puraḥsthitasya sitabhāsvarasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:657: tat bodhakatvena svataḥprāmāṇyaṃ nāvyabhicāreṇeti vyutpādayadbhirasmābhiḥ parihṛtaṃ nyāya @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:658: FN: 3-vyabhicāriṇāmapi sitanīlādiṣu cakṣurādīnāṃ bodhakatvena prāmāṇyamityā de tatroktam / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:662: tadidamuktam-'anye tu yatra yadadhyāsastasyaiva viparītadharmatvakalpanāmācakṣate iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:663: 'yatra śuktikādau yasya rajatāderadhyāsastasyaiva śuktikāderviparītadharmakalpanāṃ rajatatvadharmakalpanāmiti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:665: prakṛte tu kimāyātamityatāha-sarvathāpi tvanyasyānyadharmakalpanāṃ na vyabhicarati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:670: tena sarveṣāmeva parīkṣakāṇāṃ mato 'nyasyānyadharmakalpanānirvacanīyāvaśyaṃbhāvinītyanirvacanīyatā sarvatantrasiddhānta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:673: api tu laukikānāmapītyāha-tathā ca loke 'nubhavaḥ--śuktikā hi rajatavadavabhāsata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:677: ekasya tvabhinnasya bhedabhramo na dṛṣṭa iti kutaścidātmano 'bhinnānāṃ jīvānāṃ bhedavibhrama ityatāha-ekaścandraḥ sadvitīyavaditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:681: na khalvapratibhāsamāne purovartini dravye rajatasya vā taddharmāṇāṃ vā samāropaḥ saṃbhavatiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:684: na khalu sa eva kartā ca karma ca bhavati, virodhāt / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:685: FN: 2-dhātvarthatāvacchedakaphalaśālitvaṃ karmatvamityukte gacchatītyādau saṃyogaphalasya grāma iva caitre 'pi samavetatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:689: na ca jñānakriyā parasamavāyinīti kathamasyāṃ karma,
GSP33brsvbh1u:690: na ca tadeva svaṃ ca paraṃ ca, virodhāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:694: ātmā jaḍo 'pi sarvārthajñāneṣu bhāsamāno 'pi kartaiva na karma,
GSP33brsvbh1u:696: yathā hi caitrasamavetakriyayā caitranagaraprāptāvubhayasamavetāyāmapi kriyamāṇāyāṃ nagarasyaiva karmatā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:701: śrūyate hi 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma'iti upapadyate ca,
GSP33brsvbh1u:702: tathā hi-yo 'yamarthaprakāśaḥ phalaṃ yasminnarthaśca ātmā ca prathete sa kiṃ jaḍaḥ svayaṃprakāśo vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:714: ātmā jaḍaḥ kiṃ na syāditivādinaṃ ātmasvaprakāśavādyāha---tathāpīti / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:717: FN: 1-arthātmasaṃbandhinyāṃ saṃvidyajaḍāyāmapi nārthātmanoḥ prakāśamānatāsiddhiḥ paṇḍite 'pi putre piturapāṇḍityavadityāha---tatkimiti / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:718: tatkiṃ putraḥ paṇḍita iti pitāpi paṇḍito 'stu /
GSP33brsvbh1u:719: svabhāva eṣa saṃvidaḥ svayaṃprakāśāyā yadarthātmasaṃbandhiteti cet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:720: hanta putrasyāpi paṇḍitasya svabhāva eṣa yatpitṛsaṃbandhiteti @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:721: FN: 2-yathā svabhāvasaṃbaddhā saṃvit tathā pitṛgatajanakatvasaṃbaddhaṃ putragatajanyatvamiti bhāvaḥ / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:723: sahārthātmaprakāśena saṃvitprakāśo na tvarthātmaprakāśaṃ vineti tasyāḥ svabhāva iti cet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:731: evaṃ cet yāvaduktaṃ bhavati saṃvitātmārthau saheti tāvaduktaṃ bhavati saṃvidarthātmaprakāśau saheti, @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:732: FN: 4-saṃvidatiriktaprakāśānaṅgīkāre saṃvidarthātmānau saha prakāśata ityuktaṃ syāt tathā coktaputrapāṇḍityanyāyaprasaraḥ / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:744: na ca prakāśasyātmāno viṣayāḥte hi vicchinnadīrghasthūlatayānubhūyante,
GSP33brsvbh1u:747: tasmāccandre 'nubhūyamāne iva dvitīyaścandramāḥ svaprakāśādanyor'thaḥ anirvacanīya eveti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:752: na ca anirvācyārthabhedaḥ prakāśaṃ nirvācyaṃ bhettumarhati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:754: na ca arthānāmapi parasparaṃ bhedaḥ samīcīnajñānapaddhatimadhyāste ityupariṣṭādupapādayiṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:755: tadayaṃ prakāśa eva svayaṃprakāśa ekaḥ kūṭasthanityo niraṃśaḥ pratyagātmāśakyanirvacanīyebhyo
GSP33brsvbh1u:756: dehendriyādibhya ātmānaṃ pratīpaṃ nirvacanīyamañcati jānātīti pratyaṅ sa cātmeti pratyagātmā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:763: kasmādayamayukta ityata āha-sarvo hi puro 'vasthite viṣaye viṣayāntaramadhyasyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:764: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yatparādhīnaprakāśamaṃśavacca tatsāmānyāṃśagrahe kāraṇadoṣavaśācca viśeṣāgrahe 'nyathā prakāśate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:770: nahi tadeva tadānīmeva tenaiva gṛhītamagṛhītaṃ ca saṃbhavatīti na svayaṃprakāśapakṣe 'dhyāsaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:772: FN: 9-śukteriva ekasyaiva vastunaḥ grahaṇāgrahaṇe siddhe kimityaupādhikaṃ viṣayatvaṃ sādhyata iti cet sāṃśasya tathā syāt ātmanastu niraṃśatvānna tathetyāha----nahīti / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:773: na hi śuktau apuraḥsthitāyāṃ rajatamadhyasyatīdaṃ rajatamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:774: tasmādatyantagrahe atyantāgrahe ca nādhyāsa iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:778: tatkathaṃ nādhyāsa ityata āha-yuṣmatpratyayāpetasya ca pratyagātmano 'viṣayatvaṃ bravīṣi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:780: tathā ca yo viṣayī sa eva cidātmā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:787: tathāpi anirvacanīyānādyavidyāparikalpitabuddhimanaḥ sūkṣmasthūlaśarīrendriyāvacchedakabhedenānavacchinno 'pi vastuto 'vacchinna iva abhinno 'pi bhinna iva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:788: akartāpi karteva abhoktāpi bhokteva aviṣayo 'pyasmatpratyayaviṣaya iva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:791: na hi cidekarasasyātmanaḥ cidaṃśe gṛhīte agṛhītaṃ kiñcidasti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:794: gṛhītā eva tu kalpitena bhedena na vivecitā ityagṛhītā ivābhānti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:796: yena cidātmani gṛhyamāṇe so 'pi gṛhīto bhavet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:798: tasmāccidātmanaḥ svayaṃprakāśasyaiva anavacchinnasya avacchinnebhyo buddhyādibhyo bhedāgrahāt tadadhyāsena jīvabhāva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:800: tathā hi-kartā bhoktā cidātmā ahaṃpratyaye pratyavabhāsate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:802: yasya ca buddhyādeḥ kāryakāraṇasaṃghātasya kriyābhogaśaktī na tasya caitanyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:805: ca janturiti ca kṣetrajña iti ca ākhyāyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:809: FN: 1-yatpūrvaṃ karmakartṛtvavirodha uktaḥ so 'pyanena parāsto veditavyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:812: na ca adhyāse sati viṣayatvaṃ viṣayatve ca adhyāsaḥ ityanyonyāśrayatvamiti sāṃpratam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:816: jīvo hi cidātmatayā svayaṃprakāśatayāviṣayo 'pyaupādhikena rūpeṇa viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:819: kintu pratyagātmā na svato nāpi parataḥ prathata ityaviṣayaḥ iti brūmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:820: tathā ca sarvathāprathamāne pratyagātmani kuto 'dhyāsa ityata āha-aparokṣatvācca pratyagātmaprasiddheḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:826: etaduktaṃ bhavati-avaśyaṃ cidātmāparokṣo 'bhyupetavyaḥ tadaprathāyāṃ sarvasyāprathanena jagadāndhyaprasaṅgādityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:827: śrutiścātra bhavati-'tameva bhāntamanu bhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:828: tadevaṃ paramārthaparihāramuktvābhyupetyāpi cidātmanaḥ parokṣatāṃ prauḍhavāditayā parihārāntaramāha-na cāyamasti niyamaḥ puro 'vasthita eva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:831: kasmādayaṃ na niyama ityata āha-apratyakṣe 'pi hyākāśe bālāstalamalinatādyadhyasanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:833: nabho hi dravyaṃ sat rūpasparśavirahānna bāhyendriyapratyakṣam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:837: atha ca tatra bālā avivekinaḥ paradarśitadarśinaḥ kadācitpārthivacchāyāṃ śyāmatāmāropya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:840: tatrāpi pūrvadṛṣṭasya taijasasya vā tāmasasya rūpasya paratra nabhasi smṛtirūpo 'vabhāsata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:845: tatkimarthamayamevādhyāsa ākṣepasamādhānābhyāṃ vyutpāditaḥ nādhyāsamātramityata āha-tametamevaṃlakṣaṇamadhyāsaṃ paṇḍitā avidyeti manyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:848: pratyagātmanyanātmādhyāsa eva sarvānarthahetuḥ na punā rajatādivibhramā iti sa evāvidyā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:849: tatsvarūpaṃ cāvijñātaṃ na śakyamucchettumiti tadeva vyutpādyaṃ nādhyāsamātram /
GSP33brsvbh1u:856: upāyābhāvāditi yo manyate taṃ prati tannirodhopāyamāha-tadvivekena ca vastusvarūpāvadhāraṇam-nirvicikitsaṃ jñānamvidyāmāhuḥ,paṇḍitāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:861: vastusvarūpāvadhāraṇaṃ vidyā cidātmarūpaṃ svarūpe vyavatiṣṭhata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:863: atinirūḍhanibiḍhavāsanānuvidvāvidyā vidyayāpabādhitāpi svavāsanāvaśātpunarudbhaviṣyati pravartayiṣyati ca vāsanādikāryaṃ svocitamityata āha-tatraivaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:865: yatra yadadhyāsastatkṛtena doṣeṇa guṇena vā aṇumātreṇāpi sa na saṃbadhyate-antaḥkaraṇādidoṣeṇāśanāyādinā cidātmā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:867: etaduktaṃ bhavati-tattvāvadhāraṇābhyāsasya hi svabhāva eva sa tādṛśaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:873: viśeṣatastu cidātmasvabhāvasya tattvajñānasyātyantāntaraṅgasya kuto 'nirvācyayāvidyayā bādha iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:875: vivekāgrahādadhyasyāhamidaṃmamedamiti lokavyavahāraiti tatra vyapadeśalakṣaṇo vyavahāraḥ kaṇṭhoktaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:883: santu vā pratyakṣādīni saṃvṛtyāpi yathā tathā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:887: ayamarthaḥ-pramātṛtvaṃ hi pramāṃ prati kartṛtvam tacca svātantryam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:894: atha mā pravartiṣata pramāṇāni kiṃ naśchinnamityata āha-na hīndriyāṇyanupādāya pratyakṣādivyavahāraḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:904: atha svayameva kasmānna pravartata ityata āha-na cādhiṣṭhānamantareṇendriyāṇāṃ vyāpāraḥ-pramāṇānāṃ vyāpāraḥsaṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:905: na jātu karaṇānyanadhiṣṭhitāni kartrā svakārye vyāpriyante,
GSP33brsvbh1u:912: evamanadhyastātmabhāvaṃ dehendriyāditi vyāpārayan bhaviṣyati tadabhijñaḥ pramātotyata āha-na caitasminsarvasmin-itaretarātmādhyāse itaretarātmādhyāse
GSP33brsvbh1u:920: pramāyāṃ khalu phale svatantraḥ pramātā bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:935: āgamopapattipratipannapratyagātmatattvānāṃ vyutpannānāmapi puṃsāṃ pramāṇaprameyavyavahārā dṛśyanta iti kathamavidyāvadviṣayāṇyeva pramāṇānītyata āha-paśvādibhiścāviśeṣāditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:938: yādṛśo hi paśuśakuntādīnāmavipratipannamugdhabhāvānāṃ vyavahārastādṛśo vyutpannānāmapi puṃsāṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:943: atra caśabdādibhiḥ śrotrādīnāṃ saṃbandhe satiiti pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ darśitam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:946: tathā hi-śabdādisvarūpamupalabhya tajjātīyasya pratikūlatāmanusmṛtya tajjātīyatayopalabhyamānasya pratikūlatāmanumimīta iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:951: śāstraṃ tu 'jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta'ityādi na dehātmādhyāsena pravartitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:955: śāstraphalaṃ śāstragamyaṃ phalaṃ prayoktari pratīyate tasmāt prayoge 'nuṣṭhāne yajamānaḥ svayaṃ kartā syāditi sūtrārthāḥ / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:956: phalaṃ prayoktari tallakṣaṇatvāttasmātsvayaṃ prayoge syāt'(ā. 3 pā. 7 sū. 18)iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:957: na ca dehādi bhasmībhūtaṃ pāralaukikāya phalāya kalpata iti dehādyatiriktaṃ kañcidātmānamadhikāriṇamākṣipati śāstram,
GSP33brsvbh1u:960: adhikāraśāstraṃ hi svargakāmasya puṃsaḥ paralokasaṃbandhaṃ vinā na nirvahatīti tāvanmātramākṣipet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:964: prayoktā hi karmaṇaḥ karmajanitaphalabhogabhāgī karmaṇyadhikārī svāmī bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:970: te tvavidyāvantamanuśāsanto nirmṛṣṭanikhilāvidyamanuśiṣṭaṃ svarūpe vyavasthāpayantītyetāvāneṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:975: tathā ca parasparāpahatārthatvena kṛtsna eva vedaḥ prāmāṇyamapajahyādityata āha-prāk ca tathābhūtātmeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:977: tasmāttu purastātkarmavidhayaḥ svocitaṃ vyavahāranirvartayanto nānupajātena brahmajñānena śakyā niroddhum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:980: yathā-'na hiṃsyātsarvā bhūtāni'iti sādhyāṃśaniṣedhe 'pi 'śyenenābhicaran yajeta'iti śāstraṃ pravartamānaṃ na hiṃsyādityanena na virudhyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:985: avidyāvatpuruṣaviṣayatvaṃ nātivartata iti yaduktaṃ tadeva sphorayati-tathāhiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:997: dehatādātmyamātmanyadhyasya dehadharmaṃ putrakalatrādisvāmyaṃ ca kṛśatvādivadāropya āha-ahameva vikalaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:999: svasya khalu sākalyena svābhyasākalyāt svāmīśvaraḥ sakalaḥ saṃpūrṇo bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1002: bāhyadharmā ye vaikalyādayaḥ svāmyapraṇālikayā saṃcaritāḥ śarīre tānātmanyadhyasyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1003: yadā ca paropādhyapekṣe dehadharme svāmye iyaṃ gatiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1004: tadā kaiva kathā anaupādhikeṣu dehadharmeṣu kṛśatvādiṣvatyāśayavānāha-tathā dehadharmāniti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1006: tato 'pyantaraṅgasyāntaḥkaraṇasya adhyastātmabhāvasya dharmān kāmasaṃkalpādīn ātmanyadhyasyatīti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1007: tadanena prapañcena dharmādhyāsamuktvā tasya mūlaṃ dharmyadhyāsamāha-evamahaṃpratyayinam-ahaṃpratyayo vṛttiryasmin antaḥkaraṇādau,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1029: virodhipratyayaṃ vinā kuto 'sya prahāṇamityaya uktam-ātmaikatvavidyāpratipattaye iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1035: etaduktaṃ bhavati-asmatpratyayasyātmaviṣayasya samīcīnatve sati brahmaṇo jñātvānniṣprayojanatvācca na jijñāsā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1036: tadabhāve ca na brahmajñānāya vedāntāḥ paṭhyeran /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1042: na hi rajjvā rajjutvaṃ sahasramapi sarpadhārāpratyayā apavadituṃ samutsahante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1047: tatkathaṃ sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāmātmaikatvapratipādanamartha ityata āha-yathā cāyamarthaḥ sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāṃ tathā vayamasyāṃ śārīrakamīmāṃsāyāṃ pradarśayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1049: tasya tvaṃpadābhidheyasya tatpadābhidheyaparamātmarūpatāmīmāṃsā yā sā tathoktā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1054: FN: 1-nanu sarvasya vedasya kāryāvabodhaparatvāt siddhe brahmaṇi vedāntānāmaprāmāṇyaṃ syāditicettatrāha---aviśiṣṭastviti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1056: mantrāṇāmiva devatādau vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi prāmāṇyaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1059: yadyapi ca vedāntebhyaścaitanyānandaghanaḥ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvarahito niṣprapañca ekaḥ pratyagātmā avagamyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1061: virudhyamānā vedāntāḥ svārthātpracyutā upacaritārthā vā japamātropayogino vetyavivakṣitasvārthāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1062: tathā ca tadarthavicārātmikā caturlakṣaṇī śārīrakamīmāṃsā nārabdhavyā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1063: na ca sarvajanīnāhamanubhavasiddha ātmā saṃdigdho vā saprayojano vā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1064: yena jijñāsyaḥ san vicāraṃ prayuñjīteḥiti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1072: tasya ca vakṣyamāṇena krameṇa saṃdigdhatvāt prayojanavatvācca yuktā jijñāsā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1080: kintu brahmamīmāṃsākhyatarketikartavyatānujñātaviṣayairvedāntairāhitaṃ nirvicikitsaṃ brahmajñānameva samastaduḥkhopaśamarūpamānandaikarasaṃ paramaṃ naḥ prayojanam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1083: yathā svagrīvāgatamapi graiveyakaṃ kutaścidbhramānnāstīti manyamānaḥ pareṇa pratipāditamaprāptamiva prāpnoti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1084: jijñāsā tu saṃśayasya kāryamiti svakāraṇaṃ saṃśayaṃ sūcayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1086: tathā ca śāstre prekṣāvatpravṛttihetusaṃśayaprayojanasūcanāt yuktamasya sūtrasya śāstrāditvamityāha bhagavānbhāṣyakāraḥvedāntamīmāṃsāśāstrasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:1091: sā hyanena śiṣyate śiṣyebhyo yathāvatpratipādyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1099: tadevaṃ sūtratātparyaṃ vyākhyāya tasya prathamapadaṃ atheti vyācaṣṭe-tatrāthaśabda ānantaryārthaḥ parigṛhyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1100: teṣu sūtrapadeṣu madhye yo 'yaṃ athaśabdaḥ sa ānantaryārtha iti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1106: jijñāsā tāvadiha sūtre brahmaṇaśca tatprajjñānācca śabdataḥ @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1107: FN: 1-nanu jijñāsāyāḥ śāstreṇāpratipādyamānatvāt tatpratipādanārtho mā bhūdathaśabdaḥ brahmatajjñānaprārambhārthastu syāditi cenna /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1109: atra hi pratyayānāṃ prakṛtyarthānvitasvārtabodhajanakatvāt brahmajñānaviṣayiṇī icchaiva pradhānaṃ tatra ca nānvayaḥ saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1112: FN: 2-apradhānabrahmatajjñānaprārambhārtho bhavatu yathā 'daṇḍau praiṣānanvāha'ityatra apradhānadaṇḍaḥ vivakṣyata iticenna /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1113: tatrahi 'maitrāvaruṇaḥ praiṣyeti cānvāha'iti mantreṇa prāpte praiṣānuvacane na vidhyanvayitvena vivakṣā kintu aprāpte 'pradhāne 'pi daṇḍagrahaṇe
GSP33brsvbh1u:1118: tadavivakṣāyāṃ tadasūcanena kākadantaparīkṣāyāmiva brahmamīmāṃsāyāṃ na prekṣāvantaḥ pravarteran /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1119: na hi tadānīṃ brahma vā tajjñānaṃ vābhidheyaprayojane bhavitumarhataḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1121: karmapravṛttyupayogitayā upacaritārthānāṃ vā japopayogināṃ vā 'hum phaḍ'ityevamādīnāmivāvivakṣitārthānāmapi svādhyāyādhyayanavidhyadhīnagrahaṇatvasya saṃbhavāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1122: tasmātsaṃdehaprayojanasūcanī jijñāsā iha padato vākyataśca pradhānaṃ vivakṣitavyā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1131: nāntatvaṃ nipātya 'māṅ māne'ityasmādvā 'mānapūjāyām'ityasmādvā dhātoḥ 'mānbadha-'ityādinānicchārthe sani vyutpāditasya mīmāṃsāśabdasya pūjitavicāra
GSP33brsvbh1u:1140: na ca svārthaparatvasyopapattau satyāṃ anyārthaparatvakalpanā yuktā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1144: tathā ca maṅgalahetutvāt pratyahaṃ brahmajijñāsā kartavyeti sūtrārthaḥ saṃpadyata ityata āha-maṅgalasya ca vākyārthe samanvayābhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1146: sa ca vācyo vā lakṣyo vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1147: na ceha maṅgalamathaśabdasya vācyaṃ vā lakṣyaṃ vā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1149: na ca kāryajñāpyayorvākyārthe samanvayaḥ śabdavyavahāre dṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1150: tatkimidānīṃ maṅgalārtho 'thaśabdaḥ teṣu teṣu na prayoktavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1153: 'iti smṛtivyākopa ityata āha-arthāntaraprayukta eva hyathaśabdaḥ śrutyā maṅgalaprayojano bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1154: arthāntareṣvānantaryādiṣu prayukto 'thaśabdaḥ śrutyā śravaṇamātreṇa veṇuvīṇādhvanivanmaṅgalaṃ kurvan,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1158: na cehānantaryārthasya sato na śravaṇamātreṇa maṅgalārthatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1161: tadyathemamevāthaśabdaṃ prakṛtya vimṛśyate kimayamathaśabda ānantarye athādhikāreḥiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1167: na hi jātu bhavati kiṃ nitya ātmā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1169: tasmādānantaryaṃ vinā pūrvaprakṛtāpekṣa ihāthaśabdaḥ kasmānna bhavatītyata āhapūrvaprakṛtāpekṣāyāśca phalata ānantaryāvyatirekāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1172: sā ca pūrvaprakṛtārthāpekṣatve 'pyathaśabdasya sidhyatīti vyarthaṃ ānantaryārthatvāvadhāraṇāgraho 'smākamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1175: na ceha kalpāntaropanyāsa iti pāriśeṣyādānantaryārthaṃ eveti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1181: na cānantaryamātrasya dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā prayojanaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1182: tasmāttasyātrānantaryaṃ vaktavyaṃ yadvinā brahmajijñāsā na bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1186: dharmajijñāsāyā iva brahmajijñāsāyā api yogyatvāt svādhyāyā @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1193: tasmādvedādhyayanānantaryameva brahmajijñāsāyā apyathaśabdārtha ityata āha-svādhyāyānantaryaṃ tu samānaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1195: atra ca svādhyāyena viṣayeṇa tadviṣayamadhyayanaṃ lakṣayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1196: tathā ca 'athāto dharmajijñāsā'ityanenaiva gatamiti nedaṃ sūtramārabdhavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1202: asyārthaḥ-'vividiṣanti yajñena'iti tṛtīyāśrutyā yajñādīnāmaṅgatvena brahmajñāne viniyogāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1207: na ca vākyaṃ sahakāritayā karmāṇyapekṣata iti yuktam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1212: tasmin sati tadarthānuṣṭhānaparivarjanaṃ tataśca tadbodha iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1213: na ca vedāntavākyānāmeva svārthapratyāyane karmāpekṣā na vākyāntarāṇāmiti sāṃpratam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1216: kartṛbhoktṛrūpasya jīvātmano nityaśuddhabuddhodāsīnasvabhāvena tatpadārthena paramātmanaikyamaśakyaṃ drāgityeva pratipattuṃ āpātato 'śuddhasattvairyogyatāvirahaviniścayāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:1221: tasmāt 'tattvamasi'ityādeḥ śrutamayena jñānena jīvātmanaḥ paramātmabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1228: ata eva śrutiḥ-'tameva dhīro vijñāya prajñāṃ kurvīta brāhmaṇaḥ' /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1230: vijñāya tarkopakaraṇena śabdena prajñāṃ bhāvanāṃ kurvītetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1233: yajñādisaṃskṛto hi puruṣaḥ ādaranairantaryadīrghakālairāsevamāno brahmabhāvanāmanādyavidyāvāsanāṃ samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1235: ata eva smṛtiḥ-'mahāyajñaiśca yajñaiśca brāhmīyaṃ kriyate tanuḥ' /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1238: asti hi smṛtiḥ-'ṛṇāni trīṇyapākṛtya mano mokṣe niveśayet' /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1240: anye tu 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena'ityādiśrutibhyastattatphalāya coditānāmapi karmaṇāṃ saṃyogapṛthaktvena brahmabhāvanāṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1242: FN: 2-'khādire paśuṃ badhnāti' 'khādiraṃ vīryakāmasya yūpaṃ kurvīta'iti ekasyaiva
GSP33brsvbh1u:1243: khādiratvasya kratvarthatvaṃ puruṣārthatvaṃ ca yathā tathā karmaṇāmapi ubhayārthatvaṃ syādityarthaḥ / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1246: atra ca pāramarṣaṃ sūtram-'sarvāpekṣā ca yajñādiśruteraśvavat' (bra. a. 3. pā. 4 sū. 26) iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1249: tasmādyadi śrutyādayaḥ pramāṇaṃ yadi vā pāramarṣaṃ sūtraṃ sarvathā yajñādikarmasamuccitā brahmopāsanā viśeṣaṇa @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1251: trayavatī anādyavidyātadvāsanāsamucchedakrameṇa brahmasākṣātkārāya mokṣāparanāmne kalpata iti tadarthaṃ karmāṇyanuṣṭheyāni /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1257: teṣāṃ grāmaḥ samūhastatsahitaṃ parasparavibhinnaṃ karmasvarūpaṃ tadapekṣitādhikārīviśeṣaśca
GSP33brsvbh1u:1265: tasmātsādhūktam 'karmāvabodhānantaryaṃ viśeṣaḥ'iti karmāvabodhena hi karmānuṣṭhānasāhityaṃ bhavati brahmopāsanāyā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1270: kiṃ kārye yathāgneyādīnāṃ paramāpūrve cirabhāviphalānukūle janayitavye samidādyapekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1275: FN: 1-bhāvanāsādhye sākṣātkāre yadi karmāpekṣā tarhi sa brahmasvarūpo na syāt tasyotpatsyamānatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1280: FN: 2-'piṣṭaṃ saṃyauti'iti vihitasya saṃyavanasya piṇḍa utpādyaḥ / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1286: na khalu ghaṭādisākṣātkāra iva jaḍasvabhāvebhyo ghaṭādibhyo bhinna indriyādyādheyo brahmasākṣātkāro bhāvanādheyaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1289: FN: 3-sākṣātkārasya brahmaṇo bhinnatve brahma jaḍaṃ syāt śabdaśca parokṣapramāheturiti kevalabhāvanādheyaḥ sākṣātkāro 'pramā syāditi bhāvaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1292: na khalvanumānāvibuddhaṃ vahniṃ bhāvayataḥ śītāturasya śiśirabharamantharatarakāyakāṇḍasya sphurajjvālājaṭilānalasākṣātkāraḥ pramāṇāntareṇa
GSP33brsvbh1u:1311: etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ-pratisīrāpanaye pāriṣadānāṃ nartakīviṣayaḥ sākṣātkāro bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1322: na hi sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti vā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1323: ārohapariṇāhavat dravyamiti vā śataśo 'pi jñānamabhyasyamānaṃ puruṣa eveti niścayāya paryāptam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1325: nanūktaṃ śrutamayena jñānena jīvātmanaḥ paramātmabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā yuktimayena ca vyavasthāpyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1338: antaḥkaraṇaṃ ca sopādhike ātmani janayatyahaṃvṛttimiti tasya siddhamaparokṣadhīhetutvam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1339: tacca śābdabrahmaikyadhīsaṃtativāsitaṃ jīvasya tatpadalakṣaṇabrahmātmatāṃ sākṣātkārayatītyāśayavānāha-na caiṣa iti / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1340: na caiṣa sākṣātkāro mīmāṃsāsahitasyāpi śabdapramāṇasya phalam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1345: na cāyamanubhavo brahmasvabhāvo yena na janyeta,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1348: na hi śābdajñānaprakāśyaṃ brahma svayaṃ prakāśaṃ na bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1360: anyathā caitanyacchāyāpattiṃ vināntaḥkaraṇavṛtteḥ svayamacetanāyāḥ svaprakāśatvānupapattau sākṣātkāratvāyogāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1365: FN: 10-jīvasya prāgaparokṣatve 'pi śuddhabuddhatvādeḥ pārokṣyānna tatsākṣātkāro yathārthaṃ ityāśaṅkyāha-nahīti / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1367: jīva eva tu tattadupādhirahitaḥ śuddhabuddhatvādisvabhāvo brahmeti gīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1372: antaḥkaraṇavṛttau brahmasākṣātkāre janayitavye asti tadupāsanāyāḥ karmāpekṣeti cet @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1382: yadyucyeta niścite 'pi tattve viparyāsanibandhano vyavahāro 'nuvartamāno dṛśyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1383: yathā guḍasya mādhuryaviniścaye api pittopahatendriyāṇāṃ tiktatāvabhāsānuvṛttiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1388: karmaṇo vā taducchedakasya kuta ucchedaḥ iti vācyam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1394: yathā vā katakarajo rajo 'ntarāvile pāthasi prakṣiptaṃ rajo 'ntarāṇi bhindat svayamapi bhidyamānamanāvilaṃ pāthaḥ karoti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1400: pittopahatendriya iva guḍaṃ thūtkṛtya tyajannapi tasya tiktatām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1404: kriyākartrādisvarūpavibhāgaṃ ca vidvasyamāna iha vidvānabhimataḥ karmakāṇḍe /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1405: ata eva bhagavān vidvadviṣayatvaṃ śāstrasya varṇayāṃbabhūva bhāṣyakāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1408: na cānadhikṛtena samarthenāpi kṛtaṃ vaidika karma phalāya kalpate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1410: tena dṛṣṭārtheṣu karmasu śaktaḥ pravartamānaḥ prāpnotu phalam, dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1411: adṛṣṭārtheṣu tu śāstraikasamadhigamyaṃ phalamanadhikāriṇi na yujyata iti nopāsanākārye karmāpekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1414: evaṃ niṣedhavidhayo 'pi manuṣyādhikārā iti tadabhimānarahitasteṣvapi nādhikriyeta paśvādivat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1418: na khalvayaṃ sarvathā manuṣyābhimānarahitaḥ kiṃ tvavidyāsaṃskārānuvṛttyāsya mātrayā tadabhimāno 'nuvartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1419: anuvartamānaṃ ca mithyeti manyamāno na śraddhatta ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1425: api tu niṣidhyamānakriyonmukho nara ityeva pravartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1426: tathā ca sāṃsārika iva śabdāvagatabrahmatattvo 'pi niṣedhamatikramya pravartamānaḥ pratyavaitīti na bhinnakarmadarśanābhyupagamaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1431: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'nakarmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgenaike amṛtatvamānaśuḥ' /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1435: FN: 5-iha janmāntare karma sattvaśuddhidvāreṇa jñānotpattiheturiti siddhāntamāha ārāditi / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1440: vastutaḥ pradhānasyāpi vedanasya prakṛtyarthatayā śabdato guṇatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1443: nahi rājapuruṣamānayetyukte vastutaḥ pradhānamapi rājā puruṣaviśeṣaṇatayā śabdata upasarjana ānīyate 'pi tu puruṣa eva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1455: upadhīyate-puṇyenopacīyate iti viditvā yaḥ karma carati sa ātmaśuddhyarthaṃ yajannātmayājī sa ca devayājitaḥ kāmyakartuḥ śreyāniti śrutyarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1456: vā ātmāyājī yo veda idaṃ me 'nenāṅgaṃ saṃskriyata idaṃ me 'nenāṅgamupadhīyate'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1460: jñānottapattiṃ darśayatyātharvaṇī śrutiḥ-'viśuddhasattvastatastu taṃ paśyati niṣkalaṃ dhyāyamānaḥ'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1462: kḷptenaiva ca nityānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nityehitenopāttaduritanibarhaṇadvāreṇa puruṣasaṃskāreṇa jñānotpattāvaṅgabhāvopapattau na saṃyoga @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1463: FN: 2-idamatra bodhyam-saṃyogapṛthaktvenāṅgabhāve siddhe 'pi na samuccayavādyabhimataḥ sākṣādaṅgabhāvo yuktaḥ api tu paraṃparayā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1465: yathā prakṛtau kḷptopakārāṇāṃ vikṛtau tadatiriktopakārakalpane gauravaṃ tathā jñāne
GSP33brsvbh1u:1466: viniyuktayajñādīnāṃ kḷptapāpakṣayātiriktakalpane gauravāpatterna samuccayaḥ kalpanīya ityāśayaḥ / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1471: sa hi anityāśuciduḥkharūpe saṃsāre nityaśucisukhakhyātilakṣaṇena viparyāsena cittasattvaṃ malinayati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1472: tataḥ pāpanivṛttau pratyakṣopapattipravṛttidvārāpāvaraṇe sati pratyakṣopapattibhyāṃ saṃsārasya anityāśuciduḥkharūpatāmapratyūhamavabudhyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1477: tataḥ śravaṇādikrameṇa tajjñānātītyārādupakārakatvaṃ tattvajñānotpādaṃ prati cittasattvaśuddhyā karmaṇāṃ yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1480: evaṃ cānanuṣṭhitakarmāpi prāgbhavīyakarmavaśāt yo viśuddhasattvaḥ saṃsārāsāratādarśanena niṣpannavairāgyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1483: imameva ca puruṣadhaureyabhedamadhikṛtya pravavṛte śrutiḥ-'yadi vetarathā brahmacaryādeva pravrajet'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1485: ata eva na brahmacāriṇa ṛṇāni santi,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1487: etadanurodhācca 'jāyamāno vai brāhmaṇastribhirṛṇavā jāyate'iti gṛhasthaḥ saṃpadyamāna iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1493: yadvinā brahmajijñāsā na bhavati yasmiṃstu sati bhavantī bhavatyeva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1494: na cetthaṃ karmāvabodhaḥ tasmānna karmāvabodhānantaryamātrāthaśabdārtha iti sarvamavadātam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1499: anyadravyānayane śrutavaiyarthyāt dṛṣṭaprayojane ārādupakārakatvasyānyāyyatvāt 'arthācca'yavāgūṃ paktvā juhotīti kramaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1503: 'gṛhī bhūtvā vanī bhavet vanī bhūtvā pravrajet'iti jābālaśrutirgārhasthyena hi yajñādyanuṣṭhānaṃ sūcayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1505: iṣṭā ca śaktito yajñairmano mokṣe niveśayet //
GSP33brsvbh1u:1509: kutaḥ, 'hṛdayasyāgre 'vadyati atha jihvāyā atha vakṣasaḥ'ityathāgraśabdābhyāṃ kramasya vivakṣitatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1526: tatra ekakālatvalakṣaṇasahatvasyāsaṃbhavāt sthānātsavanīyaprāthamyaṃ niyamyata ityayaṃ sthānakramaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1527: 'sārasvatau bhavata etadvai daivyaṃ mithunaṃ yatsarasvatī sarasvāṃśca'iti yugapatkarmadvayaṃ śrūyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1528: atra prathamaṃ sarasvatīdaivatasya yājyānuvākyāyugalaṃ paṭhyato tato sarasvaddaivatasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1529: tasmādetatkrameṇa karmadvayakrama iti jñāyate mantrāṇāṃ prayogaśeṣatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1530: aṅgaviśeṣanirvāpādīnāṃ kramākāṅkṣāyāṃ mukhyakrameṇaiva krama iti niyamyate soyaṃ mukhyakramaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1532: yājyānuvākyāpravṛttikrameṇa nirvāpādīnāṃ kramasya siddhatvāditi vistarabhayāddiṅmātraṃ darśitam / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1540: FN: 4-anena yugapadanuṣṭhānamityuktaṃ tacca na kramamantarā siddhyediti sarvatra kramāpekṣā prakṛte tu pṛthaktvānna kramāpekṣeti bhāvaḥ / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1544: yatra tu na śeṣaśeṣibhāvaḥ nāpyekādhikārāvacchedaḥ yathā sauryāryamṇa @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1545: FN: 5-'sauryaṃ caruṃ nirvapedbrahmavarcasakāmaḥ' 'āryamaṇaṃ caruṃ nirvapet svargakāmaḥ' 'prājāpatyaṃ caruṃ nirvapecchatakṛṣṇalakāmaḥ'ityādi bhinnaphalakayagānāṃ na kramaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1551: na ceha dharmabrahmajijñāsayoḥ śeṣaśeṣibhāve śrutyādīnāmanyatamaṃ pramāṇamastīti / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1556: yathā vā 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāmiṣṭvā somena yajeta'iti darśapūrṇamāsasomayoraśeṣaśeṣiṇorityata āha-adhikṛtādhikāre vā pramāṇābhāvāt-iti yojanā
GSP33brsvbh1u:1557: svargakāmasya hi darśapūrṇamāsādhikṛtasya paśukāmasya sato darśapūrṇamāsakratvarthāppraṇayanāśrite godohane adhikāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1566: yathāgneyādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāmekasvargaphalāvacchinnānāmyadi vā jijñāsyabrahmaṇo 'śo dharmaḥ syāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1567: yathā caturlakṣaṇīvyutpādyaṃ brahma kenacitkenacidaṃśenaikaikena lakṣaṇena vyutpādyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1568: tatra caturṇāṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ jijñāsyābhedena parasparasaṃbandhe sati kramo vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1571: jijñāsāyā vastuto jñānatantratvāt jñānaphalaṃ jijñāsāphalamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1580: bhavitā ca bhāvakavyāpāranirvartyatayā tattantra iti tataḥ prāgjñānakāle nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1600: bhāvanāyāstaddvāreṇa ca yāgāderapekṣitopāyatāmavagamayantī tatrecchopahāramukhena puruṣaṃ niyuñjānaiva yāgādidharmamavabodhayati nānyathā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1601: brahmacodanā tu puruṣamavabodhayatyeva kevalaṃ na tu pravartayantyavabodhayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1604: puruṣo brahmāvabodhyata iti samānatvaṃ dharmacodanābhirbrahmacodanānāmityata āha-na
GSP33brsvbh1u:1615: api cātmajñānavidhipareṣu vedānteṣu nātmatattvaviniścayaḥ śābdaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1626: yasminnasati brahmajijñāsā na bhavati sati tu bhavantī bhavatyevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1635: tathā sati eṣa viparyāsādanyaḥ saṃśayaḥ syāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1648: tadeteṣvanubhūyamāneṣu yuṣmadasmatpratyayagocareṣu viṣayaviṣayiṣu yadṛtaṃ nityaṃ sukhaṃ vyavasthāsyate tadāsthāgocaro bhaviṣyati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1650: so 'yaṃ nityānityavastuvivekaḥ prāgbhavīyādaihikādvā vaidikātkarmaṇo viśuddhasattvasya bhavatyanubhavopapattibhyām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1651: na khalu satyaṃ nāma na kiñcidastīti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1654: athāsya puruṣadhaureyasyānubhavopapattibhyāmevaṃ sunipuṇaṃ nirūpayataḥ ā ca satyalokāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:1655: ā cāvīceḥ jāyasva mriyasva iti viparivartamānaṃ kṣaṇamuhūrtayāmāhorātrārdhamāsamāsartvayanavatsarayugacaturyugamanvantarapralayamahāpralayamahāsargāvāntarasargasaṃsārasāgarormibh
GSP33brsvbh1u:1656: tāpatrayaparītamātmānaṃ ca jīvalokaṃ cāvalokya asminsaṃsāramaṇḍale anityāśuciduḥkhātmakaṃ prasaṃkhyānamu
GSP33brsvbh1u:1666: rāgādikaṣāyamadirāmattaṃ hi manasteṣu teṣu viṣayeṣūccāvacamindriyāṇi pravartayat,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1670: so 'yamasya vairāgyahetuko manovijayaḥ śama iti vaśīkārasaṃjña iti cākhyāyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1673: yathā dānto 'yaṃ vṛṣabhayuvā halaśakaṭādivahanayogyaḥ kṛta iti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1675: ata eva śrutiḥ-'tasmācchānto dānta uparatastitikṣuḥ śraddhāvitto bhūtvātmanyevātmānaṃ paśyet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1681: tasya ca nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvabrahmajñānaṃ mokṣasya kāraṇamityupaśrutya tajjijñāsā bhavati dharmajijñāsāyāḥ prāgūrdhvaṃ ca,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1689: FN: 2-athaśabdena jijñāsāhetupratipādanātkimataḥśabdenetyāśaṅkya nānena hetorabhidhānaṃ kiṃ tu pūrvoktahetutvarūpāsiddhiparihāra ityāha-atraivamiti
GSP33brsvbh1u:1705: na hi mṛgāḥ santīti śālayo nopyante,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1707: api ca dṛṣṭaṃ sukhaṃ candanavanitādisaṅgajanma kṣayitālakṣaṇena duḥkhenāghrātatvādatibhīruṇā tyajyetāpi,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1711: tathā ca 'akṣayyaṃ ha vai cāturmāsyayājinaḥ sukṛtaṃ bhavati' /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1716: śaṅkhavadityanumānaṃ 'nāraṃ spṛṣṭvāsthi sasnehaṃ savāsā jalamāviśet'ityāgamādbādhitaviṣayaṃ tathā sukṛtamanityaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1725: na hi madhuviṣasaṃpṛktamannaṃ viṣaṃ parityajya samadhu śakyaṃ śilpivareṇāpi bhoktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1726: kṣayitānumānopodbalitaṃ ca 'tadyatheha karmajitaḥ'ityādi vacanaṃ kṣayitāpratipādakam 'apāma somam'ityādikaṃ vacanaṃ mukhyāsaṃbhave jaghanyavṛttitāmāpādayati
GSP33brsvbh1u:1728: atra ca brahmapadena tatpramāṇaṃ veda upasthāpitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1729: sa ca yogyatvāt 'tadyatheha karmacitaḥ'ityādirataḥ iti sarvanāmnā parāmṛśya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1732: yathā svargādeḥ kṛtakasya sukhasya duḥkhānuṣaṅgastathā brahmaṇo 'pītyata āha-tathā brahmavijñānādapīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1737: ṣaṣṭhīsamāsapradarśanena prācāṃ vṛttikṛtāṃ brahmaṇe jijñāsā brahmajijñāseti caturthīsamāsaḥ parāsto veditavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1738: 'tādarthyasamāse prakṛtivikṛtigrahaṇaṃ kartavyam'iti kātyāyanīyavacanena yūpadārvādiṣveva prakṛtivikārabhāve caturthīsamāsaniyamāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1751: yato brahmajijñāsāṃ pratijñāya tajjñāpanāya paramātmalakṣaṇaṃ praṇayati tato 'vagacchāmaḥ paramātmajijñāsaiveyaṃ na vipratvajātyādijijñāsetyarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1754: saṃbandhamātraṃ ca śeṣa iti brahmaṇo jijñāsetyukte brahmasaṃbandhinī jijñāsetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1755: tathā ca brahmasvarūpapramāṇayuktisādhanaprayojanajijñāsāḥ sarvā brahmajijñāsārthā brahmajijñāsayāvaruddhā bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1759: tathā cāpratijñātārthacintā pramāṇādiṣu bhavediti ye manyante tānpratyāha-brahmaṇa iti karmaṇi iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1763: na khalu jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ vinā nirūpyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1764: na ca jijñāsā jñānaṃ vineti pratipattyanubandhatvāt prathamaṃ jijñāsā karmaivāpekṣate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1767: na hi candramasamādityaṃ vopalabhya kasyāyamiti saṃbandhyanveṣaṇā bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1773: nanu satyaṃ na jijñāsyamantareṇa jijñāsā nirūpyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1775: brahma tu śeṣatayā saṃbhantsyata ityata āha-jijñāsyāntareti / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1779: nigūḍhābhiprāya eva dūṣayati-evamapi pratyakṣaṃ brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1780: vācyasya karmatvasya jijñāsayā prathamamapekṣitasya prathamasaṃbandhārhasya cānvayaparityāgena paścātkathañcidapekṣitasya saṃbandhimātrasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:1801: na kevalaṃ jñānamiṣyate kintvavagatiṃ sākṣātkāraṃ kurvadavagatiparyantaṃ sanvācyāyā icchāyāḥ karma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1807: nahyanapekṣaṇīyaviṣayamavagatiparyantamapi jñānamiṣyata ityata āha-jñānena hi pramāṇenāvagantumiṣṭaṃ brahma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1811: kiṃ tu niḥśreyasaṃ vigalitanikhiladuḥkhānuṣaṅgaparamānandaghanabrahmāvagatirbrahmaṇaḥ svabhāva iti saiva niḥśreyasaṃ puruṣārtha iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1821: na pratibhātīva parādhīnaprakāśa iva dehendriyādibhyo bhinno 'pyabhinna iva bhāsata
GSP33brsvbh1u:1822: iti saṃsārabījāvidyādyanarthanibarhaṇātprāgaprāpta iva tasminsati prāpta iva bhavatīti
GSP33brsvbh1u:1831: tacca na kevalebhyo vedāntebhyo 'pi tu brahmamīmāṃso @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1832: FN: 1-atredaṃ bodhyam-brahmātmatāmicchatā jñānameṣitavyaṃ tacca vicāropakaraṇebhyo vedāntebhyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1833: tathāca sati brahmavicāraḥ kartavya ityarthaḥ syāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1843: tatra phalavadarthāvabodhaparatāṃ svādhyāyādhyayanavidheḥ sūtrayatā 'athāto dharmajijñāsā'ityanenaiva pravartitatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1845: yadyapi ca dharmamīmāṃsāvat vedārthamīmāṃsayā brahmamīmāṃsāpyākṣeptuṃ śakya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1847: nāpi brahmamīmāṃsāyā adhyayanamātrānantaryamiti brahmamīmāṃsārambhāya nityānityavivekādyānantaryapradarśanāya cedaṃ sūtramārambhaṇīyamityapaunaruktyam
GSP33brsvbh1u:1849: etena sūtreṇa brahmajñānaṃ pratyupāyatā mīmāṃsāyāḥ pratipādyata ityuktam tadayuktam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1858: athāprasiddhaṃ vedāntebhyastarhi na tadvedāntāḥ pratipādayantīti sarvathāprasiddhaṃ naiva śakyaṃ jijñāsitum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1859: anubhūte hi priye bhavatīcchā na tu sarvathānanubhūtāpūrve /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1877: FN: 2-nityatvaṃ ca dhvaṃsāpratiyogitve sati prāgabhāvāpratiyogitvarūpaṃ bodhyam / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1889: sadaiva muktaḥ sadaiva kevalo 'nādyavidyāvaśāt bhrāntyā tathāvabhāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1896: na kevalam 'sadeva somyedam'ityādīnāṃ vākyānāṃ paurvāparyālocanayā itthaṃbhūtabrahmāvagatiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1903: tadevaṃ tatpadārthasya śuddhatvādeḥ prasiddhimabhidhāya tvaṃpadārthasyāpyāha-sarvasyātmatvācca brahmāstitvaprasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1917: nanvahamasmīti ca jñāsyati mā ca jñāsīdātmānamityata āha-yadīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1922: brahmaṇi tu kimāyātamityata āha-ātmā ca brahma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1928: ākṣeptā prathamakalpāśrayaṃ doṣamāha-yadi tarhi loka iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1937: anyathā anāśrayā bhinnāśrayā vā vipratipattayo na syuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1945: tvaṃpadārthasya ca jīvātmano lokataḥ siddhiḥ sarvatantrasiddhāntaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1947: tasmātsāmānyataḥ prasiddhe dharmiṇi viśeṣato vipratipattau yuktastadviśeṣeṣu saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1960: tehi kriyārthatvamāmnāyasya bruvāṇā vedāntā aupacārikā vā avivakṣitasvārthā vā manyanta iti darśitaṃ prāk / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1962: tadevaṃ tvaṃpadārthavipratipattidvārā tatpadārthe vipratipattiṃ sūcayitvā sākṣāttatpadārthe vipratipattimāha-asti tadvyatirikta īśvaraḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktiriti kecit /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1969: na tvaṃpadārthena sāmānādhikaraṇyamiti svamatamāha-atmā sa bhokturityapare /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1976: tannimittaśca saṃśayaḥtathāpi kimarthaṃ brahmamīmāṃsārabhyata ityata āha-tatrāvicāryeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1981: tadavirodhinaśca ye 'nye 'pi tarkā adhvaramīmāṃsāyāṃ nyāye ca vedapratyakṣādiprāmāṇyapariśodhanādiṣūktāsta upakaraṇaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1988: yatra yadyapi brahmasvarūpajñānasya pradhānasya pratijñayā tadaṅgānyapi pramāṇādīni pratijñātāni,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1991: na tenopalabdhena tadviruddhasya nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvasya brahmaṇaḥ svarūpaṃ śakyaṃ lakṣayitum,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1992: na hi jātu kaścitkṛtakatvena nityaṃ lakṣayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1998: FN: 1-itarapramāṇenāprasiddhamapi śabdataḥ prasiddhaṃ syāditi cettatrāha-evaṃ ceti / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2004: mā bhūdanubhūyamānaṃ jagattaddharmatayā tādātmyena vā brahmaṇo lakṣaṇam, @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2007: tadutpattyā tu bhaviṣyati deśāntaraprāptiriva saviturvrajyāyā iti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2009: lāghavāya sūtrakṛtā janmādīti napuṃsakaprayogaḥ kṛtastadupapādanāya samāhāramāha-janmasthitibhaṅgamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2012: pradhānakālagrahalokapālakriyāyadṛcchāsvabhāvābhāveṣūpaplavamāneṣu satsu sarvajñaṃ sarvaśaktisvabhāvaṃ brahma jagajjanmādikāraṇamiti kutaḥ saṃbhāvanetyata āha-asya jagata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2013: atranāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākṛtasya iti cetanabhāvakartṛkatvasaṃbhāvanayā pradhānādyacetanakartṛkatvaṃ nirupākhyakartṛkatvaṃ ca vyāsedhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2014: yatkhalu nāmnā rūpeṇa ca vyākriyate taccetanakartṛkaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2016: vivādādhyāsitaṃ ca jagannāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākṛtam tasmāccetanakartṛkaṃ saṃbhāvyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2017: cetano hi buddhāvālikhya nāmarūpe ghaṭa iti nāmnā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2018: rūpeṇa ca kambugrīvādinā bāhyaṃ ghaṭaṃ niṣpādayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2019: ata eva ghaṭasya nirvartyasyāpyantaḥ saṃkalpātmanā siddhasya karmakārakabhāvo ghaṭaṃ karotīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2021: tathā cācetano buddhāvanālikhitaṃ karotīti na śakyaṃ saṃbhāvayitumiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2023: cetanā grahā lokapālā vā nāmarūpe buddhāvālikhya jagajjanayiṣyanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2033: deśādīni ca tāni pratiniyatāni ceti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2046: evaṃ ya eva sukhinasta eva kadācidduḥkhinaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2047: sarvametadākasmikāparanāmni yādṛcchikatve vā svābhāvikatve vā sarvajñāsarvaśaktikartṛkatve ca na ghaṭate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2050: ekasyā api hi śarīraracanāyā rūpaṃ manasā na śakyaṃ cintayituṃ kadācit,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2056: na tu vṛddhipariṇāmāpakṣayā apītyata āha-anyeṣāmapi bhāvavikārāṇāṃ--vṛddhyādīnāntriṣvevāntarbhāva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2058: tenālpāvayavādavayavino dvitantukāderanya eva mahānpaṭo jāyata iti janmaiva vṛddhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2067: tathā sati hi tatpratipādake 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni'iti vedavākye buddhisthīkṛte jaganmūlakāraṇaṃ brahma lakṣitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2068: anyathā tu jāyate 'sti vardhate ityādīnāṃ grahaṇe tatpratipādakaṃ nairuktavākyaṃ buddhau bhavet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2073: tannāntarīyakatayā tu sthitibhaṅgaṃ gamyata ityata āha-yotpattirbrahmaṇaḥ kāraṇā @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2078: FN: 2-atredaṃ bodhyam-utpattimātrasya nimittakāraṇasādhāraṇatve 'pi layādhāratvoktyā upādānatvaṃ sidhyet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2081: nahyatropādānatvasūcanāyaiva taduktamapitu prakṛtivikārābhedanyāyenādvaitasiddhaye 'pi tena brahma upādānaṃ bhavatu,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2089: lakṣaṇaṃhi siddhasya vastuno bhedamavagamayati īdṛśaṃ taditi / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2094: tasya yadaikatvaṃ sidhyati tadā tatsarvajñaṃ sarvaśakti ca bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2095: ayaṃ ca saṃdehaḥ kalpanālāghavākhyatarkeṇa utkaṭaikatarakoṭikatāṃ nītaḥ saṃbhavānetyucyate
GSP33brsvbh1u:2096: prāsādādīnāmanekakartṛkatvasya dṛṣṭatvānna tatra nirṇayo bhavati ato nirṇayārthamāvaśyakamagnimādhikaraṇamiti bhāvaḥ / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2102: yadanye vaiśeṣikakādaya ita evānumānādīśvaraviniścayamicchantīti saṃbhāvanāhetutāṃ draḍhayitumāha-etadeveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2110: kutaśca tadanubhavaḥ sākṣātkāraḥityata āha-satsu tu vedāntavākyeṣviti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2112: śabdāvirodhinyā tadupajīvinyā ca yuktyā vivecanaṃ mananam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2116: evaṃ brahmaṇyapi kasmānna bhavatītyata āha-na dharmajijñāsāyāmiveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2121: yadyapi dharmajijñāsāyāmapi sāmagryāṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ vyāpārastathāpi sākṣānnāsti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2122: brahmajijñāsāyāṃ tu sākṣādanubhavādīnāṃ saṃbhavo 'nubhavārthā ca brahmajijñāsetyāha-anubhavāvasānatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2136: anuṣṭhānasya ca vināpyanubhavaṃ śābdajñānamātrādeva siddherityāha-kartavye hītyādinā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2150: evaṃ nārāsthitasparśananiṣedho brahmaghnaśca tadvāraṇavidhirityevañjātīyakā vidhipratiṣedhā arthavantaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2153: yasmādgrahaṇāgrahaṇayoruditānuditahomayośca virodhātsamuccayāsaṃbhave tulyabalatayā ca bādhyabādhakabhāvābhāve satyagatyā vikalpaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2155: kintu sāmānyaśāstrasya sparśananiṣedhasya dhāraṇavidhiviṣayeṇa viśeṣaśāstreṇa bādhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2156: etaduktaṃ bhavati-vidhipratiṣedhaireva sa tādṛśo viṣayo 'nāgatotpādyarūpa upanītaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2158: bhūte vastuni tu neyamasti vidhetyāha-na tu vastvevaṃ naivamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2174: na tu puruṣatattvaṃ vā sthāṇutattvaṃ vāpekṣante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2176: tasmādayathāvastavo vikalpanā na vastu vikalpayanti vā anyathayanti vetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2181: evamuktena prakāreṇa bhūtavastuviṣayāṇāṃ jñānānāṃ prāmāṇyasya vastutantratāṃ prasādhya brahmajñānasya vastutantratāmāha-tatraivaṃ satīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2183: yat kila bhūtārthaṃ vākyaṃ tatpramāṇāntaragocarārthatayānuvādakaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2189: na tu vedāntavākyāni tadadhīnasatyatvānīti kathaṃ vedāntavākyagrathanārthatā sūtrāṇāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2192: kasmāt punarnendriyaviṣayatvaṃ pratīca ityata āha-svabhāvata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2213: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yathā rajjvajñānasahitarajjūpādānā hi dhārā rajjvāṃ satyāmasti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2226: nityanaimittikakāmyakarmapaddhatiṣu ca brahmatattve ca śiṣyāṇāṃ śāsanāt śāstramṛgvedādiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2232: purāṇādipraṇetāro hi maharṣayaḥ śiṣṭāstaistayā tayā dvārā vedānvyācakṣāṇaistadarthacādareṇānutiṣṭhadbhiḥ parigṛhīto veda iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2243: yo yadvākyapramāṇakartā sa tadviṣayādadhikaviṣayajñaḥ yathā pāṇiniriti / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2244: yadyadvistarārthaṃ śāstraṃ yasmātpuruṣaviśeṣātsaṃbhavati sa-puruṣaviśeṣaḥtato 'pi-śāstrātadhikataravijñānaḥ iti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2245: adyatve 'pyasmadādibhiryatsamīcīnārthaviṣayaṃ śāstraṃ viracyate tatrāsmākaṃ vaktṛṇāṃ vākyājjñānamadhikaviṣayam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2246: nahi te te 'sādhāraṇadharmā anubhūyamānā api śakyā vaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2248: vistarārthamapi vākyaṃ na vaktṛjñānena tulyaviṣayamiti kathayituṃ vistaragrahaṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2250: vedasya yasmāt mahato bhūtāt yoneḥ saṃbhavaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2251: tasya mahato bhūtasya brahmaṇo niratiśayaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ ca sarvaśaktitvaṃ ca kimu vaktavyamiti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2258: devarṣayo hi mahāpariśrameṇāpi yatrāśaktastadayamīṣatprayatnena līlayaiva karotīti niratiśayamasya sarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktitvaṃ coktaṃ bhavati
GSP33brsvbh1u:2260: ye 'pi tāvat varṇānāṃ nityatvamāsthiṣata tairapi padavākyādīnāmanityatvamabhyupeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2264: varṇānāṃ nityānāṃ vibhūnāṃ ca kālato deśato vā paurvāparyāyogāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2265: vyaktiścānityeti kathaṃ tadupagṛhītānāṃ varṇānāṃ nityānāmapi padatā nityā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2268: yathā hi yādṛśaṃ gātracalanādi nartakaḥ karoti tādṛśameva śikṣyamāṇānukaroti nartakī,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2270: evaṃ yādṛśīmānupūrvīṃ vaidikānāṃ varṇapadādīnāṃ karotyadhyāpayitā tādṛśīmevānukaroti māṇavakaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2277: vaiyāsikaṃ tu matamanuvartamānāḥ śrutismṛtītihāsādisiddhasṛṣṭipralayānusāreṇānādyavidyopadhānalabdhasarvaśaktijñānasyāpi paramātmano nityasya vedānāṃ yonerapi na teṣu svātantryam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2279: yathā hi yāgādibrahmahatyādayor'thānarthahetavo brahmavivartā api na sargāntare 'pi vipariyanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2285: evaṃ sargāntareṣvapīti tadanurodhāt sarvajño 'pi sarvaśaktirapi pūrvapūrvasargānusāreṇa vedānviracayanna svatantraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2289: na hi bahūnāmapyajñānāṃ vijñānāṃ vāśayadoṣavatāṃ pratibhāne yukta āśvāsaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2292: tatpratyayena cārvācīnānāmapi tatra saṃpratyaya ityupapannaṃ brahmaṇaḥ śāstrayonitvam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2301: tadanena sūtreṇa pratipādanīyamityutsūtraṃ pūrvapakṣamāracayati bhāṣyakāraḥ-kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2305: na khalu laukikāni vākyāni pramāṇāntaraviṣayamarthamavabodhayanti svataḥ pramāṇam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2313: evaṃ hi pratyakṣādyanadhigatagocaratvenānapekṣatayā prāmāṇyaṃ ca prayojanavattvaṃ ca sidhyatīti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2325: vedāntānāṃ cājñātaṃ brahma jñāpayatāṃ tathābhāvādityata āha-na ca pariniṣṭhita iti / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2335: yasmāt phalasaṃbandhaḥ kriyāyāḥ śeṣatvamantareṇa na saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2341: FN: 3-nanu adhikārādividhīnāṃ parasparamavinābhāve kathamavāntarabheda iti cettatrāha-tadvākyānāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2349: tasmāt bhāvanāviṣayo vidhirna siddhe vastuni bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2352: evaṃ ca satyuktarūpe brahmaṇi śabdasyātātparyāt pramāṇāntareṇa yādṛśa @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2354: masya rūpaṃ vyavasthāpyate na tacchabdena virudhyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2371: 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni'iti tu vākyaṃ pūrvamudāhṛtaṃ jagadutpattisthitināśakāraṇamiti ceha smāritamiti na paṭhitam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2372: yena hi vākyamupakramyate yena copasaṃhriyate tadeva vākyārtha iti śābdāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2374: FN: 1-'jāmi vā etadyajñasya kriyate yadanvañcau puroḍāśau upāṃśuyājamantarā yajati viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyo 'jāmitvāya'ityādimantreṇa,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2375: āgneyāgnīṣomīyayoḥ puroḍāśayoḥ nirantarayoḥ karaṇe jāmi-ālasyaṃ bhavediti madhye upāṃśuyāgo vidhīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2376: tatra kimidamapūrvayāgavidhānamāho 'viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ'iti paṭhitayāgatrayasyānuvāda iti saṃśaye dravyadevatayoraśravaṇāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2384: evamatrāpi 'sadeva somyedam'iti brahmopakramāt 'tattvamasi'iti ca jīvasya brahmātmanopasaṃhārāt tatparataiva vākyasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2386: FN: 1-aitareyake-'ātmā vā idameka evāgra āsīt'ityupakramya 'prajñānaṃ brahma'ityupasaṃhṛtam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2388: ātharvaṇe-'kasmin bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati'iti sarvātmakaṃ brahmopakramya 'brahmaivedamamṛtaṃ purastāt'iti tadevopasaṃhṛtam
GSP33brsvbh1u:2391: na ca tatparatvasya dṛṣṭasya sati saṃbhave 'nyaparatā adṛṣṭā yuktā kalpayitum,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2401: tatra pūrvavādyabhimatasya hetoḥ pauruṣeyatvena sopādhikatvaṃ apinā dyotyata ityāha-ayamabhisaṃdhiriti / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2411: evaṃ tarhi tadapūrvakāṇāṃ vedāntānāṃ bhūtārthānāmapi nāprāmāṇyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2417: bhūtārthasya śabdānapekṣeṇa puruṣeṇa mānāntarataḥ śakyajñānatvādbuddhipūrvaṃ viracanopapatteḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2426: FN: 6-vedāntavākyakadambasya kāryaparatve tu na vākyatvahetunā sāpekṣatvamanumeyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2432: FN: 7-akārye mānāntarāyogyatvasyāsiddhatvāttatparatve 'pi vedāntānāṃ pauruṣeyatvaṃ saṃbhavatīti samā sādhanavyāptiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2433: tataśca vākyatvādiliṅgakānumānena pauruṣeyatvaṃ durapahnavamityāha-atra brūma iti / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2434: brūmaḥ-kiṃ punaridaṃ kāryamabhimatamāyuṣmataḥ yadaśakyaṃ puruṣeṇa jñātum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2438: lokānusārataḥ kriyāyā eva laukikyāḥ kāryatayā liṅāderavagamāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2442: na ca kriyā kṣaṇabhaṅgurāmuṣmikāya svargāya kalpata iti pāriśeṣyādvedata evāpūrve kārye liṅādīnāṃ saṃbandhagraha iti cet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2445: spaṣṭadṛṣṭena pauruṣeyatvena vā teṣāmapūrvārthatvapratiṣedhe vākyatvādinā liṅgena vedāntānāmapi pauruṣeyatvamanumitamityapūrvārthatā na syāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:2446: FN: 9-smaryamāṇakartṛkatvena sopādhiko vākyatvaheturiti cet siddhārthakeṣvapi vedānteṣu tatsamamiti kāryārthatvamanapekṣatāprayojakaṃ na bhavatītyāha-anyatastviti
GSP33brsvbh1u:2450: na cājñāte puṃsāṃ vākyaracanā saṃbhavatīti apauruṣeyo veda ityādi tatroktamavagantavyam / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2452: tenāpauruṣeyatve siddhe bhūtārthānāmapi vedāntānāṃ na sāpekṣatayā prāmāṇyavighātaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2455: gantṛtā nāsti yena prāmāṇyaṃ na syāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2461: puruṣārthapratilambhonāyaṃ sarpo rajjuriyamitijñānādiveti so 'yamasya vidhyarthajñānāt prakarṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2472: tatrāprāptaprāptau cātyaktatyāge ca bāhyopāyānuṣṭhānasādhyatvāt tadupāyatattvajñānādasti parācīnānuṣṭhānāpekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2474: na hi sahasramapi rajjupratyayā vastusantaṃ phaṇinamanyathayitumīśate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2475: samāropite tu prepsitajihāsite tattvasākṣātkāramātreṇa bāhyānuṣṭhānānapekṣeṇa śakyete prāptumiva hātumiva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2488: santu tarhi vedāntā devatāpratipādanadvāreṇopāsanāvidhiparā evetyata āha-na tu tathā brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2489: upāsyopāsakopāsanādibhedasiddhyadhīnopāsanā na nirastasamastabhedaprapañce vedāntavedye brahmaṇi saṃbhavatīti nopāsanāvidhiśeṣatvaṃ vedāntānāṃ tadvirodhitvāt ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2493: na hi hānopādānabuddhī eva prāmaṇasya phale,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2497: svādhyāyavidhyadhīnagrahaṇatayā hi sarvo vedarāśiḥ puruṣārthatantra ityavagatam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2500: na ca vedāntebhya iva tadarthāvagamamātrādeva kaścitpuruṣārtha upalabhyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2502: 'barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyam'ityayamapi niṣedhavidhiḥ svaniṣedhyasya nindāmapekṣate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2504: tadyadi dūrato 'pi na nindāmavāpsyattato niṣedhavidhireva rajataniṣedhe ca nindāyāṃ ca darvihomavat sāmarthyadvayamakalpayiṣyat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2505: tadevamuttaptayoḥ 'so 'rodīt'iti 'barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyam'iti ca padasaṃdarbhayorlakṣyamāṇanindādvāreṇa naṣṭāśvadagdharathavat parasparaṃ samanvayaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2508: nanu vidhyasaṃsparśino vedasyānyasya na prāmāṇyaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kathaṃ vedāntānāṃ tadaspṛśāṃ tadbhaviṣyatītyata āha-na cānumānagamyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2509: abādhitānadhigatāsaṃdigdhabodhajanakatvaṃ hi pramāṇatvaṃ pramāṇānāmtacca svata ityupapāditam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2511: tathāpi tadbodhopajanane mānāntaraṃ nāpekṣate nāpīmāmevārthāpattim, parasparā @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2512: FN: 2-pramāyāmutpannāyāṃ pramāṇānāṃ pramājanakatvānumānaṃ tataśca pramotpattiriti parasparāśrayatvamityarthaḥ / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2515: vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇyastīti dṛṣṭāntānapekṣaṃ teṣāṃ brahmaṇi prāmāṇyaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2516: anyathā nendriyāntarāṇāṃ rūpaprakāśanaṃ dṛṣṭamiti cakṣurapi na rūpaṃ prakāśayediti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2523: yatra hi śabdā lokena na prayujyante tatra na teṣāṃ saṃgatigrahaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2527: tasmāt pratipitsitaṃ pratipipādayiṣannayaṃ lokaḥ pravṛttinivṛttihetubhūtamevārthaṃ pratipādayet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2539: manumāya tasya ca śabdabhāvābhāvānuvidhānamavagamya śabdasya tadviṣayavācakatvaṃ niścetavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2541: kāryapratyaye tu narāntaravartini pravṛttinivṛttī sto hetū ityajñātasaṃgatitvānna brahmarūpaparā vedāntāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2549: FN: 2-nakāro 'yaṃ sāṃsārikāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ na nivṛttiriti yojanīyaḥ / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2550: na ca rajjuriyaṃ na bhujaṅgaḥiti yathākathañcillakṣaṇayā vākyārthatattvaniścaye yathā bhayakampādinivṛttiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2553: api ca yadi śrutabrahmaṇo bhavati sāṃsārikadharmanivṛttiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2557: tacca kāryaṃ svātmani niyojyaṃ niyuñjānaṃ niyoga iti ca mānāntarāpūrvatayāpūrvamiti cākhyāyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2558: na ca viṣayānuṣṭhānaṃ vinā tatsiddhiriti svasiddhyarthaṃ tadeva kāryaṃ svaviṣayasya karaṇasyātmajñānasyānuṣṭhānamākṣipati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2559: yathā ca kāryaṃ svaviṣayādhīnanirūpaṇamiti jñānena viṣeyeṇa nirūpyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2562: FN: 3-nanu kāryaṃ svaviṣayajñānanirūpaṇāya jñāyamānamātmānamākṣipati cedātmanaḥ śrautatvaṃ na syādityāśaṅkya vidhyākṣiptasya śrautatve gurusaṃmatimāha-yathāhuriti
GSP33brsvbh1u:2563: yathāhuḥ-'yattu tatsiddhyarthamupādīyate ākṣipyate tadapi vidheyamiti tantre vyavahāraḥ'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2566: FN: 4-nanu 'vācaṃ dhenumupāsīta'itivadāropyasya vidheyadhīviṣayatvaṃ kiṃ na syādata āha-āropiteti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2568: tathāsati āropitaikyabhāvena jñānaṃ nirūpitaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2569: satyāṃ gatāvāropo na yukta iti hṛdayam / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2570: āropitatadbhāvasya tvanyasya nirūpakatve tena tannirūpitaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2577: 'yūpamaṣṭāśrīkaroti'ityādibhirvākyaistakṣaṇādividhiparairapi saṃskārāviṣṭaṃ viśiṣṭalakṣaṇasaṃsthānaṃ dāru yūpa iti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2580: tatra ka āhavanīya ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ 'vasante brāhmaṇo 'gnīnādadhīta'ityādividhinā saṃskāraviśiṣṭo 'gnirāhavanīya iti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2584: kārya eva ca saṃbandho na svarūpe,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2585: iti hetudvayaṃ bhāṣyavākyenopapāditam-pravṛttinivṛttiprayojanatvāt ityādinātatsāmānyādvedāntānāmapi tathaivārthavattvaṃ syāt ityantena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2586: na ca svatantraṃ kāryaṃ niyojyamadhikāriṇamanuṣṭhātāramantareṇeti niyojyabhedamāha-sati ca vidhiparatva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2587: 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati'iti siddhavadarthavādādavagatasyāpi brahmabhavanasya niyojyaviśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ brahma bubhūṣorniyojyaviśeṣasya rātri
GSP33brsvbh1u:2588: FN: 1-'pratitiṣṭhanti ha vā ya etā rātrīrupayanti'iti rātriśabdena somaviśeṣā vidhīyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2589: tatra kiṃ etadvākyābhihitapratiṣṭhā phalamuta svarga iti saṃśaye evaṅkāma ityaśravaṇāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2592: svarga eva phalamiti prāpte pratiṣṭhāphalasya sākṣānnirdeśena ānumānikasvargakalpanāyā anyāyyatvātpratiṣṭhaiva phalamiti rāddhāntaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2597: piṇḍapitṛyajñaḥ kratvartho vā puruṣārtha iti saṃśaye phalakalpanāparihārāya amāvāsyāśabdasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:2601: tadvadatra kalpane tu svargor'thaḥ brahmabhavanaśabdenāsamavetaḥ syāttathāca parokṣavṛttitāpāta iti bhāvaḥ / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2602: yajñanyāyena tu svargakāmasya niyojyasya kalpanāyāmarthavādasyāsamavetārthatayātyantaparokṣā vṛttiḥ syāditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2609: atra cātmadarśanaṃ na vidheyam taddhi dṛśerupalabdhivacanatvāt śrāvaṇaṃ vā syāt pratyakṣaṃ vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2619: FN: 1-yathā bhikṣārthavihitadadhyānayanādvājinamānuṣaṅgikatayā jāyate evamamūtatvāya vihitādupāsanātsākṣātkāro jāyata iti tadutpādanaṃ na vidheyamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2624: arthavattyā mananādipratītyā cetyasya śeṣaḥ prapañco nigadavyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2630: tacca sarvaṃ kāryaṃ ca vināśi ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2634: etaduktaṃ bhavati-tvayāpyupāsanāvidhiparatvaṃ vedāntānāmabhyupagacchatā nityaśuddhabuddhatvādirūpabrahmātmatā jīvasya svābhāvikī vedāntagamyāsthīyate
GSP33brsvbh1u:2641: upāsanāsaṃskāravadupāsanāpūrvamapi cetaḥsahakārīti cetdṛṣṭaṃ ca khalu naiyogikaṃ phalamaihikamapi, yathā @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2642: FN: 1-'citrayā yajeta paśukāmaḥ'iti vihitacitrāniyogaphalaṃ iha janmāntare vā bhavati / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2646: gāndharvaśāstrārthepāsanāvāsanāyā ivāpūrvānapekṣāyāḥ ṣaṭjādisākṣātkāre vedāntārthopāsanāvāsanāyā jīvabrahmabhāvasākṣātkāre 'napekṣāyā eva sāmarthyāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:2650: na ca tatkāmaḥ kriyāmeva kāryamavagamiṣyati nāpūrvamiti sāṃpratam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2659: viśvajinnyāyena tu svargakalpanāyāṃ tasya sātiśayatvaṃ kṣayitvaṃ ceti na nityaphalatvamupāsanāyāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2662: upāsanāyāḥ saṃskārahetubhāvasya saṃskārasya ca sākṣātkāropajanane manaḥsācivyasya ca mānāntarasiddhatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2665: yathopāṃśuyājavākye 'viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ'ityādayo vidhisarūpā na vidhayaḥ-iti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2673: pare hi dvayīṃ nityatāmāhuḥ-kūṭasthanityatā pariṇāminityatāṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2680: ekadeśapariṇāme vā sa ekadeśastato bhinno vā abhinno vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2684: abhede vā kathaṃ na sarvātmanā pariṇāmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2689: na ca bhedābhedayorvirodhānnaikatra samavāya iti yuktam / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2690: FN: 2-yatpramāṇaviparyayeṇa virodhena vartate tadviruddhamiti kva saṃpratyaya iti yojanā / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2692: yattu yathā pramāṇenāvagamyate tasya tathābhāva eva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2693: kuṇḍalamidaṃ suvarṇamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyapratyaye ca vyaktaṃ bhedābhedau cakāstaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2699: so 'yamabādhito 'saṃdigdhaḥ sarvajanīnaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyapratyaya eva kāryakāraṇayorbhedābhedau vyavasthāpayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2718: api ca kaṭakasya hāṭakādabhede yathā hāṭakātmanā kaṭakamukuṭakuṇḍalādayo na bhidyante evaṃ kaṭakātmanāpi na bhidyeran,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2724: yadi hāṭakādabhinnaḥ kaṭakaḥ kathamayaṃ kuṇḍalādiṣu nānuvartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2726: ye hi yasminnanuvartamāne vyāvartante te tato bhinnā eva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2733: api ca dūrātkanakamityavagate na tasya kuṇḍalādayo viśeṣā jijñāsyeran,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2741: asti cābhede kāraṇasatteti kanake jñāte jñātā eva kuṇḍalādaya iti tajjijñāsājñānāni cānarthakāni syuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2742: tena yasmin gṛhyamāṇe yanna gṛhyate tattato bhidyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2744: gṛhyamāṇe ca dūrato hemni na gṛhyante tasya bhedāḥ kuṇḍalādayaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2746: kathaṃ tarhi hema kuṇḍalamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti cet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2748: athānuvṛttivyāvṛttivyavasthā ca hemni jñāte kuṇḍalādijijñāsā ca katham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2760: tasmāt kūṭasthanityataiva pāramārthikī na pariṇāminityateti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2767: vrīhīṇāṃ khalu prokṣaṇena saṃskārākhyoṃ'śo yathā janyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2774: sukhaṃ cāpratīyamānaṃ na puruṣārthaṃ ityata āha-svayañjyotiriti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2775: tadevaṃ svamatena mokṣākhyaṃ phalaṃ nityaṃ śrutyādibhirupapādya kriyāniṣpādyasya tu mokṣasyānityatvaṃ prasañjayati-tadyadīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2778: api ca jñānajanyāpūrvajanito mokṣo naiyogika ityasyārthasya santi bhūyasyaḥ śrutayo nivārikā ityāha-api ca brahma vedeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2779: avidyādvayapratibandhāpanayamātreṇa ca vidyāyā mokṣasādhanatvam na svato 'pūrvotpādena cetyatrāpi śrutīrudāharati-tvaṃ hi naḥ piteti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2794: mithyājñānaṃ cāvidyā rāgādyupajananakrameṇa dṛṣṭenaiva saṃsārasya paramaṃ nidānam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2803: yena mithyājñānaṃ bhedāvabhāsaṃ nivartayanna vidhiviṣayo bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2807: tathā ca vidheḥ prāgaprāptaṃ puruṣecchayā kartavyaṃ sat vidhigocaro bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2808: yathā vṛttyantaratvena manaso viśvedevasāmyādviśvāndevānmanasi saṃpādya mana ālambanamavidyamānasamaṃ kṛtvā prādhānyena saṃpādyānāṃ viśveṣāmeva
GSP33brsvbh1u:2810: evaṃ cidrūpasāmyājjīvasya brahmarūpatāṃ saṃpādya jīvamālambanamavidyamānasamaṃ kṛtvā prādhānyena brahmānucintanam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2824: prāyaṇakāle hi sa eva sarvāṇīndriyāṇi saṃgṛhyotkrāmatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2825: seyaṃ saṃvargadṛṣṭirvāyau prāṇe ca daśāśāgataṃ jagaddarśayati yathā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2826: evaṃ jīvātmani bṛṃhaṇakriyayā brahmadṛṣṭismṛtatvāya phalāya kalpata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2829: 'ājyaiḥ stuvate praugaṃ śaṃsati iti stutaśastre samāmnāte,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2833: vā apūrvārthatvena pradhānakarmaṇi veti saṃdehe kratūpayogidevatāsmaraṇasya dṛṣṭatvādguṇakarmatve
GSP33brsvbh1u:2839: ātmā tu dravyaṃ karmaṇi guṇa iti saṃskāro vātmano darśanaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2842: evaṃ kartṛtvena kratvaṅgabhūte ātmani 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ'iti darśanaṃ guṇakarma vidhīyate / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2843: FN: 3-(jai. 2 / 1 / 8) tasyārthaḥ-yairavaghātādirdravyaṃ cikīrṣyate saṃskartumiṣyate guṇastatra pratīyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2845: 'yaistu dravyaṃ cikīrṣyate guṇastatra pratīyeta'iti nyāyādata āha-na cedaṃ brahmātmaikatvavijñānamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2849: darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇe hi samāmnātamājyāvekṣaṇaṃ tadaṅgabhūtājyasaṃskāra iti yujyate / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2851: naca 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ'ityādi kasyacitprakaraṇe samāmnātam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2853: 'yasya pūrṇamayī juhūrbhavati'ityavyabhicaritakratusaṃbandhajuhūdvāreṇa juhūpadaṃ kratuṃ smārayadvākyena yathā parṇatāyāḥ kratuśeṣabhāvamāpādayati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2855: yena taddarśanaṃ kratvaṅgaṃ sadātmānaṃ kratvarthaṃ saṃskuryāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2857: FN: 1-'tasmātsuvarṇaṃ hiraṇyaṃ bhāryaṃ durvaṇo 'sya bhātṛvyo bhavati'ityanārabhyādhīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2858: tatra kiṃ śobhanahiraṇyadhāraṇaṃ kratvaṅgamuta puruṣadharma iti saṃdehe durvarṇakāma ityaśravaṇāt svatantraphalakalpane gauravāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2861: hiraṇyasādhanakaṃ dhāraṇaṃ vākyaśeṣagataphalāya vidhīyata iti puruṣadharmaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2863: 'suvarṇaṃ bhāryam'itivat viniyogabhaṅgena pradhānakarmaivāpūrvaviṣayatvānna guṇakarmeti sthavīyastayaitaddūṣaṇamanabhidhāya sarvapakṣasādhāraṇaṃ dūṣaṇamuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2865: kiṃ ca jñānakriyāviṣayatvavidhānamasya bahuśrutiviruddhamityāha-na ca vidikriyeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2871: sarvameva hi vākyaṃ nedantayā vastubhedaṃ bodhayitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2874: tena pramāṇāntarasiddhe laukike evārthe yadā gatiridṛśī śabdasya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2879: tvaṃpadārtho hi pramātā pramāṇādhīnayā pramityā prameyaṃ ghaṭādi vyāpnotītyavidyāvilasitam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2880: tadasyā viṣayībhūtodāsīnatatpadārthapratyagātmasāmānādhikaraṇyena pramātṛtvābhāvāt tannivṛttau pramāṇādayastisro vidhā nivartante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2881: na hi pakturavastutve pākyapākapacanāni vastusanti bhavitumarhantīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2882: tathā hi-'vigalitaparāgvṛttyarthatvaṃ tvaṃpadasya tadastadā tvamiti hi padenaikārthatve tvamityapi yatpadam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2883: tadapi ca tadā gatvaikārthyaṃ viśuddhacidātmatāṃ tyajati sakalānkartṛtvādīnpadārthamalānnijān //
GSP33brsvbh1u:2891: tathā ca viśuddhavijñānotpādo mokṣa iti nirvartyo mokṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2892: anyeṣāṃ tu saṃskārarūpāvasthāmapahāya yā kaivalyāvasthāvāptirātmanaḥ sa mokṣa iti vikāryo mokṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2897: 'atha yadataḥ paro divo jyotirdīpyate'iti śruterbrahmaṇo vikṛtāvikṛtadeśabhedāvagamādavikṛtadeśabrahmaprāptirūpāsanādividhikāryā bhaviṣyati
GSP33brsvbh1u:2898: tathā ca prāpyakarmatā brahmaṇa ityata āha-na cāpyatvenāpīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2901: madhye tu praśāntasakalakallolopasargaḥ svacchaḥ sthiratayāvikṛtastasya madhyamavikṛtaṃ pautikaḥ potena prāpnoti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2904: atha jīvo brahmaṇo bhinnastathāpi na tena brahmāpyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2910: tena hi tatkusumaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ lākṣārasasavarṇaṃ phalaṃ prasūte /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2913: guṇo hi brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvo vā bhinno vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2938: kriyā hi brahmasamavetā vā brahma saṃskuryāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2943: FN: 1-yadyapi caitrasamavetā bhāvanā darpaṇasyopakaroti tathāpi saṃyogavibhāgākhyadhātvarthadvārā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2947: na hi darpaṇe nighṛṣyamāṇe maṇirviśuddho dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2956: anādyanirvācyāvidyopadhānameva brahmaṇo jīva iti ca kṣetrajña iti cācakṣate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2961: tenātrāpi yadāśritā kriyā sāṃvyavahārikapramāṇaviṣayīkṛtā tasyaiva saṃskāro nānyasyeti na vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2962: tattvatastu na kriyā na saṃskāra iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2963: sanidarśanaṃ tu śeṣamadhyāsabhāṣye eva kṛtavyākhyānamiti neha vyākhyātam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2978: yayā mokṣasya karmatā ghaṭiṣyata ityata āha-ato 'nyaditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2981: etaduktaṃ bhavati-catasṛṇāṃ vidhānāṃ madhye 'nyatamatayā kriyāphalatvaṃ vyāptam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2982: sā ca mokṣādvyāvartamānā vyāpakānupalabdhyā mokṣasya kriyāphalatvaṃ vyāvartayatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2984: tathā ca tadarthāni śāstrāṇi tadarthāśca pravṛttayo 'narthakānītyata upasaṃhāravyājenāha-tasmājjñānamekamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2985: atha jñānaṃ kriyā mānasī kasmānna vidhigocaraḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2986: kasmācca tasyāḥ phalaṃ nirvartyādiṣvanyatamaṃ na mokṣa iti codayati-nanu jñānamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2993: tadetasminvailakṣaṇye sthite eva vailakṣaṇyāntaramāha-kriyā hi nāma seti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2996: yathā vā yoṣiti agnivastvanapekṣāgnibuddhiḥ-yā sā kriyā hi nāmeti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2997: na hi 'yasyai devatāyai havirgṛhītaṃ syāttāṃ dhyāyedvaṣaṭkariṣyan'ityasmādvidheḥ prāgdevatādhyānaṃ prāptam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3001: na hyasau svasāmagrībalalabdhajanmā san manujecchayānyathākartumakartuṃ vā śakyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3005: tayoranvayavyatirekāvadhṛtasāmarthyayoḥ sākṣātkāre vā anādyavidyāpanaye vā vidhimantareṇa prāptatvena puruṣecchayānyathākartumakartuṃ vā aśakyatvāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:3022: sa eva ca heya upādeyo vā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3023: yaṃ puruṣaḥ kartumakartumanyathā vā kartuṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3024: tatraiva ca samarthaḥ kartādhikṛto niyojyo bhavati /
