GSP33brsvbh1u:3026: FN: 2-śravaṇaṃ nāma brahmātmani 'tattvamasi'ityādivākyakadambasya tātparyanirṇayānukūlo vyāpāraḥ tarkarūpaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3031: iti prayuktā api liṅādayaḥ pravartanāyāmasamarthā upala iva kṣurataikṣṇyaṃ kuṇṭhamapramāṇībhavantīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3034: asāmarthye tu na kartṛtāyato nādhikṛto 'to na niyojya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3040: anyataḥ prāptā eva hi śravaṇādayo vidhisarūpairvākyairanūdyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3045: udghāṭyata iti pravṛttiviśeṣakaratā anuvādānāmastīti saprayojanatayā svādhyāyavidhyadhīnagrahaṇatvamupapadyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3047: svato 'sya puruṣārthatve siddhe yadanuṣṭhānānaṅgatvaṃ tadbhūṣaṇaṃ na dūṣaṇamityāha-yadapīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3062: atha tu bhūte 'pyarthe padānāṃ loke śakyaḥ saṃgatigrahastata upaniṣadāntatparatvaṃ paurvāparyaparyālocanayāvagamyamānamapahṛtya na kāryaparatvaṃ śakyaṃ kalpayitum,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3065: yadi tatparaḥ prayogo na loke dṛśyeta,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3067: na tāvattatparaḥ prayogo na dṛśyate loke /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3081: na cāyamapratipādayan harṣahetumarthaṃ harṣāya kalpata ityanena harṣaheturartha ukta iti pratipadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3082: harṣahetvantarasya cāpratīteḥ putrajanmanaśca taddhetoravagamāttadeva vārttāhāreṇābhyadhāyīti niścinoti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3085: evaṃ ca brahmasvarūpajñānasya paramapuruṣārthahetubhāvādanupadiśatāmapi puruṣapravṛttinivṛttī vedāntānāṃ puruṣahitānuśāsanācchāstratvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3096: upanīya advayaṃ brahma savāsanāmavidyāṃ hinastīti brahmavidyāmāha /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3102: anyaśeṣaṃ hi bhūtaṃ dravyaṃ cikīrṣitaṃ sadutpattyādyāpyaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3109: upaniṣadāmanārabhyādhītānāṃ paurvāparyaparyālocanayā puruṣapratipādanaparatvena puruṣasyaiva prādhānyenedaṃ prakaraṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3111: ataḥ svaprakaraṇasthaḥ so 'yaṃ tathāvidha upaniṣadbhyaḥ pratīyamāno na nāstīti śakyo vaktumityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3113: mānāntarogocaratvenāgṛhītasaṃgatitayā apadārthasya brahmaṇo vākyārthatvānupapatteḥ kathamupaniṣadarthatetyata āha-sa eṣa neti netyātmetyātmaśabdāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:3115: tathāpi prakāśātmana eva satastattadupādhiparihāṇyā śakyaṃ vākyārthatvena nirūpaṇam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3119: tena 'sa eṣa neti netyātmā'iti tattadavacchedaparihāṇyā bṛhattvādāpanācca svayaṃprakāśaḥ śakyo vākyāt brahmeti cātmeti ca nirūpayitumityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3120: athopādhinirāsavadupahitamapyātmarūpaṃ kasmānna nirasyata ityata āha-ātmanaśca pratyākhyātumaśakyatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3123: na hi jātu rajjvabhāve rajjvāṃ bhujaṅga iti vā dhāreti vā vibhramo dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3124: api cātmānaḥ prakāśasya bhāsā prapañcasya prabhā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3125: tathā ca śrutiḥ 'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3126: na cātmanaḥ prakāśasya pratyākhyāne prapañcaprathā yuktā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3129: sarvajanīnāhaṃpratyayaviṣayo hyātmā kartā bhoktā ca saṃsārī,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3131: ya eva laukikāḥ śabdāsta eva vaidikāsta eva ca teṣāmarthā ityaupaniṣadamapyātmapadaṃ tatraiva pravartitumarhati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3135: ahaṃpratyayaviṣayo yaḥ kartā kāryakaraṇasaṃghātopahito jīvātmā-tat sākṣitvena,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3139: śuddhaṃ tu rūpaṃ tasya sākṣitacca mānāntarānadhigatamupaniṣadgocara iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3144: tathā ca śrutiḥ 'na vā are sarvasya kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavati ātmanastu kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavati'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3145: api cātaḥ sarveṣāmātmatvādeva na heyo nāpyupādeyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3151: tasmāddheyopādeyaviṣayau vidhiniṣedhau na tadviparītamātmatattvaṃ viṣayīkuruta iti sarvasya prapañcajātasyātmaiva tattvamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3155: yaśca paramārthāsan asau prakṛtiḥ rajjutattvamiva sarpavibhramasya vikārasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3158: na hi sahasramapi śilpino ghaṭaṃ paṭayitumīśata ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3160: puruṣa eva hi sarvasya prapañcavikārajātasya tattvam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3161: na ca puruṣasyāsti vināśo yato 'nanto vināśaḥ syādityata āha-puruṣo hi vināśahetvabhāvāditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3163: atha mā bhūtsvarūpeṇa puruṣo heya upādeyo vā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3167: api cātmanaḥ paramārthasato dharmo 'pi paramārthasanniti na tasyātmavadanyathātvaṃ kāraṇaiḥ śakyaṃ kartum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3175: na hi somaśarmaṇi prakṛte tadguṇābhidhānaṃ parisaṃcaṣṭe viṣṇuśarmaṇo guṇavattām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3180: nahi te kriyārthā ityata āha-api cāmnāyasyeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3186: FN: 1-'codanā hi bhūtaṃ bhavantaṃ bhaviṣyantamityevañjātīyakaṃ śaknotyavagamayitum'iti śābarabhāṣye vidhivākyasya bhūtārthabodhakatvaṃ pratīyate tatkathaṃ dravyādeḥ kriyābodhitā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3191: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-na tāvatkāryārthā eva svārthe padānāṃ saṃgatigraho nānyārtha ityupapāditaṃ bhūte 'pyarthe vyutpattiṃ darśayadbhiḥ / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:3195: na hi pratyekaṃ svapradhānatayā guṇapradhānabhāvarahitānāmekavākyatā dṛṣṭā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3198: na ghaṭate 'tastatsiddhyai ekavākyatvāya ca lakṣaṇayānvitaparatvaṃ kalpyate tādṛkprayojanābhāve
GSP33brsvbh1u:3207: tathā cārthāntarasaṃsargaparatāmātreṇa vākyārthapratyayopapattau na kāryasaṃsargaparatvaniyamaḥ padānām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3211: bhavyasaṃsargiṇā rūpeṇa tasyāpi bhavyatvādityata āha-na hi bhūtamupadiśyamānamiti / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:3212: FN: 4-bhavyasaṃsargiṇā rūpeṇa bhūtamapi bhavyamityatra kiṃ bhavyaṃ kāryamuta kriyā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3214: na tādātmyalakṣaṇaḥ saṃsargaḥkiṃ tu kāryeṇa saha prayojanaprayojanilakṣaṇo 'nvayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3215: tadviṣayeṇa tu bhāvārthena bhūtārthānāṃ kriyākārakalakṣaṇa iti na bhūtārthānāṃ kriyārthatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3223: bhūtaviṣayā dṛśyamānā mṛtvā śīrtvā vā na kathañcitkriyāniṣṭhatāṃ gamayitumucitāḥ / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:3224: FN: 6-kāryānvayo hi na śabdārthaḥ kintu upādhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3230: ato virahayyāpi kāryānvayaṃ prayogabhede bhavati bhūtaṃ vastu padavācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3233: tathā ca vartamānāpadeśā astikriyopahitā akāryārthā apyaṭavīvarṇakādayo loke bahulamupalabhyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3238: na hi pṛcchatā puruṣasya vā tarūṇāṃ vāstitvanāstitve pratipitsite,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3239: kiṃ tu puruṣasya svāmibhedastarūṇāṃ ca prakārabhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3240: praṣṭurapekṣitaṃ cācakṣāṇaḥ svāmibhedameva prakārabhedameva ca prativyakti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3243: upapāditā ca bhūte 'pyarthe vyutpattiḥ prayojanavati padānām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3244: codayati-yadi nāmopadiṣṭaṃ bhūtaṅkiṃ tava-upadeṣṭuḥ śroturvā prayojanaṃsyāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3252: api ca ye 'pi kāryaparatvaṃ sarveṣāṃ padānāmāsthiṣata,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3254: 'na surā pātavyā'ityādīnāṃ na kāryaparatā śakyā āsthātum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3255: kṛtyupahitamaryādaṃ hi kāryaṃ kṛtyā vyāptaṃ tannivṛttau nivartate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3258: viṣayaścāsya sādhyasvabhāvatayā bhāvārtha eva pūrvāparībhūto 'nyotpādānukūlātmā bhavitumarhati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3263: FN: 1-bhāvārthāḥ-dhātvarthoparaktabhāvanā yeṣu bhāti tādṛśā ye karmaśabdāḥ-kriyāvācakā yajatyādayastebhyaḥ kriyā-apūrvaṃ pratīyeta na dravyaguṇaśabdebhya iti tadarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3265: bhāva ityādibhyo nāpūrvaṃ pratīyata iti karmaśabdā ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3283: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimaindravāyavādivākye vihitānāṃ somarasānāṃ yāgānāṃ ca yathākramaṃ soma-yāgaśabdāvanuvaditārāvuta dravyayuktasya karmaṇo vidhātārāviti
GSP33brsvbh1u:3284: tatraindravāyavādivākyeṣu dravyadevatākhyayāgarūpapratīteryāgānumānāditaratra rūpāpratīteḥ samudāyānuvāda iti prāpte rāddhāntitaṃ dvitīye-nānuvādatvamapratyabhijñānāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:3287: evaṃ hi yathā somenetivākye viśiṣṭavidhirevaṃ dadhisāṃtatyavākyāni yadi dravyaguṇaviśiṣṭahomāghāravidhāyīni
GSP33brsvbh1u:3288: tarhi agnihotrādhāravākye tadvihitahomānāmāghārāṇāṃ ca samudāyāvanuvadetāṃ tathāsati
GSP33brsvbh1u:3292: tatsaṃnidhau śrutasya sāṃtatyasya dadhyādivākyasya viśiṣṭavidhitve gauravaprasaṅgena,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3294: naitāvatā dadhyādivākye bhāvārthaviṣayaṃ kāryaṃ virudhyata ityabhyupagamaḥ / @----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:3300: tatra dravyaguṇayoḥ kāryaṃ prati sākṣādaviṣayatve.pi bhāvārthaṃ pratyanubandhatayā vidhīyetetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3304: bhāvārtho hi kārakavyāpāramātratayāviśiṣṭaḥ kārakaviśeṣeṇa dravyādinā viśeṣyata iti dravyādistadanubandhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3305: tathā ca bhāvārthe vidhīyamāne sa eva sānubandho vidhīyata iti dravyaguṇāvaviṣayāvapi tadanubandhatayā vihitau bhavataḥ / ======================
GSP33brsvbh1u:3309: ayamāśayaḥ-yadyapyatra viśiṣṭo vidhiḥ pratīyate tathāpi bhāvārthadvārā dravyādikamapi viṣayīkaroti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3310: tatra saṃkrānto yadi bhāvārthamanyato vihitaṃ na labheta tarhi gauravamapyuparīkṛtya viśiṣṭaṃ vidadhītātha labheta tata upapadākṛṣṭaśaktirdravyādiparo bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3314: cānyataḥ prāptatayā tadanuvādena tadanubandhībhūtadravyādiparo bhavatīti sarvatra
GSP33brsvbh1u:3320: nanu na bhavatyartho vidheyaḥsiddhe bhavitari labdharūpasya bhavanaṃ pratyakartṛtvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3328: prayatna itinirviṣayaścāsāvaśakyapratipattirato viṣayāpekṣāyāmāgneyaśabdopasthāpito dravyadevatāsaṃbandha evāsya viṣayaḥ / ======================
GSP33brsvbh1u:3331: nanu vyāpāraviṣayaḥ puruṣaprayatnaḥ kathamavyāpārarūpaṃ saṃbandhaṃ gocarayet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3332: na hi ghaṭaṃ kurvityatrāpi sākṣānnāmārthaṃ ghaṭaṃ puruṣaprayatno gocarayatyapi tu daṇḍādi hastādinā vyāpārayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3335: uddeśyatayā tvasyāmasti ghaṭo na tu viṣayatayā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3338: NOTE 7-yataḥ yadāgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māvāsyāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ cācyuto bhavati ityādivākyena yāgo vidhīyate tasmāt 'ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsīṃ yajate'ityanuvāde yajata iti śrutaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3344: evāgneya ityatrāpi dravyadevatāsaṃbandhākṣipto yajireva kāryaviṣayo vidheyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3347: ata eva 'ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsyāṃ yajate' 'ya evaṃ vidvānamāvāsyāṃ yajate'ityanuvādo bhavati 'yadāgneyaḥ'ityādivihitasya yāgaṣaṭkasya / ======================
GSP33brsvbh1u:3349: ata eva ca vihitānūditasya tasyaiva 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta'ityādhikārasaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3353: tathā ca 'na hanyāt' 'na pibet'ityādiṣu yadi kāryamabhyupeyeta,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3356: evaṃ ca prajāpativratanyāyena paryudāsavṛttyāhananāpānasaṃkalpalakṣaṇayā tadviṣayo vidhiḥ syāt / ======================
GSP33brsvbh1u:3357: NOTE 10-evaṃ niyogakṛtidhātvarthānāṃ vyāpyavyāpakatvamuktvā vyāpakanivṛttyā vyāpyanivṛttimāha-tathāca prasajyeti / ======================
GSP33brsvbh1u:3359: na ca sati saṃbhave lakṣaṇā nyāyyā / ======================
GSP33brsvbh1u:3363: ekasmiṃśca vākye upasahārasya prakramādhīnatvādākhyātayogināpi nañā pratīto niṣedho 'nanuṣṭheyatvādupekṣyate tataścānīkṣaṇasaṃkalpalakṣaṇā yuktā
GSP33brsvbh1u:3368: tadabhāve ca tadvyāptasya kāryasyābhāva iti na kāryaparatvaniyamaḥ sarvatra vākye ityāha-brahmaṇo na hantavya ityevamādyā iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3370: tatsādhanaṃ vetyata āha-na ca sā kriyeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3377: na ca rāgataḥ pravṛttasya hananapānādāvakasmādaudāsīnyamupapadyate vinā vidhārakaprayatnamtasmātsa
GSP33brsvbh1u:3378: eva pravṛttyunmukhānāṃ manovāgdehānāṃ vidhārakaḥ prayatno niṣedhavidhigocaraḥ kriyeti
GSP33brsvbh1u:3379: nākriyāparamasti vākyaṃ kiñcidapīti āha-na ca hananakriyānivṛttyaudāsīnyavyatirekeṇa
GSP33brsvbh1u:3381: kena hetunā na śakyamityata āha-svabhāvaprāptahantyarthānurāgeṇa nañaḥ / ======================
GSP33brsvbh1u:3383: hananādi vā nañartho vā vidhārakaprayatno veti vikalpya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3385: ayamarthaḥ-hananapānaparo hi vidhipratyayaḥ pratīyamānaste eva vidhatte ityutsargaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3397: NOTE 3-nanu nañarthaścenna vidhīyate tarhi hananaṃ nāstītyādāviva siddhatayā pratīyetetyāśaṅkyāha-abhāvaśceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3400: sādhye ca sādhyavadbhāsata iti sādhyaviṣayo nañarthaḥ sādhyavadbhāsata iti nañarthaḥ kārya iti bhramaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3402: nanu bodhayatu saṃbandhino 'bhāvaṃ nañpravṛttyunmukhānāṃ tu manovāgdehānāṃ kuto 'kasmānnivṛttirityata āha-abhāvabuddhiścaudāsīnya ======================
GSP33brsvbh1u:3405: NOTE 2-vidhiniṣedhayoriṣṭāniṣṭopāyatvabodhakatvaṃ vyutpattibalāddarśayati-ayamabhiprāya ityādinā pravartakeṣu vākyeṣvityataḥ prāktanena granthena
GSP33brsvbh1u:3408: pravṛttiṃ bhujaṅgāṅgulidānonmukhasya ca tato nivṛttimupalabhya bālo vyutpitsuḥ prayojyavṛddhasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:3418: api tu bhūyobhūyaḥ svagatamālocayata uktakāraṇapūrvāveva pratyavabhāsete /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3421: sa cāvagamaḥ prāgabhūtaḥ śabdaśravaṇānantaramupajāyamānaḥ śabdaśravaṇahetuka iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:3422: pravartakeṣu vākyeṣu 'yajeta'ityādiṣu śabda eva kartavyamiṣṭasādhanaṃ vyāpāramavagamayaṃstasyeṣṭasādhanatāṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3436: tayā khalvayaṃ cetana āpātato ramaṇīyatāṃ paśyannapyāyatimālocya pravṛttyabhāvaṃ nivṛttimavabudhya nivartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3454: na ca kavacāpagame ca asati ca śastraprahāre,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3474: atraiva sukhaduḥkhānutpādabhedena nidarśanadvayamāha-na hi dhanina iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3481: yatpunaraśarīratvaṃ tadasya svabhāva iti na śakyaṃ nivartayitum,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3484: na mithyājñānanimittaṃ saśarīratvam api tu dharmādharmanimittam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3486: tannivṛttau ca prāyaṇameveti na jīvato 'śarīratvamiti śaṅkate-tatkṛteti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3491: vāgbuddhiśarīrārambhajanitau hi tau nāsati śarīrasaṃbandhe bhavataḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3492: tābhyāṃ tu śarīrasaṃbandhaṃ rocayamāno vyaktaṃ parasparāśrayatvaṃ doṣamāvahati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3499: na hi yato dharmādharmabhedādātmaśarīrasaṃbandhabhedastata eva sa dharmādharmabhedaḥ kintveṣa pūrvasmādātmaśarīrasaṃbandhātpūrvadharmādharmabhedajanmanaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3510: prasiddho vastubhedo yasya puruṣasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3515: evaṃ saṃśaye samāropitamaniścitamudāhṛtya viparyayajñāne niścitamudāharati-yathā vā śuktikāyāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3516: śuklabhāsvarasya dravyasya puraḥsthitasya sati śuktikārajatasādhāraṇye yāvadatra rajataviniścayo bhavati tāvatkasmācchuktiviniścaya eva na bhavati
GSP33brsvbh1u:3527: jīvato viduṣo 'śarīratve ca śrutismṛtī udāharati-tathā ceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3538: atha kasmānmananādividhireva na bhavatītyata āha-yadi hyavagatamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3539: na tāvanmanananididhyāsane pradhānakarmaṇī apūrvaviṣaye amṛtatvaphale ityuktamadhastāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3556: itarathā tu dharmajijñāsaiveti na śāstrāntaramiti na śāstrārambhatvaṃ syādityāha-pratipattividhiparatva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3557: na kevalaṃ siddharūpatvādbrahmātmaikyasya dharmādanyatvamapi tu tadvirodhādapītyupasaṃhāravyājenāha-tasmādahaṃ brahmāsmīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3560: te ca sādhyasādhanetikartavyatābhedādhiṣṭhānā dharmotpādinaśca tadadhiṣṭhānā na brahmātmaikye sati prabhavanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3563: api tu sarveṣāṃ pramāṇānāmityāha-sarvāṇi cetarāṇi pramāṇānīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3598: na ca pramāturātmano 'nveṣṭavya ātmānya ityāha-anviṣṭaḥ syātpramātaiva pāpmadoṣādivarjitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3615: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'vidyāṃ cāvidyāṃ ca yastadvedobhayaṃ saha /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3624: sūtrasaṃdarbheṇa sarvajñe sarvaśaktau jagadutpattisthitivināśakāraṇe prāmāṇyaṃ vedāntānāmupapāditam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3628: atra ca vipratipatteḥ pravādināṃ viśeṣānupalambhe sati saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3641: yadyapi ca sāmyāvasthāyāṃ pradhāne samudācaradvṛttinī kriyājñāne na staḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3643: tathā ca pradhānameva sarvajñaṃ ca sarvaśakti ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3649: bhogāpargalakṣaṇapuruṣārthadvayaprayuktānādipradhānapuruṣasaṃyoganimit tastu mahadahaṅkārādikrameṇācetanasyāpi cetanānadhiṣṭhitasya pradhānasya pariṇāmaḥ sargaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3656: 'api cāhurvṛddhāḥ-yathāgryaprāye likhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadanti bhavedayamagryaḥ iti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3658: tatteja aikṣata ityādyupacāraprāye kṣutam tadaikṣata ityaupacārikameva vijñeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3659: anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi iti ca pradhānasya jīvātmatvaṃ jīvārthakāritayāha /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3660: yathā hi bhadraseno rājārthakārī rājñā bhadraseno mamātmetyupacaryate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3661: evaṃ tattvamasi ityādyāḥ śrutayo bhāktāḥ saṃpattyarthā vā draṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3662: svamapīto bhavati iti ca niruktaṃ jīvasya pradhāne svakīye 'pyayaṃ suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ brūte /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3665: vṛttīnāmanyāsāṃ pramāṇādīnāmabhāvastasya pratyayakāraṇaṃ tamastadālambamā nidrā jīvasya vṛttirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3666: tathā sarvajñaṃ prastutya śvetāśvataramantro 'pi-sakāraṇaṃ karaṇādhipādhipaḥ iti prādhānābhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3668: tasmādacetanaṃ pradhānaṃ jagadupādānamanuvadanti śrutaya iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3673: sattvasaṃpattyā cedasya sarvajñatātha tamaḥsaṃpattyāsarvajñataivāsya kasmānna bhavatītyata āha-tena ca sattvadharmeṇa jñāneneti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3682: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadyapi rajastamasī api staḥ tathāpi puruṣārtaprayuktaguṇavaiṣamyātiśayātsattvasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:3683: niratiśayotkarṣe sārvajñyaṃ kāryamutpadyata iti pradhānavasthāyāmapi tanmātraṃ vivakṣitvāvivakṣitvā
GSP33brsvbh1u:3686: nahi kiñcidekaṃ kāryaṃ janayedapi tu bahūni /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3688: pradhānaṃ tu triguṇamiti tata eva kāryamutpattimarhati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3690: tavāpi ca yogyatāmātreṇaiva cidātmanarḥ vajñatābhyupagamo na kāryayogādityāha-tvayāpīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3701: jagadbījaṃ tadeveṣṭaṃ cetane ca sa āñjasaḥ //
GSP33brsvbh1u:3713: pārthivatve tulya iva maṇerbimbodgrāhitā na loṣṭādīnām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3718: akriyānimittasya ca kārakatvanivṛttau tadvyāptasya tadviśeṣasya kartṛtvasya nivṛtteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3720: tasya tvanavacchinnasya tattadviṣayopadhānamedāvacchedena kalpitabhedasyānityatvaṃ kāryatvaṃ copapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3721: tathā caivaṃlakṣaṇa īkṣaṇe sarvaviṣaye brahmaṇaḥ svātantryalakṣaṇaṃ kartṛtvamupapannam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3722: yadyapi ca kūṭasthanityasyāpariṇāmina audāsīnyamasya vāstavaṃ tathāpyanādyanirvacanīyavidyāvacchinnasya vyāpāravattvabhavabhāsata iti kartṛtvopapattiḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3723: parairapi ca cicchekteḥ kūṭasthanityāyā vṛttīḥ prati kartṛtvamīdṛśamevābhyupeyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3726: tadvṛttayaśca khaṃ vā paraṃ vā veditumutsahante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3727: no khalvandhāḥ sahasramapi pānthāḥ panthānaṃ vidanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3729: sa eva tarhi mārgadarśī svatantraḥ kartā netā teṣām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3730: evaṃ buddhisattvasya svayamacetanasya citibimbasaṃkrāntyā cedāpannaṃ caitanyasya jñātṛtvaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3738: sarvathā bhavanmate 'pi nedaṃ svābhāvikaṃ kvacidapi jñātṛtvaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3740: nityasyātmano jñānaṃ pariṇāma iti ca bhedābhedapakṣamapākurvadbhirapāstam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3741: kūṭasthasya nityasyātmano 'vyāpāravata eva bhinnaṃ jñānaṃ dharma iti copariṣṭādapākariṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3743: tasya kartā īśvaro jñātā sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktiriti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3744: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'tapasā cīyate brahma tato 'nnamabhijāyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3745: annātprāṇo manaḥ satyaṃ lokāḥ karmasu cāmṛtam //
GSP33brsvbh1u:3752: vyācikīrṣāyāṃ copacaye sati tato nāmarūpamannamadanīyaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ vyācikīrṣitamabhijāyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3753: tasmādavyākṛtādvyācikīrṣitādannātprāṇo hiraṇyagarbho brahmaṇo jñānakriyāśaktyadhiṣṭhānaṃ jagatsūtrātmā sādhāraṇo jāyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3757: tebhyaśca satyākhyebhyo 'nukrameṇa lokāḥ bhūrādayaḥ teṣu manuṣyādiprāṇino varṇāśramakrameṇa karmāṇi dharmādharmarūpāṇi jāyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3763: yasya bhagavato jñānamayaṃ tapo dharmo nāyāsamayam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3765: kiñca nāmarūpamannaṃ ca vrīhiyavādi jāyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3767: kṣetrajñānāṃ ca satyapi caitanye sargādau viṣayānīkṣaṇāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3773: iha tu mukhyasyautsargikatvena niścaye sati saṃśayābhāvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3781: na ca pradhānaṃ paramāṇavo vā tadatiriktasarvajñeśvarādhiṣṭhitā jagadupādānamiti sāṃprataṃ kāryatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3782: kāraṇātkāryāṇāṃ bhedābhāvāt kāraṇajñānena samastakāryaparijñānasya mṛdādinidarśanenāgamena prasādhitatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3784: sākṣācca 'ekamevādvitīyam''neha nānāsti kiñcana'mṛtyoḥ samṛtyumāpnotiḥityādibhirbrahmātiriktasya prapañcasya pratiṣedhācetanopādānameva jagat,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3786: sadupādānatve hi siddhe jagatastadupādānaṃ cetanamacetanaṃ veti saṃśayya mīmāṃsyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3792: yadyapyākāśādyā bhūtasṛṣṭistathāpi tejo 'bannānāmeva trivṛtkaraṇasya vivakṣitatvāttatra tejasaḥ prāthamyāttejaḥ prathamamuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3795: tadyathā-prācī pratīcī dakṣiṇodīcīti catasraḥ kalā brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavānnāma prathamaḥ pādaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3797: tathā pṛthivyantarīkṣaṃ dyauḥ samudra ityaparaścatasraḥ kalā dvitīyaḥ pādo 'nantavānnāma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3805: na cāvivakṣitārthasya dhātusvarūpasya cetanopādānasādhanatvasaṃbhava ityata āha-īkṣateriti dhātvarthanirdeśo 'bhimataḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3817: apica caitanyapradhānavṛttivacano jānātirna cācetane vṛttimātre dṛṣṭacaraprayoga ityāha-apica nāsākṣiketi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3818: kathaṃ tarhi yogināṃ sattvāśotkarṣahetukaṃ sarvajñatvamityata āha-yogināṃ tviti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3821: yadi tu kāpilamatamapahāya hairaṇyagarbhamāsthīyeta tatrāpyāha-atha punaḥ sākṣinimittamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3822: teṣāmapi hi prakṛṣṭasattvopādānaṃ puruṣaviśeṣasyaiva kleśakarmavipākāśayāparāmṛṣṭasya sarvajñatvaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3830: kiṃ vāstavaṃ karmābhāvamabhipretya vaiṣamyamāha bhavān uta tadvivakṣābhāvam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3835: atha ca prakāśasvabhāvaṃ pratyasti svātantryaṃ savituriti pariharati-na /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3842: yāsāṃ sati karmaṇyavivakṣite śrutīnāmupapattistāsāṃ sati karmaṇi vivakṣite sutarāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3844: yasya bhagavata īśvarasya prasādāt tasya nityasiddhasyeśvarasya nityaṃ jñānaṃ bhavatīti kimu vaktavyamiti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3848: vastuto nityasya kāraṇānapekṣāṃ svarūpeṇoktvā vyatirekamukhenāpyāha-api cāvidyādimata ityādi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3862: na tu ātmani svabhāvasiddhaprakāśe sa ghaṭata ityata āha-dṛśyate cātmana eva sata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3871: śaṅkottaratvena vā svātantryeṇa vā pradhānanirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3876: tacca na prathamaṃ sūkṣmatayā śakyaṃ śvetaketuṃ grāhayitumiti tatsaṃbaddhaṃ pradhānameva
GSP33brsvbh1u:3877: sthūlatayātmatvena grāhyate śvetaketurarundhatīmivātīva sūkṣmāṃ darśayituṃ tatsaṃnihitāṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3885: api ca jagatkāraṇaṃ prakṛtya svapitītyasya niruktaṃ karvitī śrutiścetanameva jagatkāraṇaṃ brūte /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3888: nahi mṛdātmā ghaṭa ātmīye 'pi pāthasi pralīyate 'pi tvātmabhūtāyāṃ mṛdyeva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3897: api tu teṣu sarvatra jagatkāraṇacetanyāvagatiḥ samāneti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3899: yathā hi sarveṣāṃ cakṣū rūpameva grāhayati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3904: 'tadaikṣata'ityatra īkṣaṇamātraṃ jagatkāraṇasya śrutaṃ na tu sarvaviṣayam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3906: śvetāśvatarāṇāṃ tūpaniṣadi sarvajña īśvaro jagatkāraṇamiti sākṣāduktamiti viśeṣaḥ / 11 //
GSP33brsvbh1u:3910: śastraṃ ca sarvajñe sarvaśaktau jagadutpattisthitipralayakāraṇaṃ brahmaṇyeva pramāṇaṃ na pradhānādāviti nyāyato vyutpāditam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3911: na cāsti kaścidvedāntabhāgo yastadviparītamapi bodhayediti ca 'gatisāmānyāt'ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3917: yadyapi tatvato nirastasamastopādhirūpaṃ brahma tathāpi na tena rūpeṇa śakyamupadeṣṭumityupahitena rūpeṇopadeṣṭavyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3929: kathaṃ ca phalabhedaṃ ityata āha-eka eva tviti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3932: nanu yadyeka ātmā kūṭasthanityo niratiśayaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3933: kathametasmin bhūtāśraye tāratamyaśrutayā ityata āha-yadyapyeka ātmeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3934: yadyapi niratiśayamekameva rūpamātmana aiśvaryaṃ ca jñānaṃ cānandaśca,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3943: yathottamaprakāśaḥ savitā diṅmaṇḍalamekarūpeṇaiva prakāśenāpūrayannapi varṣāsu nikṛṣṭaprakāśa iva śaradi tu prakṛṣṭaprakāśa iva prathate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3949: vikāraśabdān neti cen na prācuryāt / BBs_1,1.13 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3954: 'ānandamaya iti hi vikāre prācurye ca mayaṭastulyaṃ mukhyārthatvamiti vikārārthānnamayādipadaprāyapāṭhādānandamayapadamapi vikārārthameveti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3955: na ca prāṇamayādiṣu vikārārthatvāyogātsvārthiko mayaḍiti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3960: priyādibhāgī śarīro jīvo na brahma yujyate //
GSP33brsvbh1u:3966: nahi devadatto balavānityukte sarvānsiṃhaśārdūlādīnapi prati balavānapratīyate 'pi tu samānajātīyanarāntaramapekṣya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3971: na tu brahmarūpaṃ jñeyatveneti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3975: ānandaprācurya hi tadviparītaduḥkhalavasaṃbhave bhavati na tu tadatyantāsaṃbhave /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3978: aśarīrasya punarapriyasaṃbandho manāgapi nāstīti prācuryārtho 'pi mayaḍ nopapadyayata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3982: tathāca tadadhikāre paṭhitamabhyasyamānamānandapadaṃ tadbuddhimādhatta iti tasyaivānandamayasyābhyāsa iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3983: jyotiṣṭomādhikāre 'vasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeta'iti jyotiḥpadamiva jyotiṣṭomābhyāsaḥ kālaviśeṣavidhiparaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3995: mantre hi punaḥ punaḥ 'anyo 'ntara ātmā'iti parabrahmaṇyāntaratvaśravaṇāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3999: māntravarṇikameva paraṃ brahma brāhmaṇe 'pyānandamaya iti gīyata iti //15//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4010: rasaḥ sāro hyayamānandamaya ātmā 'rasaṃ hyevāyaṃ labdhvā'nandī bhavati'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4014: tasmādānandamayasya jīvātmano bhede parabrahmatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4017: kathaṃ tarhi paramātmano vastuto 'bhinnena jīvātmanā paramātmā labhyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4024: na jīvasyāvidyayāpi svato bhedo darśita iti na labdhṛlabdhavyabhāva ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4027: yathā parameśvarādbhinno jīvātmā draṣṭā na bhavatyevaṃ jīvātmano 'pi draṣṭurna bhinnaḥ parameśvara iti jīvasyānirvācyatve parameśvaro 'pyanirvācyaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4029: rajataṃ hi samāropitaṃ na śuktito bhidyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4030: na hi tadbhedenābhedena vā śakyaṃ nirvaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4037: eṣa tāvadutsargo yat-'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭheti brahmaśabdātpratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4040: ihāpyavayavaparatvātpucchapadasya tatsamānādhikaraṇaṃ brahmapadamapi svārthatyāgena kathañcidavayavaparaṃ vyākhyāyātām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4044: ānandapadābhyāsena ca jyotiḥ padeneva jyotiṣṭoma anandamayo lakṣyatāṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4051: pucchapadaṃ hi vāladhau mukhyaṃ sadānandamayāvayave gauṇameveti mukhyaśabdārthalaṅghanamavayavaparatāyāmadhikaraṇaparatāyāṃ ca tulyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4067: tathā ca māntravarṇikasya brahmaṇa eva brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti svapradhānasyābhidhānāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4069: 'so 'kāmayeta'ityādyā api śrutayo brahmaviṣayā na ānandamayaviṣayā ityarthasaṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4074: etaduktaṃ bhavati-ānandamaya ityādivākye yat 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā'iti brahmapadaṃ tatsvapradhānameveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4079: yat 'satyaṃ jñānam'ityādinā mantravarṇena brahmoktaṃ tadevopāyabhūtena brāhmaṇena svapradhānyena gīyate-'brahma pucchaṃpratiṣṭhā'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4083: atra 'itaścānandamayaḥ'iti bhāṣyasya sthāne 'itaśca brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā'iti paṭhitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4085: atrāpi 'itaścānandamayaḥ'ityasya ca 'ānandamayādhikāre'ityasya ca bhāṣyasya sthāne 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā'iti 'brahmapucchādhikāre'iti ca paṭhitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4088: ityanayorapi sūtrayorbhāṣye ānandamayasthāne 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā'iti pāṭho draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4089: vikārasyānandamayasya brahma pucchamavayavaścetkathaṃ sarvasyāsya vikārajātasya sānandamayasya brahma pucchaṃ kāraṇamucyeta 'idaṃ sarvamasṛjata
GSP33brsvbh1u:4091: nahyānandamayavikārāvayavo brahma vikāraḥ san sarvasya kāraṇamupapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4092: tasmādānandamayavikārāvayavo brahmeti tadavayavayogyānandamayo vikāra iha nopāsyatvena vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4093: kintu svapradhānamiha brahma pucchaṃ jñeyatveneti siddham // 19//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4099: brahmaiva tu pradhānaṃ 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā'iti jñeyatvenopakṣiptamiti nirṇītam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4107: 'ye cāmuṣmātparāñco lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣṭe devakāmānāṃ ca'ityaiśvaryamaryādāśruteśca saṃsāryeva kāryakāraṇasaṃghātātmako rūpādisaṃpanna ihopāsyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4113: rūpādimattvānyathānupapattyā ca kāryakāraṇātmake jīve upāsyatvena vivakṣite yattāvadṛgādyātmakatayāsya
GSP33brsvbh1u:4114: sarvātmakatvaṃ śrūyate tatkathañcidādityapuruṣasyaiva stutiriti ādityapuruṣa evopāsyo
GSP33brsvbh1u:4116: anādhāratve ca nityatvaṃ sarvagatatvaṃ ca hetuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4118: nityamapyasarvagataṃ ca yattasmādadharabhāvenāsthitaṃ tadeva tasyottarasyādhāra iti nānādhāraṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4124: na cādityasya devatāyāḥ karmānadhikāre 'pi sarvapāpmavirahaḥ prāgbhavīyadharmādharmarūpapāpmasaṃbhave sati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4125: na caiteṣāṃ prāgbhavīyo dharma evāsti na pāpmeti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4130: tatra tatra sarvapāpmavirahasya bhūyobhūyo brahmaṇyeva śravaṇāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4162: tatra 'ākāśa iti hovāca'iti kiṃ mukhyakāśapādānurodhena 'asya lokasya kā gatiḥ'iti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4163: 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni'iti 'jyāyā'itica 'parāyaṇam'iti ca kathañcidvyākhyāyatāṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4167: 'asya lokasya kā gatiḥ'iti praśnottare 'ākāśa iti hovāca'ityākāśasya gatitvena pratipādyatayā prādhānyāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4171: tena tadanuraktāyāṃ buddhau yadyadeva tadekavākyagatamupanipatati tattajjaghanyatayā upasaṃjātavirodhi tadānuguṇyenaiva vyavasthānamarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4172: naca kkacidākāśaśabdo bhaktyā brahmaṇi prayukta iti sarvatra tena tatpareṇa bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4173: nahi gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra gaṅgapadamanupapattyā tīraparamiti yādāṃsi gaṅgāyāmityatrāpyanena tatpareṇa bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4180: tadānuguṇyena ca 'sarvāṇi ha vā'ityādīni bhāṣyakṛtā svayameva nītāni /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4189: tadiha, 'asya lokasya kā gatiḥ'iti praśno dṛśyamānanāmarūpaprapañcamātragativiṣaya iti tadanurodhādya eva sarvasya lokasya gatiḥ sa evākāśaśabdena prativaktavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4195: naca praśnena pūrvapakṣarūpeṇānavasthitārthenottaraṃ vyavasthitārthaṃ na śakyaṃ niyantumiti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4199: tathāhi-'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyakāśādeva samutpadyante'iti sarvaśabdaḥ kathañcidalpaviṣayo vyākhyeyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4201: na khalvapāmākāśa eva kāraṇamapi tu tejo 'pi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4202: evamannasyāpi nākāśameva kāraṇamapi tu pāvakapāthasī api /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4216: tathāca tadarthaṃ sat ākāśapadaṃ pradhānārthaṃ bhavati, nānyathā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4222: tatra tatra brahmaṇyākāśaśabdasya tatparyāyasya ca prayogaprācuryādatyantābhyāsenāsyāpi
GSP33brsvbh1u:4227: yatra tu na śakyaṃ tatrottarānuguṇyenaiva prathamaṃ nīyata ityāha-vākyopakrame 'pīti //22//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4230: udgīthe-'yā devatā prastāvamanvāyattā'ityupakramya śrūyate-'katamā sā devateti prāṇa iti hovāca'uṣastiścākrāyaṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4232: prastāva iti sāmno bhaktiviśeṣastamanvāyattā anugatā prāṇo devatā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4233: atra prāṇaśabdasya brahmaṇi vāyuvikāre ca darśanātsaṃśayaḥ-kimayaṃ brahmavacana uta vāyuvikāravacana iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4234: tatra ata eva brahmaliṅgādeva prāṇo 'pi brahmaiva na vāyuvikāra iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4239: ākāśasya vā vāyvādibhūtakāraṇatvaṃ prati nāgamādṛte mānāntaraṃ prabhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4240: tatra paurvāparyaparyālocanayā yatrārthe samañjasa āgamaḥ sa evārthastasya gṛhyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4242: iha tu saṃveśanodgamane bhūtānāṃ prāṇaṃ pratyucyamāne kiṃ brahma pratyucyete āho
GSP33brsvbh1u:4243: vāyuvikāraṃ pratīti viśaye 'yadā vai puruṣaḥ svapiti prāṇaṃ tarhi vāgapyeti'ityādikāyāḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:4247: api cātrodgīthapratihārayoḥ sāmabhaktyorbrahmaṇo 'nye ādityaścānnaṃ ca devate abhihite kāryakāraṇasaṃghātarūpe,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4254: 'no khalu svataḥsiddhapramāṇabhāvamapauruṣeyaṃ vacaḥ svaviṣayajñānotpāde vā tadvyavahāre vā mānāntaramapekṣate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4258: tasmādasaṃvādino vā cakṣuṣa iva rūpe tvagindriyasaṃvādino vā tasyaiva dravye nādārḍhyaṃ vā dārḍhyaṃ vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4261: pratītau vā tatrāpi prāṇo brahmaiva bhavenna vāyuvikāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4262: 'yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'ityatra vākye yathā prāṇaśabdo brahmavacanaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4263: na cāsminvāyuvikāre sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ saṃveśanodgamane mānāntareṇa dṛśyete /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4273: tathā copāsakasya prāṇaprāptiḥ karmasamṛddhirvā phalaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4279: idamāmananti-'atha yadataḥ paro divo jyotirdīpyate niśvataḥpṛṣṭheṣu sarvataḥ pṛṣṭheṣvanuttameṣūttameṣu lokeṣvidaṃ vāva tadyadidamasminnantaḥ puruṣe jyotiḥ'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4280: yajjyotirato divo dyulokātparaṃ dīpyate prakāśate viśvataḥpṛṣṭheṣu viśveṣāmupari /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4281: asaṃkucadvṛttirayaṃ viśvaśabdo 'navayavatvena saṃsāramaṇḍalaṃ brūta iti darśayitumāha-sarvataḥpṛṣṭheṣūttameṣu /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4282: na cedamuttamamātraṃ apitu sarvottamamityāha-anuttameṣunāstyebhyo 'nya uttama ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4284: śrotragrāhyeṇa ca pihitakarṇena puṃsā ghoṣeṇa liṅgenānumīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4289: atra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ jyotiḥśabdaḥ teja uta brahmeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4296: kokṣeyajyotiḥsārūpyaṃ ca cakṣuṣyo rūpavān śruto viśruto bhavatītyalpaphalatvaṃ ca svavākye śrūyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4297: na jātu jvalanāparanāmā dīptirvinā tejo brahmaṇi saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4301: audarye tu tejasyadhyasya bāhyaṃ teja upāsanametat phalānurūpaṃ yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4306: tasya sauryādeḥ sāvayavatvena tadekadeśamaryādāsaṃbhavāt tasya copāsyatvena vidhānāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4309: naca 'pādo 'sya sarvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi'iti brahmapratipādakaṃ vākyāntaraṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4310: 'yadataḥ paro divo jyotiḥ'śabdaṃ brahmaṇi vyavasthāpayatīti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4311: nahi saṃnidhānamātradvākyāntareṇa vākyāntaragatā śrutiḥ śakyā mukhyārthāntryāvayitum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4312: naca vākyāntare 'dhikaraṇatvena dyauḥ śrutā diva iti maryādāśrutau śakyā pratyabhijñātum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4313: apica vākyāntarasyāpi brahmārthatvaṃ prasādhyameva nādyāpi sidhyati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4314: tatkathaṃ tena niyantuṃ brahmaparatayā 'yadataḥ paraḥ'iti vākyaṃ śakyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4316: tejaḥkathanaprastāve tamaḥkathanaṃ pratipakṣopanyāsena pratipakṣāntare dṛḍhā pratītirbhavatītyetadartham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4327: 'ekaikāṃ trivṛtaṃ trivṛtaṃ karavāṇi'iti tejaḥprabhṛtyupāsanāmātraviṣayā śrutirna saṃkocayituṃ yuktetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4328: evamekadeśini dūṣite paramasamādhātā pūrvapakṣī brūte-astu tarhi trivṛtkṛtameveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4331: tathāpi yathā kārye jyotiṣyatiśayenopapadyate na tathātretyata uktam-upapadyetatarāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4337: brahmaṇyeva pradhānaṃ hi brahmacchando na tatra tu //
GSP33brsvbh1u:4341: tatra vacanāni tvapūrvatvāditi sarvanāmnaḥ prasiddhārthatvaṃ balādapanīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4343: tadiha 'yadataḥ paro divo jyotiḥ'iti yacchabdasāmarthyāt dyumaryādenāpi jyotiṣā prasiddhena bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4345: pūrvavākye ca dyusaṃbandhitayā tripādbrahma prasiddhamiti prasiddhyapekṣāyāṃ tadeva saṃbadhyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4346: naca pradhānasya prātipadikārthasya tattvena pratyabhijñāne tadviśeṣaṇasya vibhaktyarthasyānyatāmātreṇānyatā yuktā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4347: evaṃ ca tadvākyasthāni tejoliṅgānyasamañjasānīti brahmaṇyeva gamayitavyāni,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4350: athavā prakāśamātravacano jyotiḥśabdaḥ prakāśaśca brahmeti brahmaṇi mukhya iti jyotirbahmeti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4363: chando 'bhidhānān neti cen na tathā ceto'rpaṇanigadāt tathā hi darśanam / BBs_1,1.25 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4367: 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ yadidaṃ kiñca'iti gāyatrīṃ prakṛtyedaṃ śrūyate-'tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4371: evaṃ 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam'ityakṣarasaṃniveśamātrasya gāyatryā na sarvatvamupapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4374: tasmādgāyatrīdvārā brahmaṇa evopāsanā na gāyatryā iti pūrveṇaiva gatārthatvādanārambhaṇīyametat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4384: 'vāgvai gāyatrī vāgvā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ gāyati ca trāyate ca'ityādiśrutibhyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4385: tathāca 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam'ityupakramya gāyatryā eva hṛdayādibhirvyākhyāya ca 'saiṣā catuṣpadā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī'ityupasaṃhāro gāyatryāmeva samañjaso bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4392: gāyatryākhyacchandodvāreṇa gāyatrīrūpavikārānugate brahmaṇi cetorpaṇaṃ cittasamādhānamanena brāhmaṇavākyena nigadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4397: kintu yadetadbrahma sarvātmakaṃ sarvakāraṇaṃ tatsvarūpeṇāśakyopadeśamiti tadvikāragāyatrīdvāreṇopalakṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4398: gāyatryāḥ sarvacchandovyāptyā ca savanatrayavyāptyā ca dvijātidvitīyajanmajananīyatayā ca śrutervikāreṣu madhye prādhānyena dvāratvopapatteḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:4400: nahi kuṇḍalenopalakṣitaṃ kaṇṭharūpaṃ kuṇḍalaviyoge 'pi paścātpratīyamānamapratīyamānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4402: tadevaṃ gāyatrīśabdasya mukhyārthatve gāyatryā brahmopalakṣyata ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4403: saṃprati tu gāyatriśabdaḥ saṃkhyāsāmānyādgauṇyā vṛttyā brahmaṇyeva vartata iti darśayati-apara āheti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4411: tathāhi śrutiḥ-'idaṃ vāva tadyo 'yaṃ bahirdhā puruṣādākāśaḥ'taddhi tasya jagaritasthānam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4413: tathā-'ayaṃ vāva sa yo 'yamantaḥ puruṣa ākāśaḥ' /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4426: bhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayavākprāṇā iti ṣaṭ prakārā gāyatryākhyasya brahmaṇaḥ śrūyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4429: asyārthaḥ-hṛdayasyāsya khalu pañca suṣayaḥ pañca chidrāṇi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4430: tāni ca devaiḥ prāṇādibhī rakṣyamāṇāni svargaprāptidvārāṇīti devasuṣayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4431: tathāhi-hṛdayasya yatprāṅmukhaṃ chidraṃ tatstho yo vāyuḥ sa prāṇaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4436: atha yo 'sya dakṣiṇaḥ suṣistatstho vāyuviśeṣo vyānaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4439: atha yo 'sya pratyaṅmukhaḥ suṣistatatstho vāyuviśeṣo 'pānaḥ sa ca vāksaṃbandhādvāk,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4441: atha yo 'syodaṅmukhaḥ suṣistatstho vāyuviśeṣaḥ sa samānaḥ tatsaṃbaddhaṃ manaḥ tatparjanyo devatā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4442: atha yo 'syordhvaḥ suṣistatstho vāyuviśeṣaḥ sa udānaḥ pādatalādārabhyordhvaṃ nayanāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4445: tatsaṃbaddhāḥ pañca hārdasya brahmaṇaḥ puruṣā na gāyatryāmakṣarasaṃniveśamātre saṃbhavanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4448: upadeśabhedān neti cen nobhayasminn apy avirodhāt / BBs_1,1.27 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4451: yo hi śyeno vṛkṣāgre vastuto 'sti sa ca tataḥ paro 'pyastyeva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4454: yadā tu maryādaiva mukhyatayā prādhānyena vivakṣitā tadā lakṣaṇayādhāratvaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4460: na vaktur ātmopadeśād iti ced adhyātmasaṃbandhabhūmā hy asmin / BBs_1,1.29 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4470: hitatamapuruṣārthasiddhiśca nikhilabhrūṇahatyādipāpāparāmarśaśca prajñātmatvaṃ cānandādiśca na mukhye prāṇe saṃbhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4473: vaktṛtvaṃ ca vākkaraṇavyāpāravattvaṃ yadyapi paramātmani svarūpeṇa na saṃbhavati
GSP33brsvbh1u:4477: tadeva brahma tvaṃ viddhi'iti vāgvadanasya brahma kāraṇamityāha-śarīrādhāraṇamapi yadyapi mukhyaprāṇasyaiva tathāpi prāṇavyāpārasya paramātmāyattatvātparamātmana eva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4493: indrasya devatāyā ātmani pratibuddhasya caramadehasya vāmadevasyeva prarabdhavipākakarmāśayamātraṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:4494: bhogena kṣapayato brahmaṇa eva sarvametatkalpata iti vigrahavadindrajīvaprāṇavāyuparityāgena
GSP33brsvbh1u:4496: atrocyate-'yo vai prāṇaḥ sā prajñā yā vā prajñā sa prāṇaḥ saha hyetavasmin śarīre
GSP33brsvbh1u:4497: vasataḥ sahotkrāmataḥ'iti yasyaiva prāṇasya prajñātmana upāsyatvamuktaṃ tasyaiva
GSP33brsvbh1u:4513: tameva tvekaṃ vākyārthaṃ padārthāvagamamantareṇa na śaknuvanti kartumityantarā tadarthameva tamapyavagamayanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4516: tena yathopāṃśuyājavākye jāmitādoṣopakrame tatpratisamādhānopasaṃhāre caikavākyatvāya 'prajāpatirupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ'ityādayo na pṛthagvidhayaḥ kintvarthavādā iti nirṇītaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4523: ata evopalakṣyasya pratyagātmasvarūpasyābhedamupalakṣaṇaṃ bhedenopalakṣayati-'prāṇa eva prajñātmā'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4527: jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgān neti cen nopāsātraividhyādāśritatvād iha tadyogāt / BBs_1,1.31 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4544: pañca buddhīndriyāṇi pañca buddhasya iti daśa prajñāmātrāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4545: tadevaṃ svamatena vyākhyāya prācāṃ vṛttikṛtāṃ matena vyācaṣṭe-athaveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4546: pūrvaṃ prāṇasyaikamupāsanamaparaṃ jīvasyāparaṃ brahmaṇa ityupāsanātraividhyena vākyabhedaprasaṅgo dūṣaṇamuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4547: iha tu brahmaṇa ekasyaivopāsātrayaviśiṣṭasya vidhānānna vākyabheda ityabhimānaḥ prācāṃ vṛttikṛtām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4551: iha tu siddharūpaṃ brahma na vidhiviṣayo bhavitumarhati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4554: vākyāntarebhyaśca brahmavagateḥ prāptatvāttadanūdyāprāptopāsanā bhāvārtho vidheyastasya ca bhedādvidhyāvṛttilakṣaṇo vākyabhedo 'tisphuṭa iti bhāṣyakṛtā noddhāṭitaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4556: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite bhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ prathamasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //1//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4560: atha dvitīyaṃ pādamāripsuḥ pūrvoktamarthaṃ smārayati vakṣyamāṇopayogitayā-prathame pāda iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4562: na caite sākṣātpūrvamupapāditā iti kathaṃ hetubhāvena na śakyā upadeṣṭumityata uktam-samastajagatkāraṇasyeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4563: yadyapyete na pūrvaṃ kaṇṭhata uktāstathāpi brahmaṇo jagajjanmādikāraṇatvopapadānenādhikaraṇasiddhāntanyāyenopakṣiptā ityupapannasteṣāmuttaratra hetubhāvenopanyāsa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4567: tatra kaiva kathā manomayādīnāmarthāntare prasiddhānāṃ padānāṃ brahmagocaratvanirṇayaṃ pratītyabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4576: tasmiṃścāniti sthitikāle ceṣṭata iti tadanaṃ jagat tasmātsarvaṃ khalvidaṃ jagadbrahma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4577: ataḥ kaḥ kasminrajyate kaśca kaṃ dveṣṭīti
GSP33brsvbh1u:4579: atha khalu kratumayaḥ puruṣo yathākraturasmiṃlloke puruṣo bhavati tathetaḥ pretya bhavati sa kratuṃ kurvīta manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīra ityādi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4580: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimiha manomayatvādibhirdharmaiḥ śārīra ātmopāsyatvenopadiśyate āhosvidbrahmeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4585: tathā ca 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma'iti vākyaṃ prathamapaṭhitamapyarthālocanayā parameva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4587: evaṃ ca saṃkalpavidhiḥ prathamo nirviṣayaḥ sannaparyavasyanviṣayāpekṣaḥ svayamanirvṛtto na vidhyantareṇopajīvituṃ śakyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4590: manomayatvādi ca kāryakāraṇasaṃghātātmano jīvātmana eva nirūḍhamiti jīvātmanopāsyenoparaktopāsanā na paścāt brahmaṇā saṃbaddhumarhati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4592: naca 'sarvaṃ khalvidam'iti vākyaṃ brahmaparamapi tu śamahetuvannigadārthavādaḥ śāntatāvidhiparaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4594: na cānyaparādapi brahmāpekṣitatayā svīkriyata iti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4601: evaṃ karmakartṛvyapadeśaḥ saptamīpraṇamāntatā cābhede 'pi jīvātmani kathañcidbhedopacāreṇa rāhoḥ śira itivaddraṣṭavyā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4614: tathā hi prāṇaḥ śarīramasyeti sarvanāmārtho bahuvrīhiḥ saṃnihitaṃ ca sarvanāmārthaṃ saṃprāpya tadabhidhānaṃ paryavasyet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4616: tadeva tu manovikāro vā manaḥpracuraṃ vā kimarthamityadyāpi na vijñāyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4617: tadyatraiṣa śabdaḥ samavetārtho bhavati sa samāsārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4618: na caiṣa jīva eva samavetārtho na brahmaṇīti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4621: vikārāṇāṃ ca svakāraṇādabhedātteṣāṃ ca manomayatayā brahmaṇastatkāraṇasya manomayatvopapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4634: vayaṃ tu paśyāmaḥ-'samāropyasya rūpeṇa viṣayo rūpavānbhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4635: viṣayasya tu rūpeṇa samāropyaṃ na rūpavat //
GSP33brsvbh1u:4636: 'samāropitasya hi rūpeṇa bhujaṅgasya bhīṣaṇatvādinā rajjū rūpavatī,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4639: bhujaṅgadaśāyāṃ tu na nāsti vāstavī rajjuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4643: tasmādbrahmaliṅgadarśanājjīve ca tadasaṃbhavādbrahmaivopāsyaṃ na jīva iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4666: śārīraguṇā iva manomayatvādayo brahmaṇītyata āha sūtrakāraḥ-anupapattestu na śārīraḥ // 3 // // 4 // //5//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4669: arbhakaustvāt tadvyapadeśāc ca neti cen na nicāyyatvād evaṃ vyomavac ca / BBs_1,2.7 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4674: na tāvadbhedapratiṣedhādbhedavyapadeśācca bhedābhedāvekatra tāttvikau bhavitumarhato virodhādityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4687: yo hi paratantraḥ so 'nyena bandhanāgāre praveśyeta,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4692: na caitāvatā īśvarasyānīśatā na hyupakaraṇādyapekṣitā kartuḥ svātantryaṃ vihanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4695: saṃbhogaprāptir iti cen na vaiśeṣyāt / BBs_1,2.8 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4704: kaṭhavallīṣu paṭhyate-yasya brahma ca kṣatraṃ cobhe bhavata odanaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4705: mṛtyuryasyopasecanaṃ ka itthā veda yatra sa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4707: attṛtvaṃ ca bhoktṛtā vā saharntṛtā vā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4711: tadyadi bhoktṛtvamattṛtvaṃ tato muktasaṃśayaṃ jīvātmaiva pratipattavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4712: brahmakṣatrādi cāsya kāryakāraṇasaṃghāto bhogāyatanatayā vā sākṣādvā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4715: tatastrayāṇāmagnijīvaparamātmanāṃ praśnopanyāsopalabdheḥ saṃhartṛtvasyāviśeṣādbhavati saṃśayaḥ-kimattā agnirāho jīva utāho paramātmeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4716: tatraudanasya bhogyatvena loke prasiddherbhoktṛtvameva prathamaṃ buddhau viparivartate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4729: tatra yadi jīvasya bhogāyatanatayā tatsādhanatayā ca kāryakāraṇasaṃghātaḥ sthitaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4734: naca bhogāyatanasya bhogasādhanasya vā bhogyatvaṃ mukhyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4737: kasyacitkrūrasattvasya vyāghrādeḥ kaścidbhavet na tu sarvathā sarvajīvasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4744: 'brahma ca kṣatraṃ ca'iti ca śrutī saṃkocamarhataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4752: tathāca 'na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścit'iti brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtasya na hānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4753: 'ka itthā veda yatra saḥ'iti ca durjñānatopapatsyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4757: guhāṃ praviṣṭāv ātmānau hi taddarśanāt / BBs_1,2.11 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4762: autsargikasya mukhyatābalātpūrvasiddhāntapakṣāsaṃbhavena pakṣāntaraṃ kalpayiṣyata iti manvānaḥ saṃśayamākṣipati-atrāhākṣepteti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4767: tadiha buddheracaitanyena paramātmanaśca bhoktṛtvaniṣedhena jīvātmaivaikaḥ pāda pariśiṣyata
GSP33brsvbh1u:4772: svātantryalakṣaṇaṃ hi kartṛtvaṃ tacca pāturiva pāyayiturapyastīti so 'pi kartā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4773: ata eva cāhuḥ-'yaḥ kārayati sa karotyeva'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4785: jīvo hi bhoktṛtayā buddhiśca bhogasādhanatayā dharmasya gocare sthitau,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4789: naca jīvaḥ paramātmano 'bhinnastamaḥ prakāśarūpatvāt buddhistu jaḍatayā tama iti śakyopadeṣṭum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4790: tasmādbuddhijīvāvatra kathyete iti tatrāpi prete vicikitsāpanuttaye buddherbhedena paralokī jīvo darśanīya iti buddhirucyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4793: brahmaṇaiva sarūpeṇa na tu buddhyā virūpayā //1//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4798: tadiha cetano jīvaḥ sarūpeṇa cetanāntareṇaiva brahmaṇā sadvitīyaḥ pratīyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4800: tadevam 'ṛtaṃ pibantau'ityatra prathamamavagate brahmaṇi tadanurodhena caramaṃ guhāśrayatvaṃ śālagrāme hariritivadvyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4801: bahulaṃ hi guhāśrayatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ śrutaya āhuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4804: evañca prathamāvagatabrahmānurodhena sukṛtalokavartitvamapi tasya lakṣaṇayā chatrinyāyena gamayitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4805: chāyātapatvamapi jīvasyāvidyāśrayatayā brahmaṇaśca śuddhaprakāśasvabhāvasya tadanāśrayatayā mantavyam //11//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4808: imameva nyāyaṃ 'dvā suparṇā'ityatrāpyudāharaṇe kṛtvācintayā yojayati-eṣa eva nyāya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4809: atrāpi kiṃ buddhijīvau uta jīvaparamātmānāviti saṃśayya karaṇarūpāyā api buddheredhāṃsi pacantītivatkartṛtvopacārādbuddhijīvāviha pūrvapakṣayitvā siddhāntayitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4811: taddarśanāditi ca 'samāne vṛkṣe puruṣo nimagnaḥ'ityatra mantre /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4812: na khalu mukhye kartṛtve saṃbhavati karaṇe kartṛtvopacāro yukta iti kṛtvācintāmuddhāṭayati-apara āha /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4822: vacanavirodhe nyāyasyābhāsatvādityata āha-nāpyasyādhikaraṇasya pūrvapakṣaṃ bhajata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4825: tasya tu brahmarūpatāyāṃ paryavasyanna pūrvapakṣamapi svīkarotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4827: tāvetau sattvakṣetrajñau na ha vā evaṃvidi kiñcana raja ādhvaṃsata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4829: etāvataiva vidyopasaṃhārājjīvasya brahmātmatāparatāsya lakṣyata ityāha-tāvatā ceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4838: apitu buddhisattvaṃ mukhādirupapariṇataṃ citicchāyāpattyopapannacaitanyamiva bhuṅkte natu tattvato jīvaḥ paramātmā bhuṅkte /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4850: parokṣaṃ brahma na tathā pratibimbe tu yujyate //1//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4853: 'ṛtaṃ pibantau ityatra hi jīvaparamātmānau prathamamavagatāviti tadanurodhena guhāpraveśādayaḥ paścādavagatā vyākhyātāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4854: tadvadihāpi 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate'iti pratyakṣābhidhānātprathamamavagate chāyāpuruṣe tadanurodhenāmṛtatvābhayatvādayaḥ stutyā kathañcidvyākhyeyāḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:4861: kaṃ ca khaṃ cetyādi tu vākyamagnīnāṃ nācāryavākyaṃ niyantumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4871: 'saṃnihitāśca puruṣātmādiśabdāste ca na yāvatsvārthamabhidadhati tāvatsarvanāmabhyāṃ nārthatuṣo 'pyabhidhīyata iti kutastadarthasyāparokṣatā
GSP33brsvbh1u:4872: puruṣātmaśabdau ca sarvanāmanirapekṣau svarasato jīve vā paramātmani vā vartete iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4873: naca tayoṣcakṣuṣi pratyakṣadarśanamiti nirapekṣapuruṣapadapratyāyitārthānurodhena ya eṣa iti dṛśyata iti ca yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4875: viduṣaḥ śāstrata upalabdireva dṛḍhatayā pratyakṣavaduparyate praśaṃsārthamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4876: api ca tadeva caramaṃ prathamānuguṇatayā nīyate yannetuṃ śakyam, alpaṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4879: tathā sati kiṃ nāma nāmṛtaṃ syāditi vyarthamamṛtapadam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4885: nanu sarvagatasyeśvarasya kasmādviśiṣeṇa cakṣureva sthānamupadiśyata iti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4887: śrutiḥ-'tadyadyapyasminsārpirvodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmanī eva gacchati'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4896: sa eva puṇyaphalāni vāmāni nayati lokamiti vāmanīḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4899: taduktaṃ śrutyā-'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti'iti //13//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4907: tatkathamatyalpaṃ cakṣuradhiṣṭhānaṃ paramātmanaḥ paramamahata iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4909: sthānānyādayo yeṣāṃ te sthānādayo nāmarūpaprakarāsteṣāṃ vyapadeśātsarvagatasyaikasthānaniyamo nāvakalpate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4911: viśeṣatastu brahmaṇastāni tānyupāsanāsthānānīti tairasya yukto vyapadeśaḥ //14//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4916: evaṃ khalūpākhyāyate-upakosalo ha vai kāmalāyanaḥ satyakāme jābāle brahmacaryamuvāsa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4922: śraddadhānāyāsmai dṛḍhabhaktaye sametya brahmavidyāmūcire-'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4926: kintu kaṃ ca khaṃ ca brahmetyetanna vijānāmi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4927: nahi viṣayendriyasaṃparkajaṃ sukhamanityaṃ lokasiddhaṃ khaṃ ca bhūtākāśamacetanaṃ brahma bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4928: athainamagnayaḥ pratyūcuḥ-'yadvāva kaṃ tadeva khaṃ yadeva khaṃ tadeva kam'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4931: eṣā somya te 'smadvidyā pratyekamuktā svaviṣayā vidyā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4932: ātmavidyā cāsmābhiḥ saṃbhūya pūrvamuktā prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahmeti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4936: evaṃ vyavasthite 'yadvāva kaṃ tadeva khaṃ yadeva khaṃ tadeva kam'ityetadvyācaṣṭe bhāṣyakāraḥ-tatra khaṃśabda iti pratīkābhiprāyeṇeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4942: laukikasya sukhasya sādhanapāratantryaṃ kṣayiṣṇutā cāmayastena saha vartata iti sāmayaṃ sukham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4945: sukhaśabdasamānādhikaraṇo hi khaṃśabdo bhūtākāśamarthaṃ parityajya brahmaṇi guṇayogena vartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4946: tādṛśā ca khena sukhaṃ viśiṣyamāṇaṃ sāmayādvyāvṛttaṃ nirāmayaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4950: evaṃ khaṃpadasyāpi brahmapadaṃ śiro yayoḥ kaṅkhaṃpadayoste brahmaśirasī,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4952: astu prastute kimāyātamityata āha-tadevaṃ vākyopakrama iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4954: 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi'ityācāryavākye 'pi tadevānuvartanīyamiti tu kuta ityāha-ācāryastu te gatiṃ vakteti ca gatimātrābhidhānamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4955: yadyapyete bhinnavaktṛṇī vākye tathāpi pūrveṇa vaktrā ekavākyatāṃ gamite,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4964: brahmavida iva te somya mukhaṃ prasannaṃ bhāti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4966: upakosalastu hrīṇo bhītaśca ko nu māmanuśiṣyāt bhagavan proṣite tvayītyāpātato 'pajñāya nirbadhyamāno yathāvadagnīnāmanuśāsanamavocat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4967: tadupaśrutya cācāryaḥ suciraṃ kliṣṭa upakosale samupajātadayārdrahṛdayaḥ pratyuvāca,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4968: somya kila tubhyamagnaye na brahma sākalyenāvocan,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4970: tadanubhavamāhātmyāt 'yathā puṣpakarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4974: yaduktamagnibhiḥ prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahmeti tatparipūraṇāya 'eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate'ityādi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4975: etaduktaṃ bhavati-ācāryeṇa ye sukhaṃ brahmākṣisthānaṃ saṃyadvāmaṃ vāmanībhāmanītyevaṅguṇakaṃ prāṇasahitamupāsate te sarve 'pahatapāpmāno 'nyatkarma kurvantu mā vākārṣuḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4980: yeṣu māseṣūttarāṃ diśameti savitā te ṣaṇmāsā uttarāyaṇaṃ taddevatāṃ pratipadyante,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4987: sa tādṛśaḥ puruṣa etānsatyalokasthaṃ kāryaṃ brahma gamayati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4988: sa eṣa devapatho devairarcirādibhirnetṛbhirupalakṣita iti devapathaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4989: sa eva ca brahmaṇā gantavyenopalakṣita iti brahmapathaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4990: etena pathā pratipadyamānāḥ satyalokasthaṃ brahma imaṃ mānavaṃ manoḥ sargaṃ kiṃbhūtamāvartaṃ janmajarāmaraṇapaunaḥ punyamāvṛttistatkartāvarto mānavo lokastaṃ nāvartante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4991: tathāca smṛtiḥ-'brahmaṇā saha te sarve saṃprāpte pratisaṃcare /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5002: vijñānātmano hi na pradeśe upāsanānyatra dṛṣṭacarī,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5012: pravṛttiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ hi kāryaṃ cetanasya śarīriṇaḥ svaśarīrendriyādau vā śarīreṇa vā vāsyādau dṛṣṭaṃ nāśarīrasya brahmaṇo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5016: pradhānasya vā pṛthivyādyabhimānavatyā devatāyā vāṇimādyaiśvaryayogino yogino vā jīvātmano vāntaryāmitā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5024: tathāpi tasya pratiniyataniyamanāt 'yaḥ sarvaṃllokānantaro yamayati yaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtānyantaro yamayati'iti śrutivirodhādanupapatteḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5025: yogī tu yadyapi lokabhūtavaśitayā sarvāṃllokānsarvāṇi ca bhūtāni niyantumarhati tatra tatrānekavidhadehendriyādinirmāṇena 'sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavati'ityādiśrutibhyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5026: tathāpi 'jagadvyāpāravarjaṃ prakaraṇāt'iti vakṣyamāṇena nyāyena vikāraviṣaye vidyāsiddhānāṃ vyāpārabhāvātso 'pi nāntaryāmī /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5027: tasmātpāriśeṣyājjīva eva cetano dehendriyādimān dṛṣṭṛtvādisaṃpannaḥ svayamadṛśyādiḥ svātmani vṛttivirodhāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5030: 'ya ātmani tiṣṭhan'iti cābhede 'pi kathañcidbhedopacārāt 'sa bhagavaḥ kasminpratiṣṭhitaḥ sve mahimni'itivat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5033: yadi punarātmano 'pi niyantūranyo niyantā bhavet veditā vā tatastasyāpyanya ityanavasthā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5035: tadupārjitau hi dharmādharmau niyacchata ityanayā dvārā jīvo niyacchati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5045: tathāca sarvaṃ vikārajātaṃ tadavidyāśaktipariṇāmastasya śarīrendriyasthāne vartata iti yathāyathaṃ pṛthivyādidevatādikāryakaraṇaistāneva pṛthivyādidevatādīñchaknoti niyantum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5048: kintu yo jīvo niyantā lokasiddhaḥ sa paramātmaivopādhyavacchedakalpitabhedastathā vyākhyāyata ityasakṛdāveditaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5059: 'ya ātmani tiṣṭhan'ityādau cābhede 'pi bhedopacārakleśo na bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5069: śarīraś cobhaye 'pi hi bhedenainam adhīyate / BBs_1,2.20 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5096: tathā vivartā api vartamānasarūpā eva na virūpāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5098: na jātu rajjvāṃ kuñjara iti viparyasyanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5102: tasmātpradhānameva jaḍaṃ jaḍasya jagato yoniriti yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5107: ato yaḥ pradhānātparaḥ paramātmā sa sarvavit /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5113: tatkhalu jaḍamanirvācyamanirvācyasya jaḍasya prapañcasyopādānaṃ yujyate, sārūpyāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5123: iha tvavidyāśaktereva jagadyonitvasaṃbhave na dvārādvāribhāvo yayukta iti pradhānamevātra vākye jagadyonirucyata iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5124: atha yoniśabdo nimittakāraṇaparastathāpi brahmaiva nimittaṃ na tu jīvātmeti vinigamanāyāṃ na heturastīti saṃśayena pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5127: yaḥ sarvajña iti śrutyā sarvajñasya sa ucyate //1//
GSP33brsvbh1u:5133: yattu sārūpyābhāvānna cidātmanaḥ pariṇāmaḥ prapañca iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5137: na khalu bāhyasārūpyanibandhana eva sarvo vibhrama iti niyamanimittamasti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5146: na kevalaṃ liṅgādapi tu 'parā vidyā'iti samākhyānādapyetadeva pratipattavyamityāha-apica dve vidye iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5149: avacchinno hi jīvātmā bhogyebhyo viṣayebhyo vyatirikta iti tajjñānena na sarvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5158: ṛtuyajanenopādhinā ṛtvikśabdaḥ pravṛtta iti yajñopādhaya ṛtvijaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5176: tathāca bahusamañjasaṃ syādityata āha-nātra pradhānaṃ nāma kiñciditi //22//
GSP33brsvbh1u:5180: tadetatparamatenākṣepasamādhānābhyāṃ vyākhyāya svamatena vyācaṣṭe-anye punarmanyanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5185: saṃnidheśca prakaraṇaṃ balīya iti jāyamānaparityāgena viśvayonereva prakaraṇino rūpābhidhānamiti cet na,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5187: na caitāvatā mūrdhādiśrutayaḥ prakaraṇavirodhātsvārthatyāgena sarvātmatāmātraparā iti yuktam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5189: siddhe ca prakaraṇināsaṃbandhe jāyamānamadhyapātitvaṃ jāyamānagrahaṇe kāraṇamupanyastaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5190: tasmāddhiraṇyagarbha eva bhagavān prāṇātmanā sarvabhūtāntaraḥ kāryo nirdiśyata iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5197: śabdādibhyo 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhānāc ca neti cen na tathā dṛṣṭyupadeśād asambhavāt puruṣamapi cainam adhīyate / BBs_1,2.26 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5199: prācīna śālasatyayajñendradyumnajanabuḍilāḥ sametya mīmāṃsāṃ cakruḥ-ko na ātmā kiṃ brahmeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5200: ātmetyukte jīvātmani pratyayo mā bhūdata uktaṃ kiṃ brahmeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5201: te ca mīmāṃsamānā niścayamanadhigacchantaḥ kaikeyarājaṃ vaiśvānaravidyāvidamupaseduḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5202: upasadya cocuḥ-ātmanamevemaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ saṃpratyadhyeṣismarasitameva no brūhītyupakramya dyusūrvāyvākāśavāripṛthivīnāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5205: prāṇo vāyuḥ pṛthagvartmātmā pṛthak vartma yasya vāyoḥ sa pṛthagvartmā sa evātmā svabhāvo yasya sa pṛthagvartmātmā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5206: saṃdeho dehasya madhyabhāgaḥ sa ākāśo bahulaḥ sarvagatatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5208: yato 'dbhyo 'nnamannācca rayirdhanaṃ tasmādāpo rayiruktāstāsāṃ ca mūtrībhūtānāṃ bastiḥ sthānamiti bastireva rayirityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5223: nanu 'ko na ātmā kiṃ brahma'ityupakrame ātmabrahmaśabdayoḥ paramātmani rūḍhatvena
GSP33brsvbh1u:5224: taduparaktāyāṃ buddhau vaiśvānarāgnyādayaḥ śabdāstadanurodhena paramātmanyeva kathañcinnetuṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5226: yadyapi ca vājasaneyināṃ vaiśvānaravidyopakrame 'vaiśvānaraṃ ha vai bhagavān saṃprati veda taṃ no brūhi'ityatra nātmabrahmaśabdau staḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5227: tathāpi tatsamānārthaṃ chāndogyavākyaṃ tadupakramamiti tena niścitārthena tadavirodhena vājasaneyivākyārtho niścīyata /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5233: naca sarvapāpmapradāha iti pāriśeṣyātparamātmaiva vaiśvānara iti niścite kutaḥ punariyamāśaṅkā-śabdādibhyo 'ntaḥ pratiṣṭhānānneti cediti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5237: api cāntaḥpratiṣṭhatatvaṃ ca prādeśamātratvaṃ ca na sarvavyāpino 'parimāṇasya ca parabrahmaṇaḥ saṃbhavataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5244: athavā agniśarīrāyā devatāyā aiśvaryayogāt dyumūrdhatvādaya upapadyanta iti śaṅkiturabhisaṃdhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5250: tadupādhyupadeśena vā manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīro bārūpa itivadupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5252: tathāca brahmāśrayasya pratyayasyāśrayāntare jāṭharavaiśvānarāhvaye kṣepeṇa vā jāṭharavaiśvānaropādhini
GSP33brsvbh1u:5253: vā brahmaṇyupāsye vaiśvānaradharmāṇāṃ brahmadharmāṇāṃ ca samāveśa upapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5254: asaṃbhavāditi sūtrāvayavaṃ vyācaṣṭe-yadi ceha parameśvaro na vivakṣyeteti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5255: puruṣamapi cainamadhīyata iti sūtrāvayavaṃ vyācaṣṭe-yadi ca kevala eveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5258: ata eva yatpuruṣa iti puruṣamanūdya na vaiśvānaro vidhīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5260: evaṃ ca parameśvaradṛṣṭirhi jāṭhare vaiśvānara ihopadiśyata iti bhāṣyaṃ virudhyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5262: 'sa yo haitamevamagniṃ vaiśvānaraṃ puruṣaṃ puruṣavidhaṃ puruṣe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitaṃ veda'iti vaiśvānarasya hi puruṣatvavedanamatrānūdyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5264: tasmāt 'sa eṣo 'gnirvaiśvānaro yat'iti yadaḥ pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5265: puruṣa iti tu tatra puruṣadṛṣṭerupadeśa iti yuktam // 24// // 25 // // 26 //
GSP33brsvbh1u:5267: ata eva na devatā bhūtaṃ ca / BBs_1,2.27 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5268: ata eva na devatā bhūtaṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5270: 'yo bhānunā pṛthivīṃ dyāmutemām'iti mantravarṇo 'pi na kevalauṣṇyaprakāśavibhavamātrasya bhūtāgnerimamīdṛśaṃ mahimānamāha,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5300: saṃpatter iti jaiminis tathā hi darśayati / BBs_1,2.31 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5313: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakamīmaṃsābhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ prathamasyaḥādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2//
GSP33brsvbh1u:5322: 'pārāvāramathyapātī hi setuḥ tābhyāmavacchidyamāno jalavidhārako loke dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5334: tathāca pāravatyamṛtavyatirikte setāvanuśriyamāṇe pradhānaṃ vā sāṃkhyaparikalpitaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5335: tat khalu svakāryopahitamaryādatayā puruṣaṃ yāvadagacchadbhavatīti pāravat,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5349: 'vāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇāya ca lokaḥ paraśca lokaḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavanti'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5350: yadi tvātmaśabdābhidheyatvaṃ na vidyata iti na parituṣyasi,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5353: yadi punarasya dyubhvādyāyatanasya sārvajñyaśruteratrāpi na parituṣya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5354: bhavatu tato hiraṇyagarbha eva bhagavān sarvajñaḥ sūtrātmā dyubhvādyāyatanam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5355: tasya hi kāryatvena pāravattvaṃ cāmṛtātparabrahmaṇo bhedaścetyādi sarvamupapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5356: ayamapi 'vāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇa'iti śrutimupanyasyatā sūcitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5363: 'nahi mṛddārumayo mūrtaḥ pārāvāramadhyavartī pāthasāṃ vidhārako lokasiddhaḥ setuḥ pradhānaṃ vāvyākṛtaṃ vā vāyurvā jīvo vā sūtrātmā vābhyupeyate
GSP33brsvbh1u:5365: so 'smākaṃ pāravattāvarjaṃ vidharaṇatvamātreṇa yogamātrādrūḍhiṃ parityajya pravartsyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5371: tathā cāmṛtasyeti ca seturiti ca brahmaṇi dyubhvādyāyatane upapatsyete /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5372: atra ca svaśabdāditi tantroccaritatamātmaśabdāditi ca sadāyatanā iti sacchabdāditi ca brahmaśabdāditi ca sūcayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5375: āyatanāyatanavadbhāvaḥ sarvaṃ brahmeti ca sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ hiraṇyagarbhepyupapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5384: nātra dyubhvādyāyatanasya setutocyate yena pāravattā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5389: naca prādhānyādeṣa iti sarvanāmnā dyubhvādyāyatanamātmaiva parāmṛśyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5393: vidheyasya vyāpārasyaiva vyāpāravato 'mṛtatvasādhanatvāt na cedamaikāntikaṃ yatpradhānameva sarvanāmnā parāmṛśyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5400: brahmaṇaśca muktopasṛpyatvaṃ 'yadā sarve pramucyante'ityādau śrutyantare prasiddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5428: yāvatā 'na prāṇabhṛdanumāne'ityeka eva yogaḥ kasmānna kṛta ityata āha-pṛthagiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5437: na khalu hiraṇyagarbhādiṣu jñāteṣu sarvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati kintu brahmaṇyeveti //6//
GSP33brsvbh1u:5441: yadi jīvo hiraṇyagarbho vā dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ bhavet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5451: tatra hi 'anaśnannanyo 'abhicākaśīti'iti jīva upādhirahitena rūpeṇa brahmasvabhāva udāsīno 'bhoktā darśitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5453: tathā cetthaṃbhūtaṃ jīvaṃ kathayatānena mantravarṇena dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ brahmaiva kathitaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5461: nāradaḥ khalu devarṣiḥ karmavidanātmavittayā śocyamātmānaṃ manyamāno bhagavantamātmajñamājānasiddhaṃ mahāyoginaṃ sanatkumāramupasasāda /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5465: tadupaśrutya sanatkumāreṇa 'nāma brahmetyupāḥsva'ityukte nāradena pṛṣṭaṃ kiṃnāmno 'sti bhūya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5472: prāṇasya ca samastakriyākārakaphalabhedena pitrādyātmatvena ca rathāranābhidṛṣṭāntena
GSP33brsvbh1u:5474: eva nāradena sanatkumāra ekagranthena 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati'iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:5476: tadupaśrutya nāradena 'sukhaṃ tveva bhagavo vijijñāse'ityukte sanatkumāraḥ 'yo vai bhūmā tatsukham'ityupakramya bhūmānaṃ vyutpādayāṃbabhūva-'yatra nānyatpaśyati'ityādinā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5478: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ prāṇo bhūmā syādāho paramātmeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5485: apica bhūmeti bhāvo na bhavitāramantareṇa śakyo nirūpayitumiti bhavitāramapekṣamāṇaḥ prāṇasyānantaryeṇa buddhisaṃnidhānāttameva bhavitāraṃ prāpya nirvṛṇoti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5488: na cātmanaḥ prakaraṇādātmaiva buddhistha iti tasyaiva bhūmā syāditi yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5493: tadetatsaṃśayabījaṃ darśayatā bhāṣyakāreṇa sūcitaṃ pūrvapakṣasādhanamiti na punaruktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5494: naca bhūyobhūyaḥ praśnātparamātmaiva nāradena jijñāsita iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5496: tadevaṃ prāṇa eva bhūmeti sthite yadyattadvirodhitayā vacaḥ pratibhāti tattadanuguṇatayā neyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5499: 'eṣa tu vā ativadati'iti tuśabdena prāṇadarśino 'tivādino vyavacchidya satyenātivāditvaṃ vadan kathaṃ prāṇasya bhūmānamabhidadhītetyata āha-prāṇameva tviti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5503: apitu tadativāditvamaparityajya pratyuta tadanukṛṣya tasyaiva prāṇasya satyasya śravaṇamananaśraddhāniṣṭhākṛtibhirvijñānāya
GSP33brsvbh1u:5510: matvā ca guruśiṣyasabrahmacāribhiranusūyubhiḥ saha saṃvādya tattvaṃ śraddhatte /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5511: śraddhānantaraṃ ca viṣayāntaradarśī viraktastato vyāvṛttastattvajñānābhyāsaṃ karoti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5516: apyāhuḥ-'bhūtārthabhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajaṃ yogijñānam'iti bhāvanāprakarṣasya paryanto niṣṭhā tasmājjāyate tattvānubhava iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5517: tasmātprāṇa eva bhūmeti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati'ityuktvā bhūmocyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5518: tatra satyaśabdaḥ paramārthe nirūḍhavṛttiḥ śrutyā paramārthamāha /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5521: tathāca 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati'iti brahmaṇo 'tivāditvaṃ śrutyānyanirapekṣayā
GSP33brsvbh1u:5524: evaṃ ca prāṇādūrdhvaṃ brahmaṇi bhūmāvagamyamāno na prāṇaviṣayo bhavitumarhati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5526: evaṃ cānātmavida ātmānaṃ vividiṣornāradasya praśne paramātmānamevāsmai vyākhyāsyāmītyabhisaṃdhimānsanatkumāraḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5529: naca praśnapūrvatāpravāhapatitenottareṇa sarveṇa praśnapūrveṇaiva bhavitavyamiti niyamo 'stītyādisugamena bhāṣyeṇa vyutpāditam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5532: tadabhidhāne hi sāpekṣatvena na prakaraṇaṃ samāpyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5533: tasmānnedaṃ prāṇasya prakaraṇamapi tu yadāyattaḥ prāṇastasya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5547: yadapi pūrvapakṣiṇā kathañcinnītaṃ tadanubhāṣya bhāṣyakāro dūṣayati-yo 'pyasau suṣuptāvasthāyāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5565: nahi dhūmopāyā vahnidhīrdhūmasaṃbhinnaṃ vahnimavagāhate dhūmo 'yaṃ vahniriti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5568: apica śabdānupāye 'pi rūpadheyapratyaye liṅgendriyajanmani nāmasaṃbhedo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5571: 'tadyathā śaṅkunā sarvāṇi parṇāni saṃtṛṇṇānyevamoṅkāreṇa sarvā vāk'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5572: ata oṅkārātmakāḥ pṛthivyādayo 'mbarāntā iti varṇā evākṣaraṃ na paramātmeti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5585: rūpadheyāni tu ghaṭapaṭādīni ghaṭatvapaṭatvādisāmānyātmakāni cakṣurādīndriyāgrāhyāṇi madhudhāraṇaprāvaraṇādyarthakriyāṇi ca bhedenānubhūyante iti kuto nāmasaṃbhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5588: kintu yo nānādeśakālasaṃplutaḥ piṇḍaḥ so 'yaṃ saṃnihitadeśakāla ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5591: piṇḍa eva hi dṛṣṭaḥ sansaṃjñāṃ smārayituṃ kṣamaḥ //1//
GSP33brsvbh1u:5592: saṃjñā hi smaryamāṇāpi pratyakṣatvaṃ na bādhate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5593: saṃjñinaḥ sā taṭasthā hi na rūpācchādanakṣamā //2// '
GSP33brsvbh1u:5599: ye tu pradhānaṃ pūrvapakṣayitvānena sūtreṇa paramātmaivākṣaramiti siddhāntayanti tairambarāntaradhṛterityanena kathaṃ pradhānaṃ nirākriyata iti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5600: atha nādhikaraṇatvamātraṃ dhṛtiḥ api tu praśāsanādhikaraṇatā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5601: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'etasya vākṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5614: praśāsanamājñā cetanadharmo nācetane pradhāne vāvyākṛte vā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5619: ambarāntavidharaṇasyākṣarasyeśvarāgadyadanyadvarṇā vā pradhānaṃ vāvyākṛtaṃ vā teṣāmanyeṣāṃ bhāvo 'nyabhāvastamatyantaṃ vyāvartayati śrutiḥ-'tadvā etadakṣaraṃ gārgi'ityādikā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5624: akṣarasya cakṣurādyupādhiṃ vārayantī śrutiraupādhikasya jīvasyākṣaratāṃ niṣedhatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5633: ' 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati'iti śruteḥ sarvagataparabrahmavedane tadbhāvāpattau 'sa sāmabhirunnīyate brahmalokam iti na deśaviśeṣaprāptirupapadyate
GSP33brsvbh1u:5635: na cekṣaṇasya loke tattvaviṣayatvena prasiddheḥ parasyaiva brahmaṇastathābhāvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5659: tadanurodhena ca parātpara ityatra parāditi jīvaghanaviṣayaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5660: tasmāttu paraḥ puruṣo dhyātavyaśca draṣṭavyaśca bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5661: tadidamuktam-na cātra jīvaghanaśabdena prakṛto 'bhidhyātavyaḥ paraḥ puruṣaḥ parāmṛśyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5662: kintu jīvaghanāt parāt paro yo dhyātavyo draṣṭavyaśca tameva kathayituṃ jīvaghano jīvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5665: sa hi samastakaraṇātmanaḥ sūtrātmano hiraṇyagarbhasya bhagavato nivāsabhūmitayā karaṇaparivṛtānāṃ jīvānāṃ saṃghāta iti bhavati jīvaghanaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5669: 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati'iti tu nirupādhibrahmavedanaviṣayā śrutiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5674: 'atha yadidamasmin brahmapure daharam'sūkṣmaṃ guhāprāyaṃ puṇḍarīkasaṃniveśaṃ veśma 'daharo 'sminnantarākāśastasminyadantastadanveṣṭavyam'āgamācāryopadeśābhyāṃ śravaṇaṃ ca,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5681: tatra prathamaṃ tāvadevaṃ saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ daharākāśādanyadeva kiñcidanveṣṭavyaṃ vijijñāsitavyaṃ ca uta daharākāśa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5682: yadāpi daharākāśo 'nveṣṭavyastadāpi kiṃ bhūtākāśa āho śārīra ātmā kiṃ vā paramātmeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5685: tatra prathamaṃ tāvadbhūtākāśa eva dahara iti pūrvapakṣayati-tatrākāśaśabdasya bhūtākāśe rūḍhatvāditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5686: eṣa tu bahutarottarasaṃdarbhavirodhāttucchaḥ pūrvapakṣa ityaparitoṣeṇa pakṣāntaramālambate pūrvapakṣī-athavā jīvo dahara iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5694: tadiha śarīraṃ brahmavikāro 'pi na brahmaṇā vyapadeṣṭavyam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5699: naca brahmaṇaḥ sve mahimni vyavasthitasyānādheyasyādhārasaṃbandhaḥ kalpate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5701: tasmādbrahmaśabdo rūḍhiṃ parityajya dehādibṛṃhaṇatayā jīve yaugike vā bhākto vā vyākhyeyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5708: vatsarājasya pura ivojjayinyāṃ maitrasya sajñmetyata āha-tatra purasvāmina iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5709: ayamarthaḥveśma khalvadhikaraṇamanirdiṣṭhādheyamādheyaviśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ purasvāminaḥ prakṛtatvāttenaivādheyena saṃbaddhaṃ sadanapekṣaṃ nādheyāntareṇa saṃbandhaṃ kalpayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5710: nanu tathāpi śarīramevāsya bhogāyatanamiti ko hṛdayapuṇḍarīkasya viśeṣo yattadevāsya sajñmetyata āha-manaupādhikaśca jīva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5711: nanu mano 'pi calatayā sakaladehavṛtti paryāyeṇetyata āha-manaśca prāyeṇeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5718: agatyā bhedamāropya gatau satyāṃ na yujyate //
GSP33brsvbh1u:5724: api tu bhūtākāśopamānena puṇḍarīkopādhiprāptaṃ daharatvaṃ nivartyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5725: apica sarva evottare hetavo daharākāśasya bhūtākāśatvaṃ vyāsedhantītyāha-naca kalpitabheda iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5729: 'dehe hi brahmopalabhyata ityasādhāraṇatayā deho brahmapuramiti vyapadiśyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5733: tathāpi yathā vatsarājasya pure ujjayinyāṃ maitrasya sajñma bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5734: evaṃ jīvasya pure hṛtpuṇḍarīkaṃ brahmasadanaṃ bhaviṣyati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5736: brahmaṇo hi bādhake pramāṇe balīyasi jīvasya ca sādhake pramāṇe sati brahmaliṅgāni kathañcidabhedavivakṣayā jīve vyākhyāyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5742: talliṅgānāṃ nābrahmaṇi vyākhyānamucitamiti brahmaiva daharākāśo na jīvabhūtākāśāviti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5743: śravaṇamananamanuvidya brahmānubhūya caraṇaṃ cārasteṣāṃ kāmeṣu caraṇaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5754: ācāryeṇa hi 'daharo 'sminnantarākāśastasminyadantastadanveṣṭavyaṃ tadvāva vijijñāsitavyam'ityupadiṣṭe 'ntevāsinākṣiptam-'kiṃ tadatra vidyate yadanveṣṭavyam' /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5760: tadasminnākṣepe parisamāpte samādhānāvasara ācāryasyākāśopamānopakramaṃ vacaḥ-'ubhe asmindyāvāpṛthivī samāhite'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5767: no khalvabhyupagamā eva doṣatvena codyanta ityata āha-tatra vākyaśeṣa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5770: yacca kartavyaṃ tadicchitīti 'tadanveṣṭavyaṃ tadvāva vijijñāsitavyam'iti taddaharākāśaviṣayamavatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5775: tataścākāśādhārau tāveva parāmṛśyate ityata āha-asminkāmāḥ samāhitāḥpratiṣṭhitāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5782: 'asminkāmāḥ'iti ca 'eṣaḥ'iti caikavacanāntaṃ na dve dyāvāpṛthivyau parāmnaṣṭumarhatīti daharākāśa eva parāmraṣṭavya iti samudāyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5783: tadanena krameṇa 'tasminyadantaḥ'ityatra tacchabdo 'nantaramapyākāśamatilaṅghya hṛtpuṇḍarīkaṃ parāmṛśatatyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5786: gatiśabdābhyāṃ tathā hi dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ ca / BBs_1,3.15 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5788: uttarebhya ityasya prapañcaḥ etameva daharākāśaṃ prakramya batāho kaṣṭamidaṃ vartate jantūnāṃ tattvāvabodhavikalānāṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5792: sādbhutamiva sakhedamiva śrutaḥ pravartate-'imāḥ sarvāḥ prajā aharahargacchantya
GSP33brsvbh1u:5794: svāpakāle hi sarva evāyaṃ vidvānavidvāṃśca jīvaloko hṛtpuṇḍarīkāśrayaṃ daharākāśākhyaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5795: brahmalokaṃ prāpto 'pyanādyavidyātamaḥ paṭalapihitadṛṣṭitayā brahmabhūyamāpanno 'hamasmīti na veda /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5796: so 'yaṃ brahmalokaśabdastadgatiśca pratyahaṃ jīvalokasya daharākāśasyaiva brahmarūpalokatāmāhatuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5797: tadetadāha bhāṣyakāraḥ-itaśca parameśvara eva daharo yasmāddaharavākyaśeṣa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5801: yadyapi suṣuptasya brahmabhāve laukikaṃ na pramāṇāntaramasti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5803: īdṛśī nāmeyaṃ vaidikī prasiddhiryalloke 'pi gīyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5804: yathā śrutyantare yathā ca loke tatheha brahmalokaśabdo 'pīti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5808: tathāpīha ṣaṣṭhisamāsanirākaraṇena karmadhārayasamāsasthāpanāya liṅgamapyadhikamastīti tadapyuktaṃ sūtrakāreṇa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5811: naca daharākāśo brahmaṇo lokaḥ kintu tadbrahmeti brahma ca tallokaśceti karmadhārayaḥ siddho bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5814: yatkhalu puṇḍarīkasthamantaḥkaraṇaṃ tasminviśuddhe pratyāhṛtetarakaraṇānāṃ yogināṃ nirmala ivodake candramaso bimbamatisvacchaṃ caitanyaṃ jyotiḥsvarūpaṃ brahmāvalokyata iti //15//
GSP33brsvbh1u:5820: kutaḥ, asya dhāraṇalakṣaṇasya mahimno 'sminneveśvara eva śrutyantareṣūpalabdheḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5828: ye tvākāśaśabdo brahmaṇyapi mukhya eva nabhovadityācakṣate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5829: taiḥ 'anyāyaścānekārthatvam'iti ca 'ananyalabhyaḥ śabdārthaḥ'iti ca mīmāṃsakānāṃ mudrābhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5832: naca brahmaṇyeva mukhyo nabhasi tu tenaiva guṇayogena vartsyatīti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5834: nanu 'yāvanvā ayamākāśastāvāneṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśaḥ'iti vyatirekanirdeśānna lakṣaṇā yuktā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5835: nahi bhavati gaṅgāyāḥ kūlamiti vivakṣite gaṅgāyā gaṅgeti prayogaḥ tatkimidānīṃ 'paurṇamāsyāṃ paurṇamāsyā yajeta' 'amāvasyāyāmamāvāsyayā'ityasādhurvaidikaḥ prayogaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5837: yaccoktaṃyatra śabdārthapratītistatra lakṣaṇā'yatra punaranyārthe niścite śabdāprayogastatra vācakatvameveti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5842: naca 'ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsīṃ yajate ya evaṃ vidvānamāvāsyām'ityatra paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdau na lākṣaṇikau /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5845: itaraparāmarśāt sa iti cen nāsaṃbhavāt / BBs_1,3.18 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5847: samyak prasīdatyasmin jīvo viṣayendriyasaṃyogajanitaṃ kāluṣyaṃ jahātīti suṣuptiḥ saṃprasādo jīvasyāvasthābhedaḥ na brahmaṇaḥ tathā śarīrātsamutthānamapi śarīrāśrayasya jīvasya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5850: evaṃ vākyaśeṣagatābhyāmeva saṃprasādasamutthānābhyāṃ daharākāśo jīvaḥ kasmānnāvagamyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5855: tathā caiṣa parāmarśo brahmaṇa eveti na saṃprasādasamutthāne jīvaliṅgam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5856: api tu brahmaṇa eva tādarthyādityagre vakṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5861: daharākāśameva prakṛtyopākhyāyate-yamātmānamanviṣya sarvāṃśca lokānāpnoti sarvāṃśca kāmān,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5862: tamātmānaṃ vividiṣantau surāsurarājavindravirocanau samitpāṇī prajāpatiṃ varivasitumājagmatuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5863: āgatya ca dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi tatparicaraṇaparau brahmacaryamūṣatuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5866: tāvūcatuḥ, ya ātmāpahatapāpmā tamāvāṃ vividiṣāva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5868: ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5875: yaśca svaṅgādau katama eteṣvasau atavaika eva sarveṣviti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5879: tadyadi vayaṃ bhrāntau stha iti brūmastataḥ svātmani samāropitapāṇḍityabahumānau vimānitau santau daurmanasyena yathāvadupadeśaṃ na gṛhṇīyātām,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5889: sādhvalaṅkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtau bhūtvā punarudaśarāve paśyatamākmānaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5891: tau ca sādhvalaṅkṛtau suvasanau chinnanakhalomānau bhūtvā tathaiva cakratuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5893: tadupaśrutya prajāpatiraho batādyāpi na praśānta enayorvibhramaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5895: kālena kalmaṣe kṣīṇe 'smadvacanasaṃdarbhapaurvāparyalocanayātmatattvaṃ pratipatsyete svayameveti matvovāca,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5897: tayorvirocano dehānupātitvācchāyāyā deha evātmatattvamiti matvā nijasadanamāgatya tathaivāsurānupadideśa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5899: taṃ taṃ doṣaṃ paribhāvayan nāhamatra chāyātmadarśane bhogyaṃ paśyāmīti prajāpatisamīpaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5900: samitpāṇiḥ punarevevāyaṃ āgataśca prajāpatināgamanakāraṇaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ pathi paribhāvitaṃ jagāda /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5902: tatpunarapi tatprakṣayāyā carāparāṇi dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi brahmacaryaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5904: sa ca tathā caritabrahmacaryaḥ surendraḥ prajāpatimupasasāda /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5906: ya ātmāpahatapāpmādilakṣaṇo 'kṣaṇa darśitaḥ so 'yaṃ ya eṣa svapne mahīyamāno vanitādibhiranekadhā svapnopabhogān bhuñjāno virahatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5910: punaraparāṇi cara dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi svacchaṃ brahmacaryamidānīmapyakṣīṇakalmaṣo
GSP33brsvbh1u:5913: ya eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmādiguṇo darśito 'kṣiṇi ca svapne ca sa eṣa yo viṣayendriyasaṃyogavirahātprasannaḥ suṣuptāvasthāyāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5915: yathā hi jāgradvā svapnagato vāyamahamasmīti imāni bhūtāmani ceti vijānāti naivaṃ suṣuptaḥ kiñcidapi vedayate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5918: eva muktavati madhavati batādyāpi na te kalmaṣakṣayo 'bhūt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5921: caturthe ca paryāye pañca varṣāṇītyekottaraṃ śataṃ varṣāṇi brahmacaryaṃ carataḥ sahasrākṣasya saṃpedire /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5922: athāsmai brahmacaryasaṃpadunmṛditakalmaṣāya madhavate ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi yaśca svapne yaśca suṣupte anusyūta eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmādiguṇako darśitaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5923: tameva 'madhavan martyaṃ vai śarīram'ityādinā vispaṣṭaṃ vyācaṣṭe prajāpatiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5929: kevalamayaṃ nice caitanyānandaghane rūpe vyavasthitaḥ samastalokakāmān prāpto bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5930: etasyaiva hi paramānandasya mātrāḥ sarve kāmāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5934: 'evaṃ vyavasthita uttarādvākyasaṃdarbhātprājāpatyāt akṣiṇi ca svapne suṣupte ca caturtho
GSP33brsvbh1u:5940: jīvasya caitat sarvamiti sa evāpahatapāpmādiguṇaḥ śrutyokta iti nāpahatapāpmādibhiḥ paraṃ brahma gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5947: kintu vāgbuddhiśarīrārambhasaṃbhavo 'sya pāpmādiḥ śarīrādyabhāve na bhavati dhūma iva dhūmadhvajābhāva iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5949: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-paurvāparyālocanayā tāvadupaniṣadāṃ śuddhabuddhamuktamekamaprapañcaṃ brahma tadatiriktaṃ ca sarvaṃ tadvivarto rajjoriva bhujaṅga ityatra tātparyamavagamyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5950: tathāca jīvo 'pyavidyākalpitadehendriyādyupahitaṃ rūpaṃ brahmaṇo na tu svābhāvikaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5952: āvirbhūtabrahmarūpe tu nirupādhau saṃbhavanto brahmaṇa eva na jīvasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5953: evaṃ ca brahmaivāpahatāpāpmādiguṇaṃ śrutyuktamiti tadeva daharākāśo na jīva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5960: evaṃ dehendriyādyapyupajanāpāyadharmakaṃ nātmetyudaśarāvadṛṣṭāntena śarīrātmatāyā vyutthānaṃ bādha iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5962: dravyāntarasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ hi tenābhibhūtaṃ tasmādvivicyamānaṃ vyajyate hematārakādi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5966: te ca saṃsārāvasthāyāṃ bhāsanta iti kathaṃ jīvarūpaṃ na bhāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5976: tathāpi na sākṣājjapādikusumasaṃyogina ityetāvatā dṛṣṭāntitā iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5980: tadanena śravaṇamananadhyānābhyāsādvivekavijñānamuktvā tasya vivekavijñānasya phalaṃ kevalātmarūpasākṣātkāraḥ svarūpeṇābhiniṣpattiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5981: sa ca sākṣātkāro vṛttirūpaḥ prapañcamātraṃ pravilāpayan svayamapi prapañcarūpatvātkatakaphalavatpravilīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5984: atra copasaṃpattāvuttarakālāyāmapi ktvāprayogo mukhaṃ vyādāya svapitītīvanmantavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5987: tadā tatsaśarīrasyāpi saṃbhavati prārabdhakāryakarmakṣayasya purastādityāha-tathā vivekāvivekamātreṇeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5988: na kevalaṃ 'sa yoha vai tatparamaṃ brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati'ityādiśrutibhyo jīvasya paramātmano 'bhedaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5991: praticchāyātmavajjīvaṃ paramātmano vastuto bhinnamapyamṛtābhayātmatvena grāhayitvā paścātparamātmānamṛtābhayādimantaṃ prajāpatirgrāhyati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5992: na tvayaṃ jīvasya paramātmabhāvamācaṣṭe chāyātmana ivetyata āha-nāpi praticchāyātmāyamakṣilakṣita iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5995: kiñca dvitīyādiṣvapi paryāyeṣu 'etaṃ tveva te bhūyo 'nuvyākhyāyasyāmi'ityupakramātprathamaparyāyanirdiṣṭo na chāyāpuruṣaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5998: atha chāyāpuruṣa eva jīvaḥ kasmānna bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5999: tathāca chāyāpuruṣa evaitamiti parāmṛśyata ityata āha-kiñcāhamadya svapne hastinamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6010: kena prakāreṇa na jānātītyata āha-ayamahamasmīmāni bhūtāni ceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6013: ya evāhaṃ jāgaritvā suptaḥ sa evaitarhi jāgarmīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6015: yadi hyetamityanenānantaroktaṃ cakṣuradhiṣṭhānaṃ puruṣaṃ parāmṛśya tasyātmatvamucyeta tato na bhavecchāyāpuruṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6027: na cābhede brahmaṇo jīvānāṃ brahmaguṇānāmasaṃbhavo jīveṣviti teṣāmabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6031: naca vastusato brahmaṇo guṇāḥ samāropiteṣu jīveṣu saṃbhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6032: no khalu vastusatyā rajjvā dharmāḥ sevyatvādayaḥ samāropite bhujaṅge saṃbhavinaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6035: avidyākalpitaṃ ca kartṛtvabhoktṛtvaṃ yathālokasiddhamupāśritya karmavidhayaḥ pravṛttāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6040: nanu brahmacedatra vaktavyaṃ kṛtaṃ jīvaparāmarśenetyuktamityata āha-
GSP33brsvbh1u:6044: na cāsau jīvamaparāmṛśya śakya upadeṣṭumiti tisṛṣvavasthāsu jīvaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6047: alpaśruter iti cet tad uktam / BBs_1,3.21 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6055: 'balīyasā hi saureṇa tejasā mandaṃ tejaścandratārakādyabhibhūyamānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6057: ye 'pi pidhāyakāḥ pradīpasya gṛhaghaṭādayo na te svabhāsā pradīpaṃ bhāsayitumīśate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6063: tasmādyadyapi 'yasmin dyauḥ pṛthivī cāntarikṣamotam'iti brahma prakṛtaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6067: tatra taṃ tasyeti ca sarvanāmapadāni pradarśanīyamevāvamrakṣyanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6070: tasmātpramāṇāntarāpratītamapi tejo 'ntaramalaukikaṃ śabdādupāsyatvena gamyata iti prāpte ucyate-'brahmaṇyeva hi talliṅgaṃ na tu tejasyalaukike
GSP33brsvbh1u:6071: tasmānna tadupāsyatve brahma jñeyaṃ tu gamyate //
GSP33brsvbh1u:6073: kiṃvā 'bhārūpaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ'iti śrutyantaraprasiddhena brahmaṇo bhānena sūryādīnāṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:6074: bhānamupapādyatāmiti viśaye na śrutasaṃbhave 'śrutasya kalpanā yujyata ityaprasiddhaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:6081: tathā tadeva cākṣuṣaṃ tejo bāhyasauryāditejaḥāpyāyitaṃ rūpādi prakāśayati nānāpyāyitam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6092: vanhyayaḥ piṇḍayostu yadyapi dahanakriyā na bhidyate tathāpi dravyabhedena kriyābhedaṃ kalpayitvā kriyāsādṛśyaṃ vyākhyeyam /
